description.hltext_display: AMCON's Crucial Outing [column]
description.content:
The year 2010 would go down as a major turning point in the annals of the nation's banking system.
It is the year that critical decisions and steps were taken to put the banking system on the path to sanity.
Right from the identification of the nine distressed banks that were sailing perilously close to terminal illness, to the ouster of their boards and managing directors, none of the developments in the banking reforms initiated in the second half of 2009 generated as much reactions or met as stiff a resistance as the passage of the Asset Management Corporation of Nigeria (AMCON) bill into law.
The submission of the AMCON bill to the National Assembly for passage into law drew flaks from opponents of the banking reforms introduced by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN). There was intensive lobbying in the National Assembly to stall the passage of the bill into law.
When the bill eventually scaled the hurdle of the anti-AMCON campaigners in the National Assembly, the lobbying shifted to the presidency. The president came under intense pressure not to sign the bill, as it were, into law.
The reason for the intense lobbying could be seen in the provisions of the enabling law itself. A critical look at the Act shows why the debtors worked so hard to stop AMCON on its track.
The objectives of AMCON includes to "assist eligible financial institutions to efficiently dispose off toxic bank assets in accordance with the provision of the Act; efficiently manage and dispose off eligible bank assets acquired by the corporation in accordance with the provision of this Act, obtain the best available financial returns on eligible bank assets or other assets acquired by it in accordance with the provision of the Act".
"The CBN shall, by regulations, prescribe the maximum percentage of eligible class of bank assets which an eligible financial institution may retain in its books and any eligible bank assets above the prescribed threshold shall be offered to the corporation for acquisition.
'The consideration to be furnished by the corporation for an eligible bank asset shall be seven years bonds or such other debt securities of such other issued by the corporation and guaranteed by the federal government or such other form of consideration as may be approved by the CBN.
Section 2 [1] of the Act provides that; "the authorised capital of AMCON shall not be less than N20billion, which shall be subscribed to by the federal government and such other subscribers as may be approved by the President on the recommendation of the CBN and the Federal Ministry of Finance.
The law empowers the corporation to appoint a receiver/manager to manage the assets of debtor companies: "The corporation shall have the ability to appoint or act as receiver/ manager for a debtor company whose assets have been pledged as collateral for an eligible loan/debt acquired by it."
The architects of the law apparently had in mind the peculiar circumstances in Nigeria where loan defaulters run to courts and obtain 'cash-and-carry' injunctions stopping their creditors from taking possession of properties pledged as collateral for the loans. Section 53[1][a] under offences and penalties provides that "Any person who makes false alarm in material respect in respect to any moveable or immovable property used as collateral for any loan with a view to defeating the realisation of the debts commits an offence and is liable on conviction to a fine of not less than N5million or imprisonment for a term not less than three years or both such fine and imprisonment" .
From the provisions of the bill, it was therefore, clear to the debtors, especially the chronic ones, that AMCON was not just out to rescue distressed banks, but was also empowered to ensure the recovery of banks' bad debts. So far, the corporation has scaled most of the hurdles that could have hampered its operations and could be said to have hit the ground running.
Last week, AMCON moved to prove that it was ready to do business. It was time to present to banks' chiefs, a review of the eligible banks' assets acquisition process. The management of the corporation summoned the managing directors and chief executives of banks to a crucial meeting in Lagos. The meeting was designed to work out measures for cleaning the balance sheets of the banks and getting rid of all non-performing margin loans and other non-performing loans before the end of the year.
Mustapha Chike-Obi, the managing director of AMCON left no one in doubt that the process of acquiring all the non-performing loans of banks would be completed by the first quarter of 2011.
At the crucial meeting, the bank chiefs were given Friday, December 17, 2010 as deadline for submitting all their loans documents to AMCON. The deadline was a tight one. One bank chief executive conceded to reporters that his team was working round the clock to meet the deadline.
AMCON's target is to buy the non-performing loans of the banks and issue bonds before the end of December 2010.
The first tranche of the transaction would involve the buying of all margin and non-performing loans of the bailed out banks along with the non-performing loans of healthy banks. The development is good news, not only to the money market, but to the Nigerian Stock Exchange (NSE).
Even if the move is not going to immediately ease the crippling liquidity squeeze on the nation's capital market, the buying of the margin loans which were used to acquire billions of shares, would tackle the share glut in the Exchange and give the bulls some more breathing space. That could eventually translate into considerable appreciation of share prices as no one would be dumping unwanted warehoused shares in the market for quite some time.
The main aim of the AMCON bonds issued to fund the purchase of non-performing loans across the banking sector is to bring the nine rescued banks' negative shareholders funds back to zero. That move would obviously reduce the burden of the core investors now negotiating recapitalisation modalities with the rescued banks. The banks are not expected to immediately trade on the bonds.
"It would be very unwise for any bank to rush to the market and liquefy those bonds. Our expectation is that these banks would hold onto those bonds because they are yield assets and, as they make loans, they will liquefy them and fund the loans," Chike-Obi warned.
The bad loans would initially be exchanged for "consideration bonds" which the banks would hold while AMCON registers fully tradeable debt instruments. After the registration of the fully tradeable debt instrument, the consideration bonds would be retired and exchanged for liquid bonds in January 2011.
At the end of last week's meeting, most of the doubts in the minds of the banks' chiefs about AMCON's intentions would have been cleared as the rescuer of banks eases out the first obstacle to the recapitalisation of the rescued banks. The healthy banks on the other hand would benefit from AMCON's package with the cleansing of their balance sheets.

event_or_fact.property: It would be very unwise for any bank to rush to the market and liquefy those bonds.; Our expectation is that these banks would hold onto those bonds because they are yield assets and, as they make loans, they will liquefy them and fund the loans

description.hltext_display: News: Black Ops toppt Milliarden-Marke
description.content:
Eine Milliarde Dollar. Wow. Activsion hat unbestreitbar eine magische Grenze bei den Verkäufen von erreicht. Seit der Veröffentlichung im November wurde es zum am schnellsten verkauften Spiel aller Zeiten, das sagt Bobby Kotick, unser Lieblingschef in der Videospielindustrie."Von allen Formen der Unterhaltung haben nur und Avatar den Milliarden Dollar-Umsatz-Meilenstein so schnell erreicht", sagt der Activision-Chef stolz.
if (banner_4)} In dem Zusammenhang ließ Eric Hirshberg, Publishing Director bei Activision nicht unerwähnt, dass mehr als 600 Millionen Stunden Spielzeit mit dem Titel verbracht wurden: "Noch eindrucksvoller als die Zahl der verkauften Spiele, sind die Stunden, welche die Leute im Spiel zusammen online spielen, die ist beispiellos. is mehr als ein Spiel, es ist eine wahre Community."

description.hltext_display: Holiday fun is brewing
description.content:
Published on December 21st, 2010
Pour on the good taste this season with Ontario Craft Beer
Looking for unique ways to liven up holiday entertaining? Try fresh, local Ontario Craft Beer and discover the difference it makes to your meals, entertaining, food pairing and gift giving.
Topics :
LCBO , MacLean's , City Brewing , Ontario , Canada , Etobicoke
“Serving craft beer is a great way to spice up your holiday entertaining,” says Canada's first-ever female beer cicerone, Mirella Amato of beerology.ca. “Pairing beer with food is a growing trend and with so many fresh locally-brewed beers to choose from, there is a brew for every occasion. There are also tons of fun, seasonal spiced beers available at this time of year. These beers are a treat on their own.”
Ontario offers a bounty of specialty beers brewed especially for the season using organic ingredients, harvest fruits and vegetables, coffee, honey, chocolate, herbs and spices. Ontario craft brewers try to source local ingredients where possible, making craft beer a green gift idea for conscious Canadian consumers.
“The seasonal Ontario beers are limited-edition, so they make a great gift if you're invited to a party.” says Amato. “It's fun to pick up two or three different bottles and surprise your host with a tasty selection of local brews.”
Beer experts like Amato can educate guests on the art of beer tasting or for a self-directed session, visit www.ontariocraftbrewers.com. The interactive, online tasting tool allows you to keep a personal record of the various beer styles and your reactions.
Discover the Difference: Pick up an OCB Discovery Pack to try six different flavours in one go. LCBO shelves are brimming with traditional beer styles with unique and crafty twists, such as:
Yuletide Cherry Porter – Barley Days Brewery, Prince Edward County
Festivale, Bog Water – Beau's Brewery, Van Kleek Hill
Double Chocolate Cherry Stout – Black Oak Brewing Co., Etobicoke
Stonehammer Oatmeal Coffee Stout – F&M Brewery, Guelph
Netherworld Cascadian Dark Ale – Flying Monkeys, Barrie
Jubilation Spiced Ale – Grand River Brewing, Cambridge
Ringberry Ale – Granite Brewery, Toronto
Winter Ale – Great Lakes Brewery, Etobicoke
Blackcurrant Rye Lager – Heritage Brewing, Ottawa
Pilsbock – King Brewery, Nobleton
Scotch Ale – MacLean's Ales, Durham
Barley Wine – Mill Street Brewery, Toronto
Harvest Ale – Muskoka Cottage Brewery, Bracebridge
Texas Tea Honey Stout – Neustadt Springs Brewery, Neustadt
General Brock Stout – Niagara's Best Brewery & Pub, Niagara Falls
Holiday Honey – Old Credit Brewing Co. Ltd., Port Credit
Christmas Cranbeery Ale – Railway City Brewing, St. Thomas
Black Irish Plain Porter – Scotch Irish Brewing, Ottawa
Hop Nouveau and Winter Warmer, Trafalgar Brewing Company, Oakville

event_or_fact.property: ?The seasonal Ontario beers are limited-edition, so they make a great gift if you're invited to a party.?

description.hltext_display: '글로벌 PC업체' 국내 스마트폰시장 노린다
description.content:
국내 스마트폰 시장이 폭발적인 성장세를 거듭하면서 글로벌 PC업체들이 속속 국내 스마트폰 시장에 뛰어들고 있다. 세계 3위 PC업체 델은 22일 스마트폰 신제품 '스트릭'과 '베뉴'를 KT를 통해 출시하고 본격적인 판매에 나섰다.
스트릭은 델이 스마트폰 시장 공략을 위해 지난 6월 영국에 첫선을 보인 제품으로, 5인치 화면에 500만 화소 카메라, 16기가바이트(GB) 용량의 내장메모리를 갖췄다. 세계 최초로 국내시장에 출시되는 베뉴는 4.1인치 액정화면에 800만 화소 카메라를 탑재했으며 16GB 내장메모리를 기본으로 제공한다. 두 제품 모두 구글 안드로이드 2.2 운영체제(OS)와 퀄컴의 1GHz 프로세서를 장착했다.
델에 이어 세계 1위 PC업체 HP도 국내시장에 진출할 채비를 서두르고 있다. HP는 올 4월 모바일 전문업체 팜을 12억달러에 인수하며 스마트폰 시장에 뛰어들었다. 업계에서는 HP가 팜의 웹OS 운영체제를 탑재한 소형 스마트폰 '픽시2'를 내년 초에 출시할 것으로 내다보고 있다.
HP는 스마트폰과 별도로 태블릿PC 출시도 검토 중이다. HP는 지난 10월 마이크로소프트의 윈도7 운영체제를 탑재한 태블릿PC '슬레이트500'을 799달러에 출시하며 태블릿PC 공략에도 본격적으로 나서고 있다. 특히 지난해에는 KT와 손잡고 교육부가 추진 중인 디지털교과서 구축사업의 태블릿PC 공급업체로 선정된 바 있어 국내시장에 KT를 통해 진출할 가능성이 높다.
대만 PC업체 아수스도 국내시장 진출을 검토하고 있는 것으로 알려졌다. 아수스는 그 동안 노트북PC와 PC 부품 등에 주력해왔으나 지난해 3월 윈도모바일 운영체제를 탑재한 스마트폰을 출시하며 휴대폰 시장에 진출했다. 최근에는 안드로이드 탑재 스마트폰을 출시한 데 이어 삼성전자, LG전자, HTC, 델과 함께 윈도폰7 스마트폰을 생산하는 5개 업체에 선정되는 등 스마트폰 시장 공략에 박차를 가하고 있다.
글로벌 PC업체들이 잇따라 스마트폰 시장에 뛰어드는 것은 스마트폰과 태블릿PC 시장이 급격하게 확대되면서 향후 노트북PC 시장을 크게 잠식할 전망되기 때문이다. 시장조사업체 IDC에 따르면 올해 세계 넷북(미니노트북) 시장이 지난해보다 10.3% 늘어난 3,780만대에 달할 것으로 예상된다. 하지만 애플 아이패드와 삼성전자 갤럭시탭 등 태블릿PC가 본격적으로 보급되면서 향후 4년 동안 연평균 성장률 4.3%을 기록하는 데 그칠 전망이다.
업계의 한 관계자는 "국내 스마트폰 시장이 내년에 2배 이상 성장할 것으로 전망되면서 글로벌 PC업체들의 국내시장 진출이 가시화되고 있다"며 "하지만 국산 스마트폰의 경쟁력이 상당하기 때문에 시장점유율보다 브랜드 인지도를 높이는 데 주력할 것으로 보인다"고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: Il solbiatese dell'anno? Il parroco
description.content:
Sabato il riconoscimento a don Emilio Sorte, consegnato dal sindaco Luigi Melis
| Stampa | Invia | Scrivi
Sindaco Melis: “Un grazie a nome di tutta la cittadinanza”. Don Emilio: “Un premio dedicato a tutti i solbiatesi”. Questa, in estrema sintesi la premiazione del Solbiatese dell’Anno 2010, assegnato a Don Emilio Sorte. La consegna della targa e della pergamena è avvenuta sabato presso il Centro Giovanile Giovanni Paolo II, prima dello spettacolo musicale in programma, “Io Canto… e non solo… a Solbiate”.
Dopo le parole di ringraziamento del sindaco Melis, Don Emilio, soddisfatto per il riconoscimento, nel ringraziare per l’attenzione riservatagli ha, a sua volta, dedicato il premio a tutti i solbiatesi, affermando che senza il sostegno fattivo di tutta la comunità nessun obiettivo sarebbe stato possibile raggiungere.
Don Emilio Sorte è nato a Rescaldina l'11 luglio 1960; ordinato sacerdote il 9 giugno 1984, fino al 1990 è stato Vice Rettore Seminario di Saronno. Poi per undici anni è stato Vice parroco presso la parrocchia Santi Eusebio e Maccabei a Garbagnate Milanese. Da settembre 2001 è Parroco a Solbiate Olona, presso la parrocchia di S. Antonino Martire.

description.hltext_display: Kings of Leon Cancel London Show Due to Fire
description.author: MICHAEL PRESTON
description.content:
For the second time this year, the Kings of Leon were forced to cancel a show because of a freak accident.
The arena rock band, which was set to do a show at London's 02 Arena, had to postpone the gig after their tour buses caught on fire, reports the BBC.
The blaze started in a loading bay and spread from one bus to the other. 60 firefighters were called to the scene and six people were eventually treated for smoke inhalation.
A survey of the damage led to the show's cancellation. "Unfortunately, once the assessments were completed in full, there was not enough time to set up the show for tonight's performance," a spokesman for the 02 said.
A spokesman for the London Fire Brigade (LFB) said that while no damage had been done to the arena, both buses had been completely hollowed out by the fire, leaving little time to set up the show. "Our crew did a fantastic job, especially given the levels of smoke down here which has led to quite challenging conditions," said LFB sation manager Sally Cartwright.
Earlier this year at a gig in St. Louis, the band walked off mid-performance after pigeon droppings bombarded the stage. Singer Jared Followill was hit in the face and mouth with the bird's droppings and the band deemed the conditions too unsanitary to continue.
Suggested Reading: BBC, New York Times, New York

description.hltext_display: LeXolution IT Announces the Launch of Major N Minor Corp. Redesigned Website
description.content:
LeXolution IT Services, a global IT solutions company with over 4 years of experience in offering unique web design and web development services...
December 21st, 2010, New Delhi, LeXolution IT Services, a global IT solutions company with over 4 years of experience in offering unique web design and web development services to the businesses world wide, is announcing the launch of its newly redesigned website www.majornminorcorp.com for its US based strategic partner company – Major N Minor Corp. Major N Minor Corp. is an organization established by the firm cooperation of dynamic individuals from all spheres of life that provides web solutions to the clients located in US. The US based technology company aims to offer several products and services of any complexity to its clients that help them get quick boost in their business they have always desired for. Major N Minor Corp. works aggressively in favour of development of your idea along with its creativity and expertise in order to fulfill demand of today's fast-paced world. LeXolution IT Services after being the strategic partner of Major N Minor Corp. has redesigned the website www.majornminorcorp.com. We have completely revamped the website and has given it a complete new look while keeping its feel same like it was before to make it more attractive. We have used PHP/MySQL in its development to keep the site user- friendly. About LeXolution IT Services LeXolution IT is an eminent Indian offshore web design company having two prime domains of expertise - Web Design & Development and KPO Services. LIT offers a full-cycle development procedure from requirements and specification, conceptualization, architecture, design, coding, testing and validation to product maintenance and support. The company made its inception in November 2006 with an aim to help businesses with their web based requirements. Based in India, LeXolution IT has made its presence in USA as well. It has successfully catered to many international clients over the years. For more information about the company log on to www.lexolutionit.com Contact Details: Telephone: +91-11-45665556 US Phone: - +1 213 814 2708 UK Phone: +44 166 651 1519 Fax : +91 22 66459890 Email : contactus@lexolutionit.com

description.hltext_display: 医大三镜同用胆囊切除
description.content:
天健网消息（记者 李佳鹤）大连医科大学附属第一医院普外三科在内窥镜室协助下，首次应用腹腔镜、胆道镜、内窥镜同时、联合为一名胆总管结石的病人实施了胆囊切除、胆总管切开取石，内窥镜鼻胆管引流（ENBD）术。
据主刀医生王长淼教授介绍，病人为一名６９岁的老年女性，因反复上腹痛來诊，经CT检查确诊为胆囊炎、胆总管结石合并胆管扩张。手术在腹腔镜下进行，先行胆囊切除，接着行胆总管切开，胆道镜取净胆总管结石，探查乳头无狭窄后，经胆总管切口逆行置ENBD管从乳头进入十二指肠内，再用内窥镜将ENBD管经鼻孔引出体外，胆管内ENBD管置入肝内拉直，缝合胆总管，肝下置引流。术后一周内拔出ENBD管，病人顺利出院。
以往胆总管切开后，原则上置入T形管，术后需长期引流管护理，有时长达2-3个月，拔出时早期还有可能出现胆汁性腹膜炎，后期出现结石复发。最近，也有先行内窥镜括约肌切开、取石、置ENBD引流，然后再腹腔镜切除胆囊两个手术过程，括约肌切开使其功能损伤，或先行ENBD引流，再行胆总管切开取石，可不置T形管，但也需要两个手术过程。本术式首次应用腹腔镜、胆道镜、内窥镜同时联合（三镜同时联合）实施胆囊切除、胆总管切开取石，内窥镜鼻胆管引流（ENBD），将两个手术合二为一，克服了以前手术的缺点，属于重大创新，国内外文献未见报道。
本术式具有以下优点：微创，避免长切口，美容，创伤小恢复快，治疗过程大大缩短，病人术后一周可出院，不留尾巴；不放T形管，消除了术后患者的不便，避免放T形管引起的并发症；避免两次手术，一次性解决问题，。因而本术式具有很强的可行性，值得推广。我院在此基础上，总结经验，将继续尝试三镜同时联合行胆囊切除、胆总管切开胆道镜联合内窥镜取石；内镜下胆管内支撑引流术（ERBD）等术式的探索。

description.hltext_display: La nevicata serale manda il tilt la circolazione
description.content:
Attesa per ore, la neve è caduta proprio nell'orario di rientro dei lavoratori: code e rallentamenti soprattutto sulle vie d'accesso da Sud alla città. Un autoarticolato fuori strada a Schianno
| Stampa | Invia | Scrivi
Torna a cadere la neve sulla provincia e la circolazione va subito in tilt in alcuni nodi: i fiocchi bianchi, per quanto attesi, nella serata di martedì hanno creato qualche problema, almeno nella parte Nord della provincia. Se infatti a Busto Arsizio e Gallarate la neve bagnata non “attaccava”, tra le 19 e le 20 verso Varese e nel Luinese le precipitazioni sono diventate più intense e hanno reso parzialmente difficoltosa la circolazione, complice il rientro a casa di molte persone da Milano: rallentamenti sono stati segnalati sulla SP1 sull'intero tratto Capolago-A8, code anche da Gazzada per entrare in Varese: la colonna di veicoli da via Gasparotto si allungava, intorno alle 20.00, fino oltre il sottopasso dell'autostrada. Ma la circolazione è risultata ancora più difficile sulle strade secondarie (nella foto: il centro di Gazzada): in molti punti la nevicata - attesa, ma giunta quasi d'improvviso in serata - ha creato accumuli e ghiaccio. Anche sulla Varesina, zona tradatese, si sono registrate alcune difficoltà nella circolazione, con marcia a velocità ridotta, così come nella zona collinare, Albizzate, Solbiate Arno, Caidate; a creare problemi è stata in alcuni punti la neve, in altri il ghiaccio, a causa del successivo abbassamento delle temperature.
Nel complesso, pochi sono stati gli incidenti sulle strade della provincia. I vigili del fuoco stati impegnati intorno alle 20 nel recupero di un camion bilico finito fuori strada in via Adua, a Schianno: il mezzo è stato rimesso sulla sede stradale dalla gru. Un altro incidente si è avuto in tarda serata nella zona di Fagnano Olona, anche in questo caso con l'intervento dei pompieri.

description.hltext_display: "我心中的红色时尚"演讲纪念"一二·九"
description.content:
天健网消息（记者 金东淑）近日，团市委在大连市商业学校和辽宁师范大学分别举行了大连市大中学生“我心中的红色时尚”演讲比赛中专组和大学组的比赛，来自全市13所中等职业学校的中专生选手和14所高校的大学生选手分别参加了比赛。
据悉，为纪念“一二·九”运动七十五周年，进一步推动红色时尚宣讲的深入开展，团市委在十二月份组织开展了大中学校“红色时尚，永远跟党走”系列活动；主要包括当代红色时尚大讨论、“红色精神代代传”宣讲接力和“我心中的红色时尚”演讲比赛三项内容，活动的开展得到了全市大中学校在校学生的积极响应和踊跃参与。演讲比赛分为大学、高中、中专三个组别，高中组的比赛将于2011年1月份举行。

description.hltext_display: '명품' 루이뷔통, 경쟁사 에르메스 삼키나
description.content:
프랑스 명품업체 루이뷔통(LVMH)이 경쟁사인 에르메스의 지분을 야금야금 사들이면서 에르메스에 대한 야심을 더욱 키워 나가고 있다.
블룸버그통신에 따르면 LVMH는 21일(현지시간) 지난 10월에 이어 에르메스의 주식을 추가로 사들여 에르메스에 대한 지분을 종전 17.1%에서 20.21%로 높였다고 발표했다. LVMH는 이와 함께 상황이 허락할 경우 지분을 추가 매입하겠다고 밝혀 에르메스 사냥을 계속해 나갈 방침임을 시사했다.
LVMH가 에르메스에 대한 야심을 본격적으로 드러내기 시작한 것은 지난 10월 에르메스의 지분을 매입하며 2대 주주로 올라설 때부터다. 당시 LVMH는 “지분 매입은 적대적 기업인수(M&A)나 경영권 확보와는 관련이 없고 ‘장기적 투자의 일환’으로 결정한 것”이라고 밝힌 바 있다.
그러나 업계는 LVMH가 점진적으로 에르메스 경영권에 까지 손을 뻗칠 것이라고 전망하고 있다.
에르메스는 창업주 티에르 에르메스의 후손들인 73명의 상속인이 73.4%에 이르는 지분을 분산 소유하고 있어 사실상 외부의 적대적 인수가 불가능하지만 지난 10월부터 LVMH가 에르메스에 대한 지분을 확대하기 시작하면서 적대적 M&A 가능성이 공공연히 거론되고 있다. 현재 LVMH가 에르메스에 대해 갖고 있는 의결권은 12.73%다.
위기를 느낀 에르메스 가문은 이번 달 초 LVMH로부터 경영권을 방어하기 위해 긴급가족 모임을 갖고 50%의 지분을 출자해 지주회사를 설립하겠다고 결정한 바 있다

description.hltext_display: Ramsauer räumt Defizite bei der Bahn ein
China opens skies to private air transport
description.content:
After years of waiting for China to lift heavy restrictions on airspace, wealthy travellers and aircraft manufacturers have reason to celebrate -- the country's skies are opening up to private flights.
The makers of helicopters and small business jets are predicting a major bump in sales -- France's Dassault Falcon just moved its Asia office from Kuala Lumpur to Beijing, which it called the new "centre of gravity" for the market.
The private air travel industry "will be one of the fastest-growing sectors in the next 10 years", Frank Lee, chairman of China Private Aviation Company, a consultancy offering aircraft acquisition and charter services, told AFP.
The airspace over China -- the world's third-largest country by surface area after Russia and Canada -- is under strict military control, but the People's Liberation Army recently loosened its iron grip over the skies.
In the past, authorities needed a week's notice for approval of a private flight. Under the new regulations, the thumbs-up can be given within a day, sometimes in just a few hours.
The Chinese government, which encourages its major state-owned conglomerates to invest abroad -- especially in Africa, where the commercial air service is patchy -- has finally understood the need for private aviation, Lee said.
Some business jets are now able to take Chinese executives from Beijing to London, Nairobi and Los Angeles without refuelling stops.
"Each year, the growth rate in the sector is more than 30 percent and we see a trend of acceleration," Lee said.
Of course, sales in the nascent Chinese market are starting from a rather low point. More than two thirds of the 15,000 business jets in operation around the world are in the United States, while just 150 are in China.
John Rosanvallon, the head of Dassault Falcon, admits it will be a "brutal" start for market players in the Asian nation, with clients "immediately looking for the biggest planes".
"Within two or three years, China will represent not one but 10 percent of our market worldwide," Rosanvallon predicted.
In the medium term, Dassault is hoping to sell about 10 business jets a year in China, at a list price of between 30 and 50 million dollars.
The French firm was not as quick to jump on the Chinese market as US company Gulfstream, which says it currently has a 63 percent market share on large-cabin business jets in China, including Hong Kong and Macau.
"We are very encouraged by these figures," Jeff Miller, vice president of communications for Gulfstream, told AFP.
"Air traffic control procedures in China have become a lot more flexible, expediting the filing of flight plans. This has made the use of business jets much more practical and advantageous."
Chinese millionaires looking for a way to spend their money often buy a private jet "to show off" their new-found wealth or get one up on a rich contact, according to Walter Wang, the editor-in-chief of JET Asia Pacific magazine.
Some large-cabin private jets owned by Chinese high-flyers are however grounded, as they lack the proper pilots and crew, Wang said.
"Sometimes it exceeds their needs. Gradually they will become more rational," he told AFP.
In April next year, plane makers will flock to the southern island of Hainan for its annual yacht, jet and "luxury lifestyle" trade show -- a must for the country's jet-setters and top-level executives.
The outlook is just as rosy in China for makers of helicopters and smaller jets, with the world's major manufacturers -- Eurocopter, Bell, Robinson, Agusta and Cessna -- poised to enter the market.
Last month, the State Council, or cabinet, and the powerful Central Military Commission published a joint circular on the "progressive opening" of China's low-altitude airspace, where such aircraft tend to fly.
As with the larger planes, authorisations of flight plans will come more quickly -- opening up the skies for tourism flights and quick business trips between regions.
Developers are already jumping at the chance, building helipads at resorts, golf courses and even organic farms to offer the wealthy an opportunity to escape China's polluted mega-cities for a day of fresh air, Lee said.
Rescue workers will also benefit from the move. The massive Sichuan earthquake in May 2008, which left nearly 87,000 people dead or missing, revealed the country's severe lack of helicopters.

We are very encouraged by these figures; Air traffic control procedures in China have become a lot more flexible, expediting the filing of flight plans. This has made the use of business jets much more practical and advantageous.

description.hltext_display: Satakunnan Radion suuri paketointikilpailu
description.content:
Taru, Reetta ja Tiina osallistuivat paketointikilpailuun.
Kuva: Päivi Meritähti / YLE
2238634
Kilpailun tavoitteena oli selvittää kuinka hyvin Porissa paketointipalveluja suorittavat vapaaehtoiset selviävät tehtävästään. Kilpailuun osallistuivat Tiina Kananen Porin seudun isovanhemmista, Reetta Turtiainen NiceFutiksesta sekä Taru Saine Satakunnan Radiosta.
Paketoijien ansioluettelot olivat keskenään hyvin erilaisia. Tiinan paketointiurakka kirjakaupassa on jatkunut jo neljä viikkoa, joten näppituntumaa pakettien pyörittämiseen löytyy. Reetalla puolestaan on kymmenen vuoden kokemus paketointitonttuna, mutta tänä vuonna hän ei ole osallistunut paketointitalkoisiin. Mustana hevosena kilpailuun osallistui Taru, jolla on kokemusta lähinnä kotipaketoinnista.
Naisille annettiin paketoitavaksi kaksi suklaapussia. Kaikki lähestyivät urakkaa eri tyyleillä. Tiina yhdisti suklaapussit keskenään, Reetta paketoi pussit irrallisina, mutta samaan pakettiin, Taru puolestaan yritti kunnianhimoisesti paketoida pussit erikseen. Uniikeilla tyyleillään paketoineet naiset saivat (lähes kaikki) pakettinsa valmiiksi, mutta nopeusvaihtelut olivat suuria. Tiinan paketti valmistui yhdessä minuutissa, Reetan paketti kahdessa ja Tarun ensimmäinen paketti hieman sen jälkeen. Toinen Tarun suklaapusseista jäi ilman kääreitä, ilmeisesti tarjoiltavaksi ennen pukin tuloa.
Paketointityylin, paketin ulkonäön ja paketointiajan ratkaistessa voittajaksi raati valitsi Tiinan.

description.hltext_display: 부동산 간접투자 '리츠시장' 8조원 시대 눈앞
description.content:
올해 리츠 시장은 양적으로뿐만 아니라 질적으로도 성장했다. 지난해까지는 오피스 빌딩이나 기업의 구조조정용 부동산을 매입해 수익을 내는 기업구조조정 리츠(CR리츠)가 주류였지만 올 들어서는 프로젝트파이낸싱(PF) 등 부동산 개발사업의 시행사 역할을 할 수 있는 개발전문 자기관리 리츠의 설립 신청이 부쩍 늘고 있다. CR리츠는 지난해 25개에서 올해 29개로 늘어나는 데 그친 반면 자기관리 리츠는 2개에서 7개로 늘었다.
투자대상도 과거 오피스 빌딩이나 미분양 아파트 등에 한정됐다면 최근에는 도시형 생활주택과 실버타운, 교육문화단지 개발, 아파트형 공장 등으로 영역을 확대하고 있다.
국토부의 한 관계자는 "리츠의 1인당 주식소유 및 현물출자 한도를 완화하는 내용으로 법 개정을 추진 중이어서 시장이 더욱 활성화될 것"이라고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: 市计测所大工建� �究生联合培养实践基地
description.content:
2010年12月17日，大连市计量检定测试所与大连理工大学在大连市计量检定测试所礼堂签订合作协议，双方本着共同培养复合型人才的原则，就成立研究生实践基地及相关技术共享、人才培养与使用等事宜达成了共识。
2009年，计量所联合大连市电能所与大连理工大学电子与信息工程学院联合举办仪器仪表专业工程硕士班，42名学员参加学习，针对计量工作的特点改进了课程的设置，培养出具有更强的操作能力和自主创新能力的学员，为计量所计划建立的国家级实验室夯实了人才基础，并填补了仪器仪表专业人才的空白。
在首次合作成功的基础上，今年，计量所与大连理工大学再次合作，建立联合培养的研究生实践基地，这是大连理工大学第一个研究生实践基地，不仅是大连理工大学提升办学实力、培养特色人才的现实需要，也是计量所实现长期可持续发展的战略选择，为今后的人才储备，人才输送提供了后方基地。
通过产学研相结合的方式，合作开展新技术、新产品的研发和推广，充分发挥校企各自优势，实现校企优势互补，资源共享，加快科学成果转化。依托企业为社会培养实用人才。依托高校的研发实力提升企业的自主创新能力，增强市场竞争力。

description.hltext_display: Allocate gifts to charities that aim to solve problems
description.author: BILL SHORE
description.content:
Americans make hundreds of millions of dollars of generous year-end donations every holiday season to support a wide variety of charities.
While well-meaning and deeply appreciated, much of that giving unintentionally perpetuates the very problem the donor is seeking to address. That's because donors tend to support programs that make them feel as though they can relieve someone else's suffering rather than seeking out more complex efforts to address root causes that might prevent suffering and need in the first place.
Fortunately, there is a new breed of entrepreneurial philanthropists whose ideas are way ahead of the intentions of many American donors. In philanthropy's earliest days, wealthy individuals felt an obligation to "give something back" and charitable organizations were the vehicle that enabled them to do so, providing for basic needs like food and shelter for those without. But over the past 10 to 15 years, the ambition of philanthropic giving has shifted from the belief that doing good is good enough to instead seeking to actually solve seemingly intractable social problems.
Philanthropic solutions that are increasingly garnering support are often those that embody the promise of solving a problem once and for all, not just ameliorating it by placing Band-Aids on its symptoms. We learned this lesson at Share Our Strength when we changed our goal from feeding hungry children to ending childhood hunger in the U.S.
Feeding children is simple and satisfying and consequently very popular. It is where many donors want to put their money.
On the other hand, ending childhood hunger lacks immediate gratification. It could take five to 10 years to accomplish. It requires advocacy to improve public policy and community organizing to ensure that all of those eligible for existing food and nutrition programs, like school breakfast, summer meals and SNAP (formerly food stamps), can actually access them.
When Share Our Strength made ending childhood hunger our goal ? and shot down the notion that it was just not possible ? it proved ambitious enough to inspire new supporters and realistic enough to achieve. As a result, we began to grow faster ? in revenues, staff and impact ? than we ever had before.
There is always greater risk of failure when the bar is set high. But the reward is a solution worthy of the effort. Such solutions inspire us. They attract new talent and new resources. They justify the enormously hard work that is required to really make a difference. That vision has been the key to success for organizations ranging from Teach for America to the Institute for One World Health.
As Americans consider how to allocate their own hard-earned money for charity this holiday season, they should ask charities these questions: ? Is the organization committed to solving the problem rather than just salving it? ? Will it put resources into the community and is it willing to invest in its own capacity to scale up ideas that work? ? Do they have an economic model that is sustainable and will it endure until the problem actually is solved?
Seemingly intractable problems, like hunger and disease, get solved when someone challenges the very premise of the problem itself, and creates a solution that, until it exists, could not even be imagined. We often perceive our failures as failures of strategy, planning or financial support. But the greatest failures are always failures of imagination. Donors can help nonprofits overcome such failures with a willingness to invest not only in the small and steady steps forward but in the bold and high-risk efforts to achieve lasting change.
Shore is the founder of Share Our Strength and the author of "The Imagination of Unreasonable Men."

description.hltext_display: Rob Laird: Bears are who we thought they are, or are they?
description.content:
Like an on-again, off-again relationship, the Chicago Bears keep convincing fans to believe in them.
Even after securing a playoff berth with an NFC North-clinching rout over Minnesota on Monday, fans still aren't quite sure if they believe.
The Bears are only sometimes who we thought they could be.
It has been more than four years since former Arizona Cardinals coach Dennis Green curtly tossed what's become a famous dismissive of the then-unbeaten Bears: "The Bears are who we thought they were."
The Bears, of course, went on to represent the NFC in Super Bowl XLI that season, and fans used Green's catchphrase as a slogan throughout the season.
If that motto could be modernized for this year's Bears team, what would it be?
The Bears, at times, look like a team we want them to be?
This year's edition of the team has had as many ups and downs as a club can have. And theat doesn't take into account how remarkably healthy the Bears have been this season.
After a winless preseason in which the Bears looked like confused garbage, they opened the regular season like gangbusters. The offense clicked, and the undefeated Bears suddenly looked like one of the better teams in the NFL.
Fans thought: The Bears are better than we thought they'd be!
Then quarterback Jay Cutler got mugged in New Jersey by the New York Giants. Then the Bears lost to lowly Seattle. The season looked lost.
And the fans thought: The Bears are who we thought they were after the preseason.
That rollercoaster continued. The last two weeks have been a perfect summation of the topsy-turvy season.
In similar weather conditions, the Bears went from a hot team to being outschemed, outworked and outclassed in a blowout home loss at the hands of New England. Then they transformed to a crisp, dominant squad in a division-clinching rout over Minnesota.
Surely, there's no argument that the Patriots are a superior team to the Vikings. That would explain the differing outcomes. But a counterargument can also be made that Minnesota's defense (ranked sixth in the NFL in yards allowed per game entering Monday) is much better than New England's (ranked 28th).
For all the things of which we're not sure of concerning this team, there are a few things we know unequivocally. Julius Peppers is a one-man pass rush. The offensive line is serviceable if it is not asked to pass protect on every down, and the Brian Urlacher-Lance Briggs combo is having its best season since 2006.
And it's been reaffirmed that Devin Hester is a once-in-a-generation talent. He is criticized for not being the No. 1 wide receiver he was paid to be following the 2007 season.
However, that criticism is foolish. In his second year after that contract, he missed three games, but had more receiving yards and receptions than any other wide receiver on the team. That made him, by definition, a No. 1 receiver.
The blunder of taking special team duties off his plate had good intentions (it helped his development as a receiver), but has since been corrected. Hester is also often mocked for not being a savvy linguist, but that also does him a disservice. Coaches and teammates rave about his football IQ. You'll hear it if you actually listen to what he's saying. Hester is a special talent and needs 2-3 more seasons at his current level to begin discussions about the Hall of Fame.
But that may be the end point of the list of things we know about the Bears. Do we know exactly how good Cutler is? Is Matt Forte an elite running back, or just an average one with above-average hands? How good is Johnny Knox? Earl Bennett? Can the secondary handle a good pass offense?
To be honest, when the Bears broke training camp and sputtered through the preseason, we had no idea what we thought the Bears were going to be. Even with an NFC North title wrapped up, we still don't. So, in theory ...
The Bears are who we thought they were!
Rob Laird can be reached by e-mail at rlaird@daily-journal.com or by phone at 815-937-3390.

description.hltext_display: 05:22pmBHP drags market to positive close
description.content:
THE stock market has closed marginally higher on low trading volumes after gains by mining giant BHP Billiton offset weaker performances by the banks. The benchmark S&P/ASX200 index was up 6.5 points, or 0.14 per cent, at 4778.4 points, while the broader All Ordinaries index lifted 7.1 points, or 0.15 per cent, to 4869.6 points.
On the ASX 24 at 4.18pm AEDT, the March share price index futures contract was 10 points higher at 4776 points, with 12,169 contracts traded.
Austock Securities senior client adviser Michael Heffernan said the modest lift on the Australian bourse was a solid result but slightly disappointing given the positive US lead and rise in most commodities prices. "We haven't done too badly," Mr Heffernan said. "The turnover is light and is pretty much line ball with this time last year." Early preliminary national turnover was 1.94 billion shares, worth $3.52 billion.
Mr Heffernan said BHP Billiton kept the market's head above water, offsetting weaker performances by the banks.
BHP Billiton was up 40 cents, or 0.88 per cent, at $45.82 while Rio Tinto put on eight cents to $86.78.
Westpac was down 10 cents at $22.61, ANZ fell seven cents to $23.63, National Australia Bank was 16 cents cheaper at $24.05 and Commonwealth Bank backtracked 13 cents to $50.87.
The corporate regulator says it has begun legal proceedings against Commonwealth Bank, Bank of Queensland and Macquarie Group over the collapse of Storm Financial. Shares in Macquarie Group were up 22 cents at $37.22 while Bank of Queensland shares inched one cent higher to $10.54.
Telstra said its negotiations on the National Broadband Network with the Federal Government would take longer than it previously expected. Shares in the telco were steady at $2.77.
Fashion retailer Noni B said it expected net profit for the first half of 2010/11 to be down from the prior corresponding period after like-for-like store sales fell 2.5 per cent. Noni B shares shed seven cents, or 6.14 per cent, to $1.07.
Among other retail stocks, Woolworths put on nine cents to $26.80, Coles owner Wesfarmers gained 16 cents to $32.18 and JB Hi-Fi eased four cents to $17.85.
In the energy sector, Woodside was four cents softer at $42.78 and Santos gave up six cents to $13.56.
The spot price of gold in Sydney at 4.33pm AEDT was $US1388.70 per fine ounce, up $US2.47 from Tuesday's local close of $US1,386.23 per fine ounce. Gold producer Newcrest was 11 cents weaker at $40.23.
The best performing stock in the S&P/ASX 100 index was rare earths explorer Lynas Corporation after it said it had received approval from the Malawi government to acquire a rare earths resource for $US4 million ($4.02 million). Lynas shares finished up seven cents, or 4.4 per cent, at $1.66.
The worst performing stock on the S&P/ASX 100 index was online job ads company Seek, down 20 cents, or 2.96 per cent, at $6.56.
The top traded stock by volume was iron ore explorer Sundance Resources with 53.58 million shares worth $26.54 million changing hands. Sundance shares firmed one cent, or 2.06 per cent, to 49.5 cents.

description.hltext_display: First hotel in 30 years to open in Orléans
description.content:
Orléans councillor Bob Monette checks out new Best Western hotel in Orléans, currently under construction with Bahadur Shariff of Siljub Investments. (Photo by Tricia Van der Grient)
Published on December 21st, 2010
Orléans Star
After years of planning, the Best Western at the corner of St. Joseph Blvd. and Tenth Line Road is set to open sometime between mid-January and early February.
Topics :
Siljub Investments , Normandy Hotel , Business Development Bank of Canada , Orléans , Innes Road , Rockland
There has not been a hotel in the area since the Normandy Hotel was demolished in the early 1980s.
The 64-room, about 50,000-square-foot building is currently getting finishing touches, and Orléans city councillor Bob Monette says the new addition could help boost the local economy.
"When people come here for hockey tournaments, weddings, or other events, they have to stay as far as St. Laurent Blvd.," Monette explained. "When the hotel is finished, people will be able to stay in the area, go to local restaurants, and shop at Place d'Orléans. It's great for economic development."
The price tag of the hotel is put at $8 million, including land purchase costs. The hotel is equipped with an indoor saltwater pool, breakfast room, wireless Internet, a meeting/reception room for about 120 people and a fitness centre.
Monette's assistant Cynthia Lacroix will be using the facility for her summer wedding.
"It works out well for me," she said. "I love Orléans, and this way family can stay right in the area." On Dec. 16, she had the opportunity to check out some of the rooms still under renovation. "It seems like it will be really nice," she remarked.
The hotel is being built by Siljub Investments Ltd, backed by the Business Development Bank of Canada.
Bahadur Shariff, president of Siljub Investments, said they chose the location over the ever-expanding Innes Road based on its proximity to Highway 174 and a bus station within walking distance. Monette added the hotel could also serve nearby Rockland and it is also close to Petrie Island beach.
Shariff originally unveiled plans for a 70-room, $5.5-million Days Inn on the property in 2008, and explained the switch to partnering with Best Western was “clearly a business decision.”
The hotel has taken longer than anticipated to complete, partly due to the complicated demolition of a building on the property that contained asbestos. Siljub Investments started building the hotel in May 2009.
The city entered into a public-private partnership agreement in 2006, with Toronto-based Forum Equity Partners Inc. to develop the town centre area, which currently includes Place d'Orléans, the YM-YWCA (which is undergoing renovations), retail services and the former Cumberland town hall.
The first phase of the development, along with the already built Shenkman Arts Centre and the Best Western hotel, includes plans for a senior's residence and a condominium development. The project has run behind schedule. Promoters had initially envisioned an earlier date for the opening of the hotel when the deal was first announced in 2006.
In September Monette told the Orléans Star the Orléans town centre partnership received a two-year extension to complete the plans for Phase 1, citing "tough economic times."
A passport office is set to open in the New Year at 225 Centrum Boulevard and future plans for the area include more office buildings, apartment complexes and social assistance offices.

they chose the location over the ever-expanding Innes Road based on its proximity to Highway 174 and a bus station within walking distance

When people come here for hockey tournaments, weddings, or other events, they have to stay as far as St. Laurent Blvd.; When the hotel is finished, people will be able to stay in the area, go to local restaurants, and shop at Place d'Orlans. It's great f
the new addition could help boost the local economy

description.hltext_display: 2만5000가구에 전세 매물이 고작…
description.content:
'2만5,000가구 대규모 아파트촌에 전세 매물은 100개가 채 안 되네….'
지난 2008년 대규모 입주가 이뤄진 서울 잠실ㆍ신천동 일대 저밀도지구 재건축 아파트단지. 잠실동 레이크팰리스ㆍ엘스ㆍ트리지움ㆍ리센츠와 신천동 파크리오 등을 합치면 가구 수가 총 2만4,479개에 달해 웬만한 신도시급에 해당한다.
22일 서울경제신문이 이들 5개 아파트단지의 전세 매물을 직접 파악한 결과 매물 수가 다 합쳐 95개 정도에 불과한 것으로 나타났다.
입주가 가장 빨랐던 레이크팰리스의 경우 전체 2,678가구에 전세 매물은 10개 남짓했다. 그나마 대부분 중대형 매물로 중소형 아파트는 거의 없었다. 5,563가구 규모의 리센츠 역시 상황은 비슷했다. 이 지역 새잠실공인의 한 관계자는 공동중개거래망을 통해 단지 내 매물 상황을 파악해 본 후 "단지 전체를 통틀어도 전세 매물은 10개가 안 된다"고 말했다.
트리지움의 경우 상황은 더 심각했다. 3,696가구에 달하는 대단지임에도 불구하고 현재 나와 있는 전세매물이 5개라고 이 지역 중개업소들은 설명했다.
특히 트리지움은 입주 3년차여서 상대적으로 다른 단지에 비해 매물 부족이 심각한 것으로 나타났다. 이 지역 대원공인의 한 관계자는 "전세계약이 2년 단위로 이뤄지다 보니 당분간 매물 부족이 계속될 것"이라며 "입주 4년차가 되는 내년 8월에야 매물이 좀 나올 것 같다"고 말했다.
잠실엘스는 다른 단지에 비해 다소 여유가 있었다. 50개 정도의 매물이 나와 있고 여기에는 84㎡형의 중소형 매물도 7개 정도 포함돼 있다. 이 지역 JS공인 이혜영 사장은 "입주 시점이 인근 리센츠보다 2개월 정도 늦다 보니 물량에 아직 여유가 있다"며 "하지만 신학기 수요가 꾸준해 조만간 물량이 줄어들 것"으로 내다봤다.
잠실 4개 단지와 다소 거리가 있는 신천동 파크리오는 총 6,864가구로 잠실 저밀도지구 새 아파트 중 가장 규모가 크다. 그래도 현재 이 단지에 나와 있는 매물은 20개 남짓. 이곳 하나파크리오공인의 한 관계자는 "8~9월 사이 전세 거래가 집중적으로 이뤄진 후 올해 말 들어서는 조금 소강 상태"라며 "매물도 늘지 않고 수요자의 발길도 잦아진 것 같다"고 전했다.
잠실 아파트 단지는 입지에 큰 차이가 없는 탓에 전세 시세도 단지별로 큰 차이가 없다. 109㎡형이 4억5,000만~4억7,000만원에 달한다. 1년 전에 비해 1억5,000만원 이상 오른 가격이다. 파크리오의 경우만 같은 주택형이 4억1,000만원선으로 다른 잠실 단지보다 다소 낮게 형성돼 있다.
이처럼 대규모 아파트 단지마저 매물 품귀현상을 빚는 가장 큰 이유는 세입자 순환이 이뤄지지 않고 있기 때문이라고 이 일대 중개업소들은 분석했다. 교육여건이나 교통 등 생활여건이 워낙 잘 갖춰진 곳이다 보니 기존 세입자들이 보증금을 올려주더라도 대부분 재계약을 하기 때문이라는 것이다.
이 지역 LG공인 박민규 사장은 "전셋값이 입주 당시보다 2배나 뛰었지만 대출을 받아서라도 재계약하는 세입자가 많다"며 "일부 세입자는 보증금 일부를 월세로 전환해서라도 계속 거주하려는 경우도 있다"고 말했다.
저금리 탓에 기존 전세를 월세로 바꾸려는 집주인이 늘어난 것도 매물 부족의 원인으로 꼽힌다. 리센츠의 경우 전세 매물은 10개 정도지만 월세 매물은 50개 정도로 다소 여유가 있다. 109㎡형은 보증금 1억원에 월세 160만~170만원선에 매물이 나와 있다.

description.hltext_display: Democracy and the Palace of Europe
description.author: Ron Fraser
description.content:
Strasbourg, FranceIt seems incongruous. Why would the lead institution of a democratic federation of nations intent on doing away with the nation-state need a palace? Is not such a building symbolic of a kingdom or an empire? Yet the Council of Europe, comprising a collective of 47 democratic nation-states, is ensconced in a building called The Palace of Europe. Well, there is an interesting story attached to just what that palace symbolizes. Founded on May 5, 1949, by the Treaty of London, the initial Council comprised the constitutional monarchies of the United Kingdom, Belgium, Denmark, Netherlands, Norway and Sweden, the republics of France, Ireland and Italy and the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg. Within the complex web of institutions that comprise the project of uniting Europe, in the words of Jean-Claude Juncker, prime minister of Luxembourg and president of the EUs Eurogroup, the Council of Europe and the European Union are partnersdifferent but complementary organizations. Any nation that aspires to European membership must first become a member of the Council of Europe, though the EU itself is not a member per se of the Councilif you can figure that out. In a report on relations between the Council of Europe and the EU, Juncker recommended that the EU accede to Council membership. To this the EU has yet to agree.
The European project is by its nature a complex and confusing entity, born of machinery that deliberately and regularly produces treaties and subsequent regulations couched in language barely understandable to the average intelligent human being. So much of the murk behind which European elites hide their true intentions is masked by a facade of democracy, which effectively hides its very undemocratic nature. Thus it is no surprise to see at the entrance to the Palace of Europe, home of the Council of Europe, in huge block letters the caption, Home of Democracy. No greater lie was ever told.
As the best of analysts have constantly observed, the European Union is the very antithesis of democracy. Governments of its member nations have either deliberately denied their constituents referenda on key decisions (witness Britain) or, as in the case of Ireland, have not accepted the outcome of referenda as legitimate. The EU has then propagandized the people with a blitz of deceit designed to change their minds to vote against their true feelings and for the EUs unbending undemocratic designs. Major decisions resulting in the diminution of national sovereignty are taken by EU mandarins without any thought of reference to the people the EU hierarchy supposedly represents.
Standing in the front of this Palace of Europe on an intensely snowy day in Strasbourg, one cannot but feel that the chill wind of deceit that has blown constantly across the whole European Union project from its very beginnings is rapidly reaching a point where the blindness to its true undemocratic nature is so close to achieving its aim: the aim of dragging the masses, against their will, into the maw of a grand tyranny. A tyranny of a nature that has an all-too-familiar Holy Roman ring to it. For the true story behind the Palace of Europe is that it is not symbolic of the home of democracy at all. It is, rather, a grand mask behind which the project to resurrect the seventh and final formulation of that old and very bloody imperialist regime, the Holy Roman Empire, currently hides.
But the mask is increasingly dropping, revealing the real nature of this political beast. As the current euro crisis continues to develop, affecting not just the 27 member nations of the EU but the entirety of the 47 member nations of the Council of Europe, the true intentions of its elites are emerging. From 1950, the Council of Europes action became reality with the adoption of an international treaty of an unprecedented importance, the Convention for the Protection of Human Rights and Fundamental Freedoms, called European Convention on Human Rights. This convention defines the rights and freedoms that all signatories states promise to guarantee to individuals under their jurisdiction, from the right to life and freedom of expression, to the prohibition of torture and discrimination. Sounds good, doesnt it? Well, yes, till one discovers the true intent behind new EU legislation. It is actually designed to actively deny the individual such rights and freedoms. It does so by the imposition of draconian measures to extradite and incarcerate civilians of not only EU member nations, but even foreign nationals hailing from non-EU member countries, in EU jails without recourse to legal representation and hold them at the EUs pleasure. Such is the power of the newly enacted European Arrest Warrant. This is Holy Roman jurisprudence in action at its very worst. In fact, it entrenches the horror of Roman inquisitorial lawwhich holds an individual as guilty till proven innocentover and above the tradition of English law, being founded on the binding principle of innocent until proven guilty. Far from the Palace of Europe being the home of democracy, it is an infamous monument to the very worst of Holy Roman imperial practicesthe evil of the holy inquisition. Never was there such an edict contemplated by this most undemocratic of imperialist institutions, the European Union, that so exposed it as a literal resurrection of the Holy Roman Empire than this latest move by its Teutonic Roman Catholic elites.
Home of democracy, my foot!
Palace of tyranny would be more apt! Read our expos� of this latest hugely undemocratic move by the EU in tomorrows analysis, written from the country that mothered the principle of habeas corpus, Great Britain.

description.hltext_display: UPDATE 1-ACS's Hochtief stake creeps closer to 30 pct target
description.content:
* ACS says was tendered 5,825 Hochtief shares by Dec. 21
* Says voting rights total 27.26 percent
* ACS's offer for Hochtief runs through Dec. 29
(Adds details, background)
FRANKFURT, Dec 22 (Reuters) - ACS said Hochtief shareholders had tendered fewer than 6,000 shares by Tuesday, still leaving it short of its 30 percent stake target a week before the end of the offer period.
The Spanish construction group had a total 27.26 percent of voting rights in Hochtief, Germany's biggest builder, ACS said in a statement on its website on Wednesday.
ACS wants control of Hochtief without having to buy all of the company's shares, so it made a low all-shares offer for the company to avoid a deluge of shares tendered. The offer period ends on Dec. 29.
Southeastern Asset Management, a shareholder in both ACS and Hochtief, is expected to tender shares representing about 2.5 percent of Hochtief to ACS. (Reporting by Maria Sheahan; editing by Alexander Smith)

description.hltext_display: 央行拟建立新信贷管理体制 可能不再定信贷目标
description.content:
消息人士透露，央行近期召集主要银行开会，讨论信贷管理体制改革事宜。央行在会上表示，拟建立新的信贷管理体制，根据经济增长速度确定信贷投放速度，资本充足率等指标将纳入考量范围。
业内人士指出，央行近期酝酿信贷管理体制改革，意在将信贷管理方式从行政管制向综合运用市场化调控手段转变。如果该举措得以实施，意味着央行可能不再设定信贷目标，而是根据各家银行的资本充足率、流动性比率、动态拨备率、存贷比指标来指导信贷投放。窗口指导、差别存款准备金率、定向央票等工具的使用将更加频繁。
但消息人士表示，在建立新的信贷管理体制方面还存在一些争议，目前没有明确定论。
分析人士表示，由于涉及资本充足率等监管指标，改革信贷管理体制意味着信贷额度将由央行制定转变为央行与银监会共同制定。
信贷管理体制改革与利率市场化密切相关。央行行长周小川日前表示，“十二五”期间，在推进利率市场化方面将取得明显进展。首先将选择有硬约束的金融机构放开其定价权，“硬约束”包含符合宏观审慎性监管框架的资本充足率、资本质量等要求。
业内人士表示，近日银行间市场推出了中国版CDS―――信用风险缓释合约(CRM)，由于持有贷款的商业银行可以通过向其他机构购买信用风险缓释合约来实现信用风险转移，理论上银行可以通过购买合约减少银行风险资产权重，进而提高资本充足率，扩大信贷投放规模。银监会可能会尽快研究制定相关规则，对商业银行能否通过购买CRM实现信用风险转移作出认定。

description.hltext_display: 典当行试水奢侈品业务
description.content:
随着同行数量的增多和外部类似业务的冲击，典当行的生意变得越来越难做。为了扩大业务量，近年来，一些典当行努力拓展民品典当业务，逐渐将名包、裘皮、金笔等保值功能较强的奢侈品纳入业务范畴，客观上也为市民拓宽了融资渠道。不过，记者采访发现，近期在北京、上海等地典当行成为新宠的高端白酒，仍然没能进入我市典当行的视野。奢侈品成典当行新宠
多年来，为了拓宽自己的生存空间，我市典当行业一直致力于拓展民品典当业务，但在典当业务已经由“救穷”变为“救急”的年代，除了房产、汽车和传统的珠宝首饰以外，适合用来典当的民品似乎并不多。直到去年，在南方同行的启发下，我市一些典当行才开始尝试一个颇具潜力的品类——奢侈品。
“因为具有较强的保值、增值功能，奢侈品具有作为典当品的‘天然属性’”，大连光普典当行总经理李成斌告诉记者，“在港澳地区和内地‘北上广’等奢侈品消费发达的城市，名贵皮包、金笔、裘皮、名牌打火机等奢侈品早在几年前就已经进入典当行了。我们之所以现在才跟进，也是因为大连的奢侈品市场近几年才逐渐发展成熟。”虽然进入较晚，但从近年来大连奢侈品市场消费的高增长情况来看，包括典当在内的二手奢侈品市场也必将逐渐走向繁荣。正是基于这样的判断，李成斌和他的同行对奢侈品典当业务的前景充满信心。
当然，由于受众较少，且缺乏宣传，目前，奢侈品典当业务在我市仍不多见；而通过典当行来“淘”二手奢侈品的市民，更是少之又少。 ]高端白酒业务仍为空白
近年来，茅台、五粮液等高端白酒屡屡传出涨价的消息，且越涨越缺，供不应求。看中了这些高端白酒的保值、增值功能，近期，北京、上海等地不少典当行开始尝试高端白酒业务，且引来了不少顾客。我市典当行是否也开展了此类业务呢？
近日，记者走访天信、银信、光普等市内各大典当行获悉，截至目前，我市尚无一家典当行开展高端白酒业务。“烟酒我们都是不碰的，因为假的太多，又不能开瓶去验，风险很大，而且不好脱手。”谈起个中缘由，这些典当行的工作人员的答复都高度一致。此外，也有业内人士表示，不做高端白酒业务，还和我市典当行大多规模较小，资金不足，业务饱和有关。“虽然有个别典当行资金比较充裕，但关注点往往都在房产和汽车上，也没有多少闲钱来做白酒。”
不过，也有典当行表示，如果今后条件具备，也不排除会尝试着开展高端白酒业务；但在此之前，必须先派人学会通过外观鉴别白酒真假的技术。 ]典当行业务稳定系数高
近几年来，国际国内的经济形势一直处在不断变化之中，典当行的业务是否也会跟着起伏呢？事实并非如此。
“2008年下半年爆发了金融危机，2009年下半年经济开始回暖，2010年通货膨胀预期较高，但这些都没有影响到典当行的业务。”李成斌介绍，典当行可能要算当今稳定系数最高的行业之一。“今年金价涨得很猛，很多人以为典当行的黄金典当业务会特别火，但其实和往年差不多。”究其原因，李成斌分析说，还是因为我国的市场经济越来越成熟，交易和融资的渠道都越来越多。“现在市民来典当行当东西，一般都是为了换点钱急用，绝当的很少，因为和二手市场相比，典当行并不是卖东西的最佳选择。”
当然，典当行之所以还能存在并发展下去，是因为它仍然有自身的优势。“在短期快速融资方面，典当行仍然是最好的选择之一”，一位业内人士表示。此外，典当行也是市民淘宝的一个绝佳去处。

description.hltext_display: Kraftiga tågförseningar väntas
description.author: expressen@expressen.se
description.content: Tågstrulet fortsätter. I dag väntas i tågtrafiken på Västkustbanan drabbas av kraftiga förseningar.På grund av växelfel kommer tågen på sträckorna HalmstadGöteborg och HalmstadMalmö, det vill säga Västkustbanan, att drabbas av kraftiga förseningar. Även på sträckan CharlottenbergLaxå är det problem med tågväxlar vilket orsakar störningar.

description.hltext_display: Tusina hakijaa Kiikoisten kunnansihteeriksi
description.content:
Kiikoisten kunnansihteerin virka kiinnosti 12 hakijaa. Kunnanhallituksen nimeämä työryhmä valitsi virkaa hakeneista kolme jatkoon: hallintotieteiden maisteri Juha-Pekka Mannila, filosofian maisteri Tommi Ruokonen ja hallintotieteiden maisteri Henna Vuorenmaa. Heitä haastatellaan ensi viikolla.
Kiikoisten kunnanhallitus valitsee uuden kunnansihteerin 10. tammikuuta pidettävässä kokouksessaan. YLE Satakunta

description.hltext_display: ECB Calls For Bids In 14-Day US$ Liquidity Providing Operation
description.author: mnieditor
description.content:
FRANKFURT (MNI) - The European Central Bank said Wednesday that it will launch a 14-day liquidity providing operation to ease pressures in the short-term U.S. dollar funding markets.
The operation is carried out at a fixed rate of 1.17% with the central bank planing to satisfy all bids received against eligible collateral. The minimum bid is $5 million. The Euro/USD rate is set at 1.3133.
Bids for today's operation are due by 8:45 GMT today. Tender results will be announced at 10:00 GMT.
read more

description.hltext_display: 글로벌 PC업체 "한국스마트폰 시장 잡아라"
description.content:
국내 스마트폰 시장이 폭발적인 성장세를 거듭하면서 글로벌 PC업체들이 속속 국내 스마트폰 시장에 뛰어들고 있다. 세계 3위 PC업체 델은 22일 스마트폰 신제품 '스트릭'과 '베뉴'를 KT를 통해 출시하고 본격적인 판매에 나섰다.
스트릭은 델이 스마트폰 시장 공략을 위해 지난 6월 영국에 첫선을 보인 제품으로, 5인치 화면에 500만 화소 카메라, 16기가바이트(GB) 용량의 내장메모리를 갖췄다. 세계 최초로 국내시장에 출시되는 베뉴는 4.1인치 액정화면에 800만 화소 카메라를 탑재했으며 16GB 내장메모리를 기본으로 제공한다. 두 제품 모두 구글 안드로이드 2.2 운영체제(OS)와 퀄컴의 1GHz 프로세서를 장착했다.
델에 이어 세계 1위 PC업체 HP도 국내시장에 진출할 채비를 서두르고 있다. HP는 올 4월 모바일 전문업체 팜을 12억달러에 인수하며 스마트폰 시장에 뛰어들었다. 업계에서는 HP가 팜의 웹OS 운영체제를 탑재한 소형 스마트폰 '픽시2'를 내년 초에 출시할 것으로 내다보고 있다.
HP는 스마트폰과 별도로 태블릿PC 출시도 검토 중이다. HP는 지난 10월 마이크로소프트의 윈도7 운영체제를 탑재한 태블릿PC '슬레이트500'을 799달러에 출시하며 태블릿PC 공략에도 본격적으로 나서고 있다. 특히 지난해에는 KT와 손잡고 교육부가 추진 중인 디지털교과서 구축사업의 태블릿PC 공급업체로 선정된 바 있어 국내시장에 KT를 통해 진출할 가능성이 높다.
대만 PC업체 아수스도 국내시장 진출을 검토하고 있는 것으로 알려졌다. 아수스는 그 동안 노트북PC와 PC 부품 등에 주력해왔으나 지난해 3월 윈도모바일 운영체제를 탑재한 스마트폰을 출시하며 휴대폰 시장에 진출했다. 최근에는 안드로이드 탑재 스마트폰을 출시한 데 이어 삼성전자, LG전자, HTC, 델과 함께 윈도폰7 스마트폰을 생산하는 5개 업체에 선정되는 등 스마트폰 시장 공략에 박차를 가하고 있다.
글로벌 PC업체들이 잇따라 스마트폰 시장에 뛰어드는 것은 스마트폰과 태블릿PC 시장이 급격하게 확대되면서 향후 노트북PC 시장을 크게 잠식할 전망되기 때문이다. 시장조사업체 IDC에 따르면 올해 세계 넷북(미니노트북) 시장이 지난해보다 10.3% 늘어난 3,780만대에 달할 것으로 예상된다. 하지만 애플 아이패드와 삼성전자 갤럭시탭 등 태블릿PC가 본격적으로 보급되면서 향후 4년 동안 연평균 성장률 4.3%을 기록하는 데 그칠 전망이다.
업계의 한 관계자는 "국내 스마트폰 시장이 내년에 2배 이상 성장할 것으로 전망되면서 글로벌 PC업체들의 국내시장 진출이 가시화되고 있다"며 "하지만 국산 스마트폰의 경쟁력이 상당하기 때문에 시장점유율보다 브랜드 인지도를 높이는 데 주력할 것으로 보인다"고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: V Sobranciach napadli a zbili takmer 100-ročnú ženu!
description.content:
BRATISLAVA/KOŠICE - Mimoriadnu necitlivosť ukázal včera nadránom neznámy muž v Sobranciach. Vykopol dvere do rodinného domu a napadol v ňom starenku (96)! Udrel ju päsťou do tváre, až spadla na zem, kde zostala ležať. Potom obrátil pozornosť na jej dcéru (64).
S "ostrým predmetom v ruke," od nej chcel peniaze. Vydesená žena mu dala 30 eur, mobil aj rôzne potraviny. Potom muž ušiel.
Starenka sa bude liečiť asi mesiac, informovala košická policajná hovorkyňa Jana Demjanovičová. Policajti začali trestné stíhanie za lúpež, porušovanie domovej slobody aj ublíženie na zdraví.
Zdroj: TAB, PZ, Foto: Profimedia.sk,
Kontextové reklamné odkazy
Súvisiace články
Sobrančan (13) vykradol kníhkupectvo, po knihách nešiel
21.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/KOŠICE - Láska k literatúre pravdepodobne nebola dôvodom, prečo sa mladý Ján vlámal do kníhkupectva v Sobranciach. Na začiatku mesiaca kameňom rozbil sklenenú výplň na vchodových dverách a dostal sa dnu.
Lupič, ktorý strelil zamestnankyňu banky, polícii uniká
19.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Neznámeho muža, ktorý pred vyše mesiacom oblečený v rifliach a tmavej mikine s kapucňou a v kukle vylúpil pobočku banky v bratislavskej Dúbravke, polícia stále nechytila. Po incidente skončila so strelným poranením zamestnankyňa banky.
VIDEO Černošským lupičom bol poľský emigrant!
16.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/VARŠAVA – Polícia v americkom štáte Ohio pátrala po černošskom lupičovi, ktorý prepadol päť bánk a lekáreň. Až po dlhšom čase zistili, že lupičom nebol černoch, ale že ich dokonale zmiatol mladý poľský emigrant Konrad Zdzierak v profesionálnej maske. Tá bola natoľko hodnoverná, že za černocha označili lupiča nielen svedkovia, ale aj samotné obete. O prípade informovala poľská televízia TVN24.
FOTO Poznáte lupiča? Zo zmiešaného tovaru si odniesol 1150 eur
14.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/ŽILINA – Zo zmiešaného tovaru v Tepličke nad Váhom v okrese Žilina si lupič v bielom odniesol 1150 eur. Polícia po jeho totožnosti pátra a poskytla jeho fotografiu. K udalosti došlo podľa polície ešte „začiatkom decembra vo večerných hodinách.“
FOTO Pri požiari sa žena (80) udusila v kuchyni
09.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Pri požiari rodinného domu v obci Malý Lipník, okr. Stará Ľubovňa sa udusila v stredu jeho majiteľka. Z doposiaľ nezistených príčin začala od plynového sporáka horieť stena za sporákom a drevená skrinka na topánky.
FOTO Uviaznutý Slovák na Heathrowe: Spacák a nechutný sendič!
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/LONDÝN – Pasažieri na európskych letiskách stále zažívajú pravé peklo. Hoci londýnsky Heathrow v utorok večer informoval o sprevádzkovaní ďalšej dráhy, mnohým cestujúcim to nie je nič platné. Tí, ktorí stále dúfajú, že na Vianoce sa im podarí dostať domov, bude postihovať meškanie a rušenie letov ešte niekoľko dní, napísal Reuters.
Elza z Kráľ. Chlmca prišla na úrad práce so sekerou
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/KOŠICE - Mimoriadne nespokojná s ponukou zamestnaní musela byť Elza (48) z Kráľovského Chlmca na východnom Slovensku. So sekerou v ruke prišla na úrad práce a vyhrážala sa, že pracovníkov pozabíja.
Muž sa chcel obesiť v bratislavskej novostavbe
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Samovraha sa dnes v noci pokúšali zachraňovať zdravotníci aj policajná hliadka. Stál na stoličke na poschodí v jednej z bratislavských novostavieb a okolo krku mal slučku. Privolaní zdravotníci sa s mužom snažili komunikovať a upokojiť ho.
Otec so synom sa na "vianočný nákup" vybrali s tyčou
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/NITRA - Pre rodinnú predvianočnú krádež sa počas pondelňajšej noci rozhodli v Palárikove otec (51) so synom (21). Starší s tyčou vypáčil vchodové dvere do predajne a spolu s potomkom začali vyberať "darčeky."
Muž so sekerou vyčíňal v Banskej Štiavnici
22.12.2010
BANSKÁ ŠTIAVNICA - Zranenie jedného muža a jednej ženy si vyžiadalo vyčíňanie muža so sekerou v utorok podvečer v Banskej Štiavnici.
Markíza dostala za Superstar pokutu 10 tisíc
21.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Spoločnosti Markíza - Slovakia spol. s.r.o. udelila dnes licenčná rada pokutu 10-tisíc eur. Ako informoval riaditeľ kancelárie Rady pre vysielanie a retransmisiu (RVR) Ľuboš Kukliš, rada opätovne potvrdila pokutu, ale po vrátení z Najvyššieho súdu SR ju znížila z pôvodných 20-tisíc eur na polovicu.
Nagy podal trestné oznámenie na vedenie Interblue
21.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Minister životného prostredia József Nagy dnes na prokuratúre podal v súvislosti s kauzou emisií trestné oznámenie na predstaviteľov americkej spoločnosti Interblue Group bez určenia konkrétnych mien. Dôvodom sú podozrenia z podvodu.
Mladík z Topoľčian vylákal od ženy takmer 30 tisíc
21.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Policajný vyšetrovateľ z Partizánskeho obvinil v pondelok 20. decembra zo zločinu podvodu 24-ročného muža z Topoľčian.

description.hltext_display: 大连公安汇报颁奖大会重举行
description.content:
图片说明：部分获奖人员。李传报摄
主持人访问立功英雄。天健网实习生丁一/摄
现场观众感动流泪。天健网实习生丁一/摄
公安表彰大会现场。天健网实习生丁一/摄
（翟超 于溟 王树霖）昨日下午，2010大连公安汇报颁奖大会在世博广场隆重举行。省委常委、市委书记夏德仁出席并讲话，市委副书记、市长李万才，副市长、市公安局局长王立科参加大会。
市公安局老领导和党组成员出席了在大连世界博览广场举行的这场汇报颁奖大会。这场别开生面的汇报颁奖大会在我市率先采用视频技术、舞台艺术和电视访谈综合创新形式，激起了现场2800名公安先进集体、先进个人和民警代表的强烈共鸣。汇报颁奖大会的主题是“平安，与你同行”。一部部真实生动的专题片，同与会者一起回眸大连公安2010年的不平凡历程。
夏德仁首先代表市委、市政府对大连公安战线一年来取得的成绩表示热烈祝贺，对全市公安干警表示亲切的慰问和衷心的感谢。他说，过去的一年，大连的经济发展和城市发展取得了令人瞩目的成就，这背后有很多无名的英雄，特别是公安战线上的广大干警付出了辛勤的劳动和汗水，甚至鲜血和生命。
夏德仁指出，明年是“十二五”开局之年，也是大连实现科学发展新跨越的关键之年。希望大连公安保持和发扬优良作风，再接再厉，艰苦奋斗，继续做好维护社会稳定、维护社会治安的各项工作，为建设和谐大连、建设平安大连、建设富裕文明的大连作出新的更大的贡献。
汇报颁奖会上，视频短片对13位来自公安基层的代表性人物做了生动介绍；被公安部追授“全国公安系统二级英雄模范”称号的金州分局原副局长金守鹏身患绝症依然热爱工作、热爱生活，感人的事迹通过她女儿的日记视频展现，让与会者潸然泪下；200多名民警在舞台上以诗画歌舞组合的艺术形式，展示了大连公安的团队形象和精神面貌。
2010年是大连历史上不平凡的一年。在市委、市政府的坚强领导下，在社会各界和广大人民群众的大力支持下，公安部门不辱使命，创新发展，取得可喜成果，为全市发展和稳定作出了突出贡献。在“7·16”大连新港输油管道起火爆炸事件中，消防官兵、公安干警全力以赴，连续奋战，创造了中国消防史上的奇迹，确保了人民和城市的平安；全市公安机关率先把打击锋芒直指了严重影响人民群众安全的各类刑事犯罪，持续开展了一系列专项行动，净化了我市的社会治安环境；作为2010年市委、市政府为民办的15件实事之一，市公安局全力组建推进专职社区巡逻队伍，不断增强人民群众的安全感；公安机关与社会各界积极互动，接受监督，听取意见，不断探索创新公安管理模式，提升服务民生、服务经济社会发展的能力；全面实施推进公安信息化建设和执法规范化建设，使公安工作再上新台阶。
“平安，我爱你，你是我一生奋斗的意义；平安，祝福你，我和你永远在一起！”在汇报颁奖大会主题歌《平安，祝福你》深情的歌声中，夏德仁、李万才、王立科等市领导走上舞台，与获奖和参演的公安干警热情握手。

description.hltext_display: PC tops Sacred Heart, gears up for Big East
description.author: PETER GOBIS SUN CHRONICLE STAFF
description.content:
PROVIDENCE - The Providence College Friars had better relish victory No. 11 of the season, a hard-taken 84-76 victory over the Pioneers of Sacred Heart Tuesday night at the Dunk.Because W's won't be as plentiful when the Big East season begins next week.
"I'll take 11 wins every year going into the conference, that's a big number," said PC coach Keno Davis. "For the most part, we had pretty good intensity, we're a team that leaves it all out on the court."Playing with four guards virtually the entire second half to combat the Pioneers' quickness and strength in the backcourt, the Friars shot 52 percent from the floor (13-for-25) over the final 20 minutes and got to the free-throw line 31 times.Senior forward Marshon Brooks notched his sixth double-double of the season with 25 points and 12 rebounds to go along with five assists (and six of PC's 19 turnovers). Sophomore guard Vincent Council had 16 points and five assists (along with seven turnovers), while center Bilal Dixon had 11 points."This was a trap game," said PC forward Kadeem Batts (nine points, seven rebounds) of the Friars coming off of a 10-day exam break and against a Sacred Heart team (4-8) which lost seven of its first eight games.After a three-point play by Batts and Duke Mondy scoring on a fast break, PC had a 12-point (65-53) lead with eight minutes left. But twice the Pioneers converted PC turnovers (19 overall) into layups, narrowing the gap to 73-70 with 4:34 to go; and converted an offensive rebound and another fast break, closing the Friar lead to 77-74 with 1:07 left."We should have defended the three (seven made by the Pioneers) better and they beat our pressure," said Brooks of the Pioneers scoring 38 points in the paint. "They had numbers, that's where most of the layups came from, and they hit shots."Fortunately for the Friars, a steal by Council had his two free throws gave PC an 81-74 lead, then a Mondy steal and a Council free throw with 18 seconds to go sealed the deal."We had matchup problems against them," added Davis, Sacred Heart guard Shane Gibson (26 points, hitting six 3-pointers). "They executed their game plan, to be patient with the ball. In the second half, even with a four-guard lineup, it was still a tough matchup."The Friars and Pioneers battled through three ties and six lead changes during a first half in which Sacred Heart scored 41 points, scored 16 points in the paint and hit five 3-point field goals - all factors which did not bode well for the Friars.Brooks scored 19 points (on 7-for-9 shooting) for PC, which had its largest lead at eight points (27-19). However, the Friars missed seven free throws, scored just nine points off of eight offensive rebounds and just eight points off of 10 Pioneer turnovers."The pace of the game was important for us," said Davis, the Friars extending defensive pressure during the second half, forcing a faster tempo." The Friars outscored the Pioneers 20-3 at the free-throw line and scored 44 points in the paint, fetching 37 rebounds."We have to understand that as a team we have some talent," continued Davis. "We have to play as a team without much size, without much experience. We're a much improved defensive team. I give our guys credit."- While the Friars are allowing foes to shoot just an average of 40 percent from the floor and allow just 67.5 points per game, that latter figure is the second worst in the Big East as four schools - Cincinnati at 54.2, Louisville, Syracuse and Rutgers - are all allowing less than 60 points a game Big East schools have a combined 137-33 record thus far, 100-7 at home Six of the Friar foes this season have RPI rankings of over 230, with only BC (a loss) and URI (a win) being inside the top 100 The Friars open their Big East season Tuesday at Syracuse and have their home Big East opener New Year's night against St. John's The Friars are not shooting the 3-pointer very well, just at .311 percent, the fourth worst in the Big East, while also having the second most (244) attempts.

event_or_fact.property: We should have defended the three (seven made by the Pioneers) better and they beat our pressure; They had numbers, that's where most of the layups came from, and they hit shots.

description.hltext_display: Abuccima May Lose $10 Million Furniture Investment
description.content:
Abuja Members of the Abuja Chambers of Commerce, Industry, Mines and Agriculture (ABUCCIMA) are scared stiff over the possibility of losing a whopping $10 million invested in furniture business.
The president of the chamber, Barrister Dele Oye, expressed the fear weekend, when he said at the chamber's 20th Annual General Meeting that some members of ABUCCIMA had invested $10 million in furniture manufacturing before the federal government recently flung the gate open for foreign goods to come into the country, including furniture.
Oye, who blammed the government for paying mere lip service to the buy made-in -Nigeria goods campaign, said members of the chambers who had invested the said amount in furniture making may lose such investment, as the locally manufactured furniture may not be able to compete with their foreign equivalents.
He said there was need to sustain and protect the businesses of local producers even as the nation's borders had been opened for foreign goods to come in. Oye, however, added that the tariffs paid by foreign importers be made available to local manufacturers so as to cushion the effects arising from the competition.
"Sustenance of local producers is very necessary as Nigerian borders are now opened to foreign goods. That is, tariffs charged on in coming goods should be given to local producers.
"We have to have a proactive approach. Our members have invested about $10million into the furniture business, and there must be policies in place to deal with the effects.
"Local producers should be able to invest in new machinery and research.
"Local production is the only way out, for in case there is war, the foreign producers will refuse to supply goods," Oye stated.

description.hltext_display: 中国国新控股有限责任公司定于今日挂牌
description.content:
据悉，宝钢集团原董事长谢企华将出任国新公司的董事长，现任国有重点大型企业监事会主席刘东生将担任总经理。
这个被国资委副主任邵宁称之为“国资委的一个可以信赖与依靠的推手”的国有资本运作平台正式诞生，并且进入运营，将使得央企重组进一步加速。
从定位来看，国资委前主任李荣融曾多次表示，“国新公司主要职责是加快央企整合和调整国资产业布局，将纳入一些规模较小、微利、效益差、应退出市场的央企。”
国资委研究中心企业改革与发展研究部部长王志刚认为，国家将在军工、煤炭、电网电力、民航、航运、电信、石油石化等七大行业保持国有经济的绝对控制力，所以七大行业以外的行业被并入国新公司的概率更大。“主要是一些科研院所、贸易类央企和其他一些效益差、规模小的央企。”王志刚说。
数据显示，到目前为止，国资委监管的央企户数仍有123家，离此前确定的到2010年年底减至80至100户的目标还有一段距离。
值得注意的是，国新公司之前已经公开亮相，但并不是因为重组弱小央企，而是现身五矿系的整合当中。
国新公司持股五矿股份，业内认为是为了助推五矿整体上市，也是国资委探索通过国资经营公司持股的开始。国资委副主任邵宁上个月曾表示，国有企业改革的最终目标就是把大型国企打造成一个干干净净的上市公司。“以后要逐步把包袱消化掉，之后再把集团公司去掉，只保留中间做主营业务的上市公司，完全按照资本市场的要求进行运营。”邵宁说。

description.hltext_display: 부장급에 1억4000만원 연봉 주는 회사
description.content:
'신입사원 4,000만원, 부장급 1억4,000만원' 이랜드가 직원 연봉을 업계 최고 수준으로 끌어올리기로 했다. 또한 해마다 순이익의 10%를 별도 적립해 정년 퇴직한 직원들에게 지급키로 했다. 이랜드 그룹은 이같은 내용을 담은 '신 (New)보상제도'를 내년 3월부터 실시한다고 22일 밝혔다.
이 제도에 따르면 이랜드는 매년 순이익의 10%를 적립해 직원의 은퇴 이후를 보장해주는 가칭 '은퇴기금'을 조성할 예정이다. 이 기금은 정년을 맞은 직원에게 퇴직금과 별도로 과장급 이상 임직원 중에서 기여도에 따라 차등 지급된다.
이랜드 관계자는 "'은퇴기금'은 30년간 회사의 성장을 함께 해온 임직원들과 기업 성장의 과실을 나누자는 취지"라며 "10% 사회환원에 이어 이번엔 직원들에게 이익의 일부를 돌리겠다는 최고경영자의 나눔경영 철학의 완결판인 셈"이라고 말했다.
이랜드는 또 기본급 인상과 함께 성과급을 확대하고 개인의 인사고과와 급여를 연계시킨 '업적급' 개념을 새로 도입키로 했다. 업적급은 경영실적에 따라 지급여부가 불확실한 연말 성과급과 달리 기본 급여의 17%까지 격월 확정 지급하는 것이 특징이다. 이에 따라 이랜드의 임금 수준은 현재보다 최고 50%까지 높아질 전망이다.
올해 하반기 공채로 입사한 신입사원은 내년부터 현행보다 25% 인상된 4,000만원의 연봉을 받게 되고, 과장과 부장은 모든 성과급을 받을 경우 최고 8,500만원, 부장급은 1억 4,000 만원까지 연봉을 받게 된다. 한편, 이랜드그룹은 올해 총 매출이 7조를 넘어섰고, 영업이익 5,000억을 돌파하는 등 창사 이래 최고의 실적을 거뒀다.

description.hltext_display: Elza z Kráľ. Chlmca prišla na úrad práce so sekerou
description.content:
BRATISLAVA/KOŠICE - Mimoriadne nespokojná s ponukou zamestnaní musela byť Elza (48) z Kráľovského Chlmca na východnom Slovensku. So sekerou v ruke prišla na úrad práce a vyhrážala sa, že pracovníkov pozabíja.
"Snažila sa pootvárať uzamknuté dvere na kanceláriách, čo sa jej nepodarilo," informovala Jana Demjanovičová z košickej polície.
Vystrašení zamestnanci úradu sa báli o život a zavolali hliadku. Žena skončila v cele.
Zdroj: TAB, PZ, Foto: 123rf.com,

Súvisiace články

BRATISLAVA/KOŠICE - K vážnemu konfliktu došlo v záhradkárskej oblasti Pašeky v Sobranciach. Rudolf (33) z Michaloviec koncom júla pri jednej z chatiek napadol muža (49) zo Sobraniec. Potom nasadol do Toyoty a chcel odísť.
Mercedes zničili sekerou, zadržali trojicu mužov

BRATISLAVA - Strieborný Mercedes ML 350 poškodili včera okolo tretej poobede sekerou traja muži na bratislavskej Ivánskej ceste. Škodu vyčíslili na 25 tisíc eur!
So sekerou prepadol herňu, polícii sa sám udal
12.08.2010
BRATISLAVA/OLOMOUC - Sám sa prišiel na políciu udať mladý muž (20), ktorý v sobotu so sekerou prepadol herňu v Olomouci. Nezvládol vraj informácie v médiach.
FOTO Uviaznutý Slovák na Heathrowe: Spacák a nechutný sendič!
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/LONDÝN – Pasažieri na európskych letiskách stále zažívajú pravé peklo. Hoci londýnsky Heathrow v utorok večer informoval o sprevádzkovaní ďalšej dráhy, mnohým cestujúcim to nie je nič platné. Tí, ktorí stále dúfajú, že na Vianoce sa im podarí dostať domov, bude postihovať meškanie a rušenie letov ešte niekoľko dní, napísal Reuters.
V Sobranciach napadli a zbili takmer 100-ročnú ženu!
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/KOŠICE - Mimoriadnu necitlivosť ukázal včera nadránom neznámy muž v Sobranciach. Vykopol dvere do rodinného domu a napadol v ňom starenku (96)! Udrel ju päsťou do tváre, až spadla na zem, kde zostala ležať. Potom obrátil pozornosť na jej dcéru (64).
Muž sa chcel obesiť v bratislavskej novostavbe
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Samovraha sa dnes v noci pokúšali zachraňovať zdravotníci aj policajná hliadka. Stál na stoličke na poschodí v jednej z bratislavských novostavieb a okolo krku mal slučku. Privolaní zdravotníci sa s mužom snažili komunikovať a upokojiť ho.
Otec so synom sa na "vianočný nákup" vybrali s tyčou
22.12.2010
BRATISLAVA/NITRA - Pre rodinnú predvianočnú krádež sa počas pondelňajšej noci rozhodli v Palárikove otec (51) so synom (21). Starší s tyčou vypáčil vchodové dvere do predajne a spolu s potomkom začali vyberať "darčeky."

Markíza dostala za Superstar pokutu 10 tisíc
21.12.2010
BRATISLAVA - Spoločnosti Markíza - Slovakia spol. s.r.o. udelila dnes licenčná rada pokutu 10-tisíc eur. Ako informoval riaditeľ kancelárie Rady pre vysielanie a retransmisiu (RVR) Ľuboš Kukliš, rada opätovne potvrdila pokutu, ale po vrátení z Najvyššieho súdu SR ju znížila z pôvodných 20-tisíc eur na polovicu.
Nagy podal trestné oznámenie na vedenie Interblue
