description.hltext_display: Dangdang to diversify from books, plans expansion
description.content: HONG KONG (Reuters) - Online retailer Dangdang Inc, considered as China's answer to Amazon.com, aims for sales of general merchandise to exceed that of books and other media as it diversifies in the highly competitive e-commerce sector.

description.hltext_display: Ngừng việc tìm kiếm trên biển, còn 48 người mất tích
description.author: Việt Báo
description.content:
Tags: Phú Tân, BV 4248TS, tìm kiếm, cứu nạn, trên biển, mất tích, 48 người, ngừng việc, phòng, chiều, ban, 21
Tags: Phú Tân, BV 4248TS, tìm kiếm, cứu nạn, trên biển, mất tích, 48 người, ngừng việc, phòng, chiều, ban, 21
– Chiều 21/12, Uỷ ban Tìm kiến cứu nạn Quốc gia đã quyết định kết thúc việc tìm kiếm tàu cá BV 4248TS (có 21 người) và tàu Phú Tân (có 23 người).
Ban chỉ đạo Phòng chống lụt bão Trung ương (PCLBTW) cho biết, công tác tìm kiếm cứu nạn trên biển do ảnh hưởng của gió mùa đông bắc đến chiều 21/12 đã kết thúc.
Trong số 3 người của tàu BV 4550 gặp nạn, đã có hai người được tàu BT4681 cứu vớt và đã được tàu SAR 272 đưa vào Côn Đảo nhưng do sức khỏe yếu, 1 người đã chết. Riêng một nạn nhân còn mất tích cùng với tàu BV 4550 thì không có thêm thông tin gì kể từ thời điểm mất liên lạc (lúc 16h ngày 18/12).
Theo kết quả tìm kiếm cứu nạn đến 16h ngày 21/12/2010, đã tổ chức cứu hộ, cứu nạn được 20 tàu và 130 người. Hướng dẫn tự khắc phục sự cố được 14 tàu với 226 người.
Theo Ban chỉ đạo PCLBTW, ảnh hưởng của đợt gió mùa đông bắc trên biển đến nay đã làm cho 7 người thiệt mạng, hiện vẫn còn 48 người mất tích chưa tìm thấy, trong đó riêng tàu Phú Tân VINALINES là 23 người và tàu BV 4248 của Bà Rịa – Vũng Tàu là 21 người.
Có tổng số 25 tàu bị chìm, trong đó các địa Phương có nhiều tàu bị chìm nhất là Quảng Ngãi, Đà Nẵng, Bà Rịa – Vũng Tàu (mỗi địa Phương có 5 tàu bị chìm), 1 tàu bị mất liên lạc và 20 tàu khác bị mắc cạn.
Cuối giờ chiều 21/12/2010, Văn phòng UBQG Tìm kiếm cứu nạn có công văn gửi Quân chủng Hải quân, Quân chủng Phòng không không quân, Cục Cảnh sát biển, Bộ tư lệnh Bộ đội Biên phòng và Trung tâm phối hợp Tìm kiếm cứu nạn hàng hải Việt Nam, cho phép kết thúc công tác tìm kiếm cứu nạn đối với tàu cá BV 4248TS (có 21 lao động) và tàu vận tải Phú Tân (có 23 lao động).
UBQG Tìm kiếm cứu nạn đề nghị Trung tâm phối hợp tìm kiếm cứu nạn hàng hải Việt Nam và Bộ tư lệnh Biên phòng tiếp tục thông báo cho các tàu thuyền đang hoạt động trên biển biết, tăng cường quan sát phát hiện, tìm kiếm cứu nạn tàu thuyền và người mất tích trên biển.

description.hltext_display: GIRLS HOOPS: North, South Tama remain unbeaten at the break
description.content:
AGWSR dodges East Marshall
Save | Post a comment |
TRAER - The beat goes on for the North Tama girls' basketball team, but not until the third quarter did the Redhawks find that winning rhythym.
Class 1A No. 14 North Tama remained unbeaten, improving to 8-0 with a come-from-behind victory over Northeast Hamilton Tuesday night in Iowa Star Conference action.
The Redhawks boosted their league record to 7-0 by outscoring their guests 15-6 in the third quarter to erase a 28-23 halftime deficit. North Tama won the fourth quarter as well, converting free throws down the stretch to score only its second win by 10 or fewer this season.
"Northeast Hamilton was playing a 1-3-1 and we talked at halftime about attacking that more, and that gave us opportunities for more jump shots and we got it in to Kailey (Kladivo) easier," said North Tama head coach Irv Laube.
Kladivo led the Redhawks with her seventh double-double of the season, charting 14 points and 10 rebounds. Erin Herink added 12 points, while Aryn Isenhower, Sam Zobel and Nicole Schlicting each had six points.
"Our defense played much better man-to-man in the second half, and we settled down," Laube added. "We knew it was going to be a tough game."
Kalli Richardson scored a game-high 15 points for Northeast Hamilton (6-4, 5-2), Kelanie Claude added 11 and Rachel Vaughn 10. Richardson and Claude both had nine first-half points but just eight combined after the break.
South Tama 53, Benton Community 47
TAMA - Class 3A No. 10 South Tama trailed as late in a game as it has this season, but the Trojans would not be derailed.
Benton Community carried a one-point lead into the fourth quarter but could not keep South Tama down as the Trojans scored a 53-47 non-conference victory.
STC (8-0) pushed past the Bobcats (7-3) by outscoring their guests 18-11 in the fourth period, securing their closest win of the season.
Madison Baier notched her fourth double-double with team-highs of 17 points and 13 rebounds to go along with four blocked shots. Jade Rohach contributed 11 points, Dia Keahna had 10 points and Kourtne Smith nine in the win.
Taylor Van Dyk chipped in two 3-pointers in the first half for her six points. Kendra Bradley was held scoreless but tallied six assists.
"I thought we played well as a team, this was the toughest test we've faced this year," said STC head coach Nate Roberts. "When they upped the defensive pressure, we handled it."
South Tama outshot the Bobcats at the free-throw line, going 14-for-17 to Benton's 6-for-8 effort. Smith shot 6-for-7 and Baier went 5-for-5 to help the Trojans stay perfect heading into the holiday break.
Madison Weekley led Benton with 14 points and Katie Kullmer added 11.
AGWSR 40, East Marshall 34
LE GRAND - A halftime lead didn't hold up for East Marshall as AGWSR's Megan Pieters tallied 21 points to lead to Cougars to a 40-34 victory in NICL West girls' basketball on Tuesday night.
Tara Gray led the Mustangs (5-4, 3-2) with 16 points, but was the only East Marshall player to tally double figures. Abby Nuese chipped in eight for the Mustangs, who led 18-15 at intermission.
Class 2A No. 5 AGWSR (7-1, 4-0) also had only one player break into double digits, Pieters, but had Samantha Heitland notch eight and Shelby Weichers six. Jani Lippert added five.
Both teams are off until after the new year.
West Marshall 48, Grundy Center 44
GRUNDY CENTER - The Trojans bested the Spartans at the free-throw line to overcome a fourth-quarter deficit to stay just one game behind AGWSR in the NICL West race.
West Marshall (8-1, 4-1) went 9-of-12 from the charity stripe in the final frame to erase the Spartans' five-point fourth-quarter lead. The Trojans didn't have their first lead of the game until the final 2 minutes of the fourth quarter.
"We lost at the foul line," said Grundy Center head coach Al Jones.
Alexa Hotopp had a team-best 16 points for the Trojans while Heather Hook had a game-high 19 for the Spartans.
McKenna Hotopp tallied 12 points and Molly Underwood 10 in the win for West Marshall.
Underwood also grabbed eight rebounds and dished out four assists while McKenna Hotopp pulled down eight boards and had four steals. Keann Kelber had five thefts.
The Spartans got 12 points from Sarah Frisch in a game they led by eight at intermission.
South Hardin 58, BCLUW 48
ELDORA - Beth Mildenhall tallied 16 points for the Tigers (4-6, 2-4) in the NICL West victory.
The Comets (2-8, 0-6) led after the first quarter and went into the locker room tied with their hosts, but fell behind by nine after the third and surrendered 20 points in the final frame.
McKenzie Heue had 14 points for South Hardin while Libbie Hillmer and Catherine Penning both chipped in with nine.
Courtney Amundson had a big day for BCLUW with 28 points, but she was the only Comet to post better than four points on the night.
Colo-NESCO 62, CAL 42
COLO - Madison Eley scored a game-high 18 points to help Colo-NESCO push past CAL, 62-42, Tuesday night in Iowa Star Conference play.
Jessica Johnson contributed nine points and a team-high five rebounds for the Royals (6-5, 5-2). Caitlyn Riese and Makayla Klonglan both had eight points, Haley Stoeffler had seven and Alyssa Speake six.
Eley led with five assists and Klonglan had four. Both Eley and Dana Baker tallied three steals.
Kaitlyn Muhlenbruch led CAL (1-8, 1-7) with 11 points and Abby Muhlenbruch added 10.

description.hltext_display: お金で買えないものがあった――ホリエモンが歌って踊る「クリスマス・キャロル」開演
description.content:
ニュース お金で買えないものがあった——ホリエモンが歌って踊る「クリスマス・キャロル」開演 ニコ生でライブ配信するミュージカル「クリスマス・キャロル」がいよいよ始まる。主演は舞台初挑戦の堀江貴文さん。「お金で買えないもの」の大切さを伝える同作に、ホリエモンはどう挑む!? 2010年12月22日 16時59分 更新 サンタクロース姿で登場したホリエモン（中央）と、共演者の安田美沙子さん（左）、宮下雄也さん（右） ニコニコ生放送でライブ配信するミュージカルの第1弾「クリスマス・キャロル」の公演が12月22日夜、東京・銀座の博品館劇場で始まる。主演の堀江貴文さんは初公演を前に、「何しろ初めてのことの連続で」とこれまでの舞台稽古を振り返り、「最高のパーフォマンスを出せるよう頑張る」と意気込んだ。
クリスマス・キャロルは、イギリスの小説家・チャールズ・ディケンズの同名作品（1843年出版）を現代風にアレンジしたもの。堀江さんが演じる「スクルージ」は、IT企業の社長として“ブイブイ”言わせている設定だ。実業家として成長する一方で、拝金主義に傾いていったスクルージは、恋人「ケイト」から反発を買い、別れてしまったという過去を持つ。
社員との仲もうまく行かず、クリスマスを祝う余裕もなく自分の殻に閉じこもるスクルージのもとに、クリスマス・イブの夜、「不気味な歌声」とともに天使が現れた。その夜から「数々の奇跡」が起こり、思いがけず自分の人生を見つめ直すことになったスクルージは、「お金で買えないものがある」ことに気づいていく——。
いよいよ公演初日！ 会場は銀座駅・新橋駅から近い博品館劇場 会場には「GLAY」からも花が届いていた ニワンゴのマスコットキャラも駆けつけた 12月26日まで全9回上演し、毎回ニコ生でライブ配信する。ニコ生のチケット代は1公演1000円、全公演通しで5400円。劇場で見るためのチケットは4500円で、22日午後7時からと26日午後7時からの回が売り切れ、23日午後1時からの回は残りわずかになっているなど、売れ行きはまずまずのよう。片岡義朗エグゼクティブブロデューサーは、ニコ生配信する試みについて「演劇の歴史のなかで画期的なことになるんじゃないか」と期待する。
会見で笑顔が少なかったホリエモン。初舞台に緊張している？ 堀江さんは舞台初挑戦。片岡エグゼクティブプロデューサーは、堀江さんを主演に抜てきした意図について、「お金で買えないものがある」ことを伝える物語を「堀江さんでやることにインパクトがある」と説明。「堀江さんの見事な役者ぶり、15人のキャストの奮闘ぶりを見ていただければ」とアピールする。
初舞台で座長となった堀江さんはサンタクロース姿で会見に登場。これまでの舞台稽古は「何しろ初めての連続で、毎日課題をこなすことで精一杯」で「自分がどうなっているのよく分からない」ような状態だったと振り返る。一方、歌や踊りのシーンは「繰り返しやったから大丈夫だと思う」と話し、「最高のパーフォマンスを出せるよう頑張る」と意気込む。
堀江さんと同じく舞台初挑戦で、ケイト役を演じるタレントの安田美沙子さんは、堀江さんの印象を「最初は怖いイメージがあった」と明かしつつ、「みんなのお父さん的存在で、すごく温かい現場を作ってもらっています」と持ち上げる。若いころのスクルージを演じる、パフォーマンスグループ「RUN＆GUN」の宮下雄也さんは、堀江さんが座長で良かったこととして「差し入れが素晴らしい」と語って笑いを誘っていた。 関連記事 ホリエモン主演ミュージカルも ドワンゴ、“ライブイベント×有料ニコ生”新事業
堀江貴文さん主演ミュージカルなど、ドワンゴがライブイベントを主催。ニコ生で有料配信し、“ライブ”の新たなビジネスモデル確立を目指す。 ライブドア事件が題材 ホリエモンの初小説「拝金」が電子書籍に
堀江貴文さんがライブドア事件を題材に書いた小説「拝金」が電子書籍化され、配信がスタートした。 ホリエモンの有料メルマガ読者数、1万人突破
堀江貴文さんが発行する月額840円のメールマガジンの読者数が1万人を突破した。 ホリエモンが全身タイツでコスプレ初挑戦 長島☆自演乙選手と対談
コスプレイベントに長島☆自演乙選手と堀江貴文さんが登場。長島選手に負けじと堀江さんも全身タイツのコスプレ姿を披露し、会場を沸かせた。長島選手が堀江さんに「やせますよ」とオタ芸をすすめる場面も。 関連リンク クリスマス・キャロル公式サイト [宮本真希，ITmedia] Copyrightｩ 2010 ITmedia, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Signing won't end 'don't ask' right away
description.content:
WASHINGTON, Dec. 22 (UPI) -- A bill being signed into law by President Obama to end the U.S. military's "don't ask, don't tell policy" will not alter the policy immediately, officials said.
The president, along with Defense Secretary Robert Gates and Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman Adm. Mike Mullen, must first certify to Congress in writing the U.S. armed forces have drafted necessary new policies and regulations and are ready to operate with openly gay, lesbian or bisexual men and women in military service. The certification must also affirm the changes will not hurt troop readiness, cohesion or military recruitment and retention, the new law states.
Once the written notice is submitted, there will be a 60-day waiting period before "don't ask, don't tell" is officially repealed.
U.S. Defense Department spokesman Geoff Morrell said he couldn't predict how long the administration would need to get everything in order, saying only the rules and regulations would be worked out at a "methodical" and "deliberate" pace. White House Press Secretary Robert Gibbs said he didn't expect the process would be "overly burdensome."
Gay rights leaders believe the military could end full enforcement in a matter of weeks, The Washington Post reported. Obama is to sign the bill at 9:15 a.m. EST Wednesday, ending a 17-year ban on gays serving openly in uniform.
A last-ditch effort by Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, R-Ky., to block the change was blocked late Tuesday night by Sen. Joe Lieberman, I-Conn., Senate aides told Politico.
McConnell had tried to derail the change by adding an amendment to a defense-spending bill that would have required the four military-service chiefs to be part of the Obama-Gates-Mullen certification process.
That would have given U.S. Marine Corps Commandant Gen. James Amos, a vocal opponent of the repeal, power to delay or possibly prevent its implementation, The New York Times reported.

event_or_fact.property: he couldn't predict how long the administration would need to get everything in order, saying only the rules and regulations would be worked out at a "methodical" and "deliberate" pace
he didn't expect the process would be "overly burdensome.

description.hltext_display: 发改委：物价涨幅将控制在3.3% 仍在调控范围内
description.content:
2010年全年物价涨幅将控制在3.3%左右。
孙书博
据中央电视台报道，国家发改委副主任彭森昨天在全国价格认证工作会议上首次透露上述数据，这个数字也进一步印证了上个月发改委主任张平提出的今年我国物价涨幅将比3%稍微高一点的说法。
新华社昨天播发的一篇文章中也指出，专家预测，全年CPI涨幅可能会略高于3%。
但随着各项宏观调控措施的落实，今后一个时期物价总水平有望保持基本稳定。
多位接受《第一财经日报》记者采访的业内人士也认为，全年CPI控制在3.3%预示着今年12月份CPI涨幅较11月份将明显收窄，国家稳定物价的“组合拳”已经初显成效。
12月CPI有望回落
数据显示，1至11月份累计，全国CPI同比涨幅已经达到了3.2%，而年初确定的调控目标是3%左右。
“我们原来预定的宏观调控目标是3%左右，而且是一个预期性的、指导性的目标。3%稍稍过一点应该也还在这个调控目标的范围之内。”国家统计局新闻发言人盛来运近日说。
盛来运表示，12月份有很多稳定物价的有利条件。最有利的条件是国务院16条措施的效果会不断显现。另外，翘尾因素在12月份就没有了，这对拉低物价总水平也会产生积极的作用。
银河证券高级经济学家苑德军在接受本报记者采访时说，12月份CPI涨幅有望收窄。
CPI止涨回落，这是目前业内的普遍预期。
彭森介绍说，稳定消费价格总水平、保障群众基本生活工作已取得初步成效。从11月底开始，蔬菜价格出现明显下降，棉花、食糖和化肥价格高位回落。
国家统计局近日公布的全国200个主产县主要农产品(19.10,-0.04,-0.21%)价格变动则显示，12月1日到10日15种主要农产品当中，籼稻、活羊、苹果、柑橘等价格涨幅已明显下降，而籽棉价格则与11月下旬相比下跌7.84%。
11月29日~12月10日，根据《国务院关于稳定消费价格总水平保障群众基本生活的通知》文件要求，国务院办公厅、国家发改委、监察部、商务部共同组成国务院督查组，赴山西、天津、江苏就落实国务院文件情况进行督促检查。
督查发现，有关地区市场秩序总体良好，重要商品价格有所回落，低收入群众生活得到较好安置。
据新华社全国农副产品和农资价格行情系统监测，与前一日相比，12月21日，猪肉价格下降；成品粮价格稳中有涨；蔬菜、水果、水产品、禽蛋、牛羊肉、食用油价格微幅波动；奶类价格基本稳定。
监测的21种蔬菜中，7种价格下降，3种价格上涨，11种价格持平。
阶段性成果仍须巩固
彭森表示，以农产品为主的城乡居民生活必需品价格上涨，成为推升价格总水平的重要因素。
彭森认为，这次价格上涨是多种因素相互交织、相互叠加、综合作用的结果，成因较为复杂。既有成本逐步上升的内在原因，也有国际市场大宗商品涨价向国内传导的外部影响；既有自然灾害多发造成的临时冲击，也有投机炒作加剧带来的泡沫成分。
他强调，目前取得的成绩只是初步的、阶段性的，引发价格上涨的根本原因仍未消除。今后一段时间，中国价格运行的环境将更趋复杂，面临的挑战将更为严峻，稳定消费价格总水平、保障群众基本生活的任务十分艰巨。他要求各级价格主管部门，增强做好稳定价格工作的紧迫感和责任感。
交通银行(5.66,0.01,0.18%)金融研究中心近日发布的研究报告在预测全年CPI涨幅可能达到3.2%左右的同时也指出，由于通货膨胀预期形成之后，物价会有一定的上涨惯性；同时2011年1~2月将是我国传统的春节期间，节日需求会带动部分产品的价格上涨；加上进入冬季以来，低温雪灾等灾害性天气出现的可能性增加，将给蔬菜瓜果等农产品的生产和运输带来困难，2011年一季度物价上涨的压力仍然较大，但在物价持续上涨已引起政府高度关注的情况下，预计物价上涨的势头会在2011年二季度后得到有效控制，预计2011年物价上涨将呈现前高后低的走势。

description.hltext_display: Do regime da separação obrigatória de bens
description.content:
Conforme noticiou a Gazeta de Limeira de sábado último, com a entrada em vigor da Lei 12.344, de 9 de dezembro de 2010, que alterou a redação do inciso II do artigo 1641 do Código Civil, foi aumentada de sessenta para setenta anos, a idade a partir da qual se torna obrigatório o regime da separação de bens no casamento civil.
No regime da separação de bens, os cônjuges conservam o domínio e a administração dos bens que constituíam seu patrimônio por ocasião da celebração de seu casamento civil, bem como dos que forem havidos com o produto da venda desses bens. Nesse regime de bens, coexistem dois patrimônios distintos, o dos bens particulares do marido e o dos bens particulares da mulher, com cada cônjuge administrando seus bens.
A obrigatoriedade da adoção do regime da separação de bens, para as pessoas que se casarem com mais de setenta anos de idade, foi imposta pelo legislador com a finalidade de impedir que um dos cônjuges se casasse com o espírito meramente especulativo, pensando apenas no patrimônio do outro. Trata-se de uma limitação à liberdade de escolha do regime de bens a ser adotado no casamento, imposta pela lei (art. 1641, II, do Cód. Civil), às pessoas maiores de setenta anos, que desejam se casar, com a adaptação do texto legal à realidade atual, na qual as pessoas estão vivendo mais, e com plena capacidade de discernimento.
Essa limitação imposta à liberdade de escolha do regime de bens adotado por ocasião do casamento, em razão da idade de um ou de ambos os nubentes, sempre foi uma preocupação do legislador pátrio. No Código Civil de 1916 havia uma disposição legal, tornando obrigatória a celebração do casamento civil no regime da separação de bens quando o homem fosse maior de sessenta anos, ou a mulher maior de cinquenta anos (art. 258, § único, II). Com o advento do Código Civil de 2002, tornou-se obrigatória a adoção do regime da separação de bens no casamento civil “da pessoa maior de 60 (sessenta) anos” (art. 1641, II), desaparecendo, desde então, a diferença de idade entre os cônjuges, que havia no Código Civil anterior. Pelo Código Civil em vigor, anteriormente à alteração ora comentada, se um dos cônjuges, ou ambos fossem maiores de sessenta anos, o casamento civil deveria ser realizado no regime da separação obrigatória de bens. E, atualmente, com a entrada em vigor da Lei 12.344/2010, que modificou o disposto no artigo 1641, inciso II, do referido Código, para aumentar para setenta anos a idade a partir da qual se tornou obrigatório o regime da separação de bens no casamento, somente para as pessoas maiores de setenta anos é obrigatória a adoção do regime da separação de bens no casamento civil, em decorrência da idade dos nubentes.
Dr. Reynaldo J. G. Busch é advogado, foi presidente da Associação dos Advogados de Limeira e vice-presidente da 35ª Subseção da OAB de Limeira.

description.hltext_display: "방응모 조선일보 前사장 친일파 맞다"
description.content:
법원은 방응모 전 조선일보 사장이 일제 강점기에 행한 친일반민족 행위를 대부분 인정했다. 따라서 방우영 조선일보 명예회장은 조부인 방응모 전 사장에 대한 친일반민족행위 결정을 취소하라는 소송서 사실상 패소했다.
서울행정법원 행정11부(서태환 부장판사)는 22일 방우영 조선일보 명예회장이 "친일 인명사전에 방응모 전 사장의 이름을 등재하지 말라"며 낸 친일반민족행위결정처분취소 청구소송에서 일부 승소 판결했다.
재판부는 "방 전 사장이 1944년 조선항공공업창립 발기인 등으로 활동한 부분에 대해 친일 행위로 결정한 부분을 취소하라"면서도 "나머지 활동에 대해서는 친일 행위로 인정된다"고 판단했다.
방 전 사장은 지난 1933년 조선일보 사장으로 취임해 국민총력조선연맹 참사와 조선임전보국단 이사 등으로 활동하며 친일활동을 벌였다는 이유 등으로 지난해 11월 친일반민족행위진상규명위원회가 발표한 친일파 704명의 명단에 포함됐다.

description.hltext_display: Sirius XM celebrates legendary comedian on Richard Pryor Radio
description.author: digitalhome
description.content:
?Richard Pryor Radio,? a four day featuring the comedy of the legendary comedian launches December 30th on Sirius and XM Satellite radio.
Pryor, who died in 2005 at the age of 65, was known for uncompromising examinations of racism and topical contemporary issues, which employed colourful, vulgar and profane language. The channel will feature hundreds of tracks from live concert performances, stand-up gigs and Pryor?s comedy albums spanning 1968-1992. Readers should note that it will air Pryor?s work unedited and uncensored.
Pryor won an Emmy Award in 1973, and five Grammy Awards in 1974, 1975, 1976, 1981, and 1982. In 1974, he also won two American Academy of Humor awards and the Writers Guild of America Award. In 2004, Comedy Central ranked him number one on their list of all-time great stand-up comedians.
Pryor would have celebrated his 70th birthday this month. ?Richard Pryor Radio? will launch December 30 at 5:00 am ET and will run through 11:59 pm ET on January 2 on Sirius channel 108 and XM channel 139. Discuss in .

entity.property: the Writers Guild of America Award

description.hltext_display: Dankwambo Resigns As Accountant-General
description.content:
Abuja After much speculations about his where about, the Accountant-General of the Federation, Alhaji Ibrahim Hassan Dankwambo, has formally resigned his appointment to contest the governorship race of Gombe State.
In a circular to staff of the Office of the Accountant-General of the Federation (OAGF), also known as treasury house, obtained in Abuja, entitled 'Withdrawal from service as Accountant General of the Federation,' Dankwambo stated why he had to go.
"I wish to inform you that I have withdrawn from the service and voluntarily relinquished my appointment as the Accountant-General of the Federation with effect from Monday 20th December, 2010.
"This has become necessary in order to answer the call of my people at home to participate in the on-going political activities in the country.
"To enable me prepare handing over notes to the officer who will be appointed to take over from me, you are therefore requested to submit comprehensive and up-to-date details of activities in your department in soft and hard copies by Thursday 23rd December, 2010," the document stated.
LEADERSHIP also gathered that while the AGF was about leaving, the premises of the Treasury House, the Minister of State for Finance, Hajia Yabawa Wabi, LEADERSHIP learnt, had held a closed door meeting with the out-going AGF, the outcome of which insider source said was to accept the resignation and wish him well in his future endeavours.

event_or_fact.property: Withdrawal from service as Accountant General of the Federation

description.hltext_display: Утверждение решения о выпуске эмиссионных ценных бумаг
description.content:
Открытое акционерное общество "ММК-Профиль-Москва"
1. Общие сведения
1.1. Полное фирменное наименование эмитента (для некоммерческой организации наименование): Открытое акционерное общество "ММК-Профиль-Москва"
1.2. Сокращенное фирменное наименование эмитента: ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва"
1.3. Место нахождения эмитента: 141100, Московская обл., г. Щелково-2
1.4. ОГРН эмитента: 1025006525840
1.5. ИНН эмитента: 5050014030
1.6. Уникальный код эмитента, присвоенный регистрирующим органом: 06918-А
1.7. Адрес страницы в сети Интернет, используемой эмитентом для раскрытия информации: http://www.mmk-profil.ru
2. Содержание сообщения
"Сведения об утверждении решения о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг"
2.2. В сообщении о существенном факте, содержащем сведения об утверждении решения о выпуске, указываются:
2.2.1. Орган управления эмитента, утвердивший решение о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг, и способ принятия решения (указывается вид общего собрания (годовое или внеочередное) в случае, если органом управления эмитента, принявшим решение об утверждении решения о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг, является общее собрание участников (акционеров) эмитента, а также форма голосования (совместное присутствие и/или заочное голосование): Решение об утверждении решения о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг принято единственным акционером ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва" — Открытым акционерным обществом "Магнитогорский металлургический комбинат".
2.2.2. Дата и место проведения собрания (заседания) уполномоченного органа управления эмитента, на котором принято решение об утверждении решения о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг: 22 декабря 2010 года; Россия, 455000, Челябинская область, г. Магнитогорск, ул. Кирова, 93.
2.2.3. Дата составления и номер протокола собрания (заседания) уполномоченного органа управления эмитента, на котором принято решение об утверждении решения о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг: Решение единственного акционера ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва" № 03/2010 от "22" декабря 2010 г.
2.2.4. Кворум по вопросу об утверждении решения о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг и итоги голосования: информация не указывается, поскольку решение об утверждении решения о дополнительном выпуске ценных бумаг принято единственным акционером ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва".
2.2.5. Вид, категория (тип), серия и иные идентификационные признаки размещаемых ценных бумаг: акции обыкновенные именные бездокументарные
2.2.6. Срок погашения (для облигаций и опционов эмитента): размещаемые ценные бумаги не являются облигациями или опционами эмитента
2.2.7. Количество размещаемых ценных бумаг и номинальная стоимость (если наличие номинальной стоимости предусмотрено законодательством Российской Федерации) каждой размещаемой ценной бумаги: 2 050 335 (два миллиона пятьдесят тысяч) штук номинальной стоимостью 1 (один) рубль каждая
2.2.8. Способ размещения ценных бумаг, а в случае размещения ценных бумаг путем закрытой подписки – также круг потенциальных приобретателей размещаемых ценных бумаг: Закрытая подписка. Потенциальным приобретателем размещаемых ценных бумаг является единственный акционер ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва" Открытое акционерное общество "Магнитогорский металлургический комбинат" (ОГРН 1027402166835)
2.2.9. Цена размещения ценных бумаг или порядок ее определения: 428 (четыреста двадцать восемь) рублей за одну акцию
2.2.10. Срок (даты начала и окончания) размещения ценных бумаг или порядок его определения:
Порядок определения даты начала размещения:
Следующий день после опубликования сообщения о существенном факте "Сведения об этапах процедуры эмиссии ценных бумаг (сведения о государственной регистрации выпуска (дополнительного выпуска) ценных бумаг)" в ленте новостей информационного агентства ИА "АЗИПИ-информ".
Порядок определения даты окончания размещения:
Датой окончания размещения является дата размещения последней ценной бумаги настоящего дополнительного выпуска, но не позднее одного года с даты государственной регистрации настоящего дополнительного выпуска ценных бумаг.
Акции настоящего дополнительного выпуска считаются размещенными с момента внесения последней записи по лицевому счету участника закрытой подписки в реестре владельцев именных ценных бумаг Эмитента.
Срок размещения ценных бумаг определяется указанием на даты раскрытия какой-либо информации о выпуске ценных бумаг.
2.2.11. Иные условия размещения ценных бумаг, определенные решением об их размещении:
форма оплаты дополнительно выпускаемых обыкновенных именных бездокументарных акций ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва" — денежными средствами, возможна оплата размещаемых Акций путем зачета денежных требований к ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва"
2.2.12. Предоставление участникам (акционерам) эмитента и/или иным лицам преимущественного права приобретения ценных бумаг: преимущественное право приобретения дополнительных акций ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва", размещаемых по закрытой подписке, не предусмотрено.
2.1.7. В случае, когда регистрация проспекта ценных бумаг осуществляется по усмотрению эмитента, – факт принятия эмитентом обязанности раскрывать информацию после каждого этапа процедуры эмиссии ценных бумаг: регистрация дополнительного выпуска ценных бумаг не сопровождается регистрацией проспекта ценных бумаг
3. Подпись
3.1. Директор ОАО "ММК-Профиль-Москва" ________________А.Д. Носов
3.2. Дата “22” декабря 2010 г. М.П.

description.hltext_display: Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale to star in film set in Nanjing during the war.
description.content:
BEIJING, China - Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale will star in the Chinese filmmaker's latest project about 13 young prostitutes struggling to survive during the attack by Japanese soldiers on Nanjing in 1937.
Zhang said Wednesday that Bale, the star of the boxing drama "The Fighter," will play an American priest in Nanjing during the Japanese invasion.
Zhang says shooting is to start Jan. 10. He says he hopes to tell the story of war atrocities in Nanjing, especially to younger people in Western countries.
Historians say the massacre, known in the West as the "Rape of Nanking," resulted in the slaughter of at least 150,000 civilians. China puts the number killed at 300,000, making it one of the worst atrocities of the World War II era.

event_or_fact.property: he hopes to tell the story of war atrocities in Nanjing, especially to younger people in Western countries

description.hltext_display: 收入分配改革方案出台缓期 专家建议向日本学习
description.content:
2010年12月22日 09:40 来源：21世纪经济报道 【打印】
原定于年内出台的收入分配改革总体方案仍将缓期，什么时候出台，仍待国务院统一部署，曾参与该方案草案讨论的学者、国家发改委社会学所所长杨宜勇介绍。
在最终方案定夺前，国务院仍从各个层面征集意见。一些先行国家的经验也受到关注。12月21日，国务院发展研究中心下属研究机构中国发展研究基金会特别举行远程视频会议，多位中国收入分配问题专家参加，并联线了日本东京大学经济学系教授伊藤正直。
最近，伊藤教授受委托，完成了对该国“国民收入倍增计划”资料91卷本的整理。
会议讨论环节，中国学者认为，日本在国民收入倍增计划出台前的方案论证模式乃至过程中的评估等细致手段；以提高受教育年限作为破解劳动力市场供给难题的办法等等，都是我们可以吸取的经验。同时亦要在打破垄断、限制政府支出方面，下更大功夫。
另据中国发展研究基金会秘书长卢迈介绍，相关讨论将梳理后报决策层参考。
调总量还是调结构？
中国(海南)改革发展研究院院长迟福林不久前明确提出，中国急需将收入分配改革作为约束性指标，争取“十二五”城乡居民收入增长速度不低于8%，劳动者报酬年均增长不低于10%。
“按此测算，大概在10年内中国劳动者收入会翻一番，如果改革收入分配政策，五年就会翻一番，类似日本的国民收入倍增计划。”迟福林说。
中国劳动学会副会长兼薪酬专业委员会会长苏海南也一直反复呼吁借鉴日本经验，推出我国的国民收入倍增计划，“若年均工资增长15%以上，五年左右就可以翻一番”。
一些地方开始先行试点。今年9月，广东省发改委《关于我省实施扩大内需情况的报告》指出，未来将积极探索实施“国民收入倍增计划”。
国务院发展研究中心宏观经济研究部副部长魏加宁提醒，“国民收入总量的增长不等于老百姓收入的增长。我们更需要去调整国民收入内部结构，消除不同群体、不同单位之间的收入分配不公”。
实践层面，由于一直以来各地政府已习惯GDP和财政收入的经济指标，专家担心，笼统提国民收入倍增，会让地方政府追求总量增长，而非具体收入分配结构的调整。
事实上，最近各地公布的“十二五”规划草案也确有此迹象，最近广西、黑龙江、贵州等多省规划主要指标仍落脚在经济，诸如“力争到2015年，实现地区生产总值比2010年翻一番，财政收入翻一番以上”，对具体人群收入指标鲜有涉及。
而在日本当年的倍增计划中，对诸如GDP、国民收入总量，乃至具体人群的工资倍增等等指标都有涉及。
财政部科研所研究员刘微则担心，单纯提收入倍增计划后，绕进指标里出不来。
“与其围绕该计划，提出一些指标，不如直面我们在初次分配领域的核心问题”，她认为，政府最该做的是减少对市场机制的干预和扭曲。
日本方案如何制定
按照伊藤介绍，在国民收入倍增计划的构思到编制阶段，曾颇费心血和人力。
在1959年，日本内阁向日本经济恳谈会提出收入倍增计划课题，由综合部会具体负责，下设两个小委员会，敲定国民收入倍增计划的基本框架。
在委员会下再设立政策小研究会，具体研究设定经济或社会发展指标。而一旦GNP等基本目标明确，再据此由综合政策研究会，政府公共部门研究会、民间部门研究会和计量部门研究会四个部门负责推进。
其中政府部门研究会和民间部门研究会为两大核心，下分设17个小委员会，诸如投资分配、交通、住房政策、水利、能源、科技、教育培训、社保委员会等等。
这些委员会并不负责项目审批，而只分别提出分领域措施方案，确定如何分配投资，最后汇总确定总体方案。
在政策实施后，又有后续力量跟进。伊藤介绍，当时的决策层及研究者发现，原定国民收入计划目标跟实际情况有偏差，经济增长率太高，担心由此带来日本经济失衡，当即决定修改政策来取得各方平衡。
具体办法是在经济审议会建立诸多分会，诸如物价、劳动、产业结构、社会资本、国民经济、财政金融等科会，具体研究计划和实际情况的差异，进而调整政策。
魏加宁指出，这样分门别类的论证模式，在某种程度上比单纯的“面向社会征求意见”更有实效；同时，负责政策制定论证部门，并不具体负责项目审批，他们所发出的呼吁，也相对更超脱。
教育发力
日本国民收入倍增计划中，曾把“提高人的能力”作为重点之一，该重点关乎高素质劳动力的持续输送，以及义务教育的持续配合。
作为措施，伊藤介绍，在上个世纪60年代日本每个府县大学增设了工学部，帮助学生学习新设备新技术；在各个企业设立研究所，培养技术人员和管理者；在教育方面，则将高中入学人数持续扩充，一些五年制高中也培养骨干技术人员。
国务院发展研究中心对外经济研究部副部长赵晋平根据其研究发现， “日本高中阶段的义务教育，使得劳动力进入市场暂缓了三四年；在劳动力跨地区流动方面，也并无户籍限制，由此带来各类就业者的起点公平，从而确保了工资待遇等相应水准的公平”。
伊藤的一番话也给予了佐证。他介绍，当年日本在新兴的各个产业领域吸收了大量工人，并且，升学率急速升高，20世纪70年代以后高中毕业达到100%，4年制大学达到25%。
产业的发展，受教育水平的普遍提高，带来了工人收入差距的缩小。伊藤介绍，1955年中等企业员工工资是大企业工资的一半；到1975年中小企业工人工资开始和大企业接近，相当于后者的90%。

description.hltext_display: Shamrocks riding the wave
description.content:
BROCKTON - The Bishop Feehan High boys' swimming team jumped out to a commanding lead and cracked the century mark once again Tuesday in a 104-71 victory over Southern Conference foe Brockton.The Shamrocks, who have scored at least 100 points in all three of their wins (3-0) this season, opened up a 104-36 lead after the 200 freestyle relay before going exhibition the rest of the way. The only event Feehan didn't win was diving, though Mike Charpentier and Liam McLaughlan went 2-3 respectively.
Worth noting for the Shamrocks is the continued solid work turned in by senior Ryan Griffin (50 freestyle, 23.90), as well as freshmen Grant Casey (200 IM, 2:14.45) and Kyle Mahoney (100 butterfly, 1:03.40).Bishop Feehan is off until a Jan. 5 home meet against Apponequet.and split a Hockomock League meet, with the Bombardier boys (98-53) and Warrior girls (100-65) winning handily. Owen Wright had a hand in four first place finishes, two individual and two relay to help earn the win.For the girls, Meghan Foley, Hannah Fishman and Lindsay Julio all stood out from the pack.Foxboro is back in action Wednedsay, Dec. 29 against Sharon in Randolph. description.hltext_display: Pfleger gibt zu, Kinder sexuell missbraucht zu haben
description.content:
Bild vergrößern
Foto: dpa Berlin (Welt Online) - Ein 27-jähriger Krankenpfleger hat den Missbrauch von Kindern gestanden. Der Mann soll sich an Jungen auf der Intensivstation vergangen haben.
Ein Krankenpfleger soll in einem Berliner Krankenhaus Kinder sexuell missbraucht und davon Filmaufnahmen gemacht haben. Die Staatsanwaltschaft ermittelt gegen den 27-Jährigen wegen schweren sexuellen Missbrauchs in drei Fällen, wie ein Behördensprecher sagte. Er bestätigte damit Informationen der „Berliner Morgenpost". Das Klinikum sprach von fünf Fällen. Alle Missbrauchsopfer waren demnach Jungen, es seien noch nicht alle Namen ermittelt.
Der Pfleger, der auf einer Kinderintensivstation im Helios-Klinikum im Stadtteil Buch arbeitete, auf der sei am Freitag verhaftet worden. Zuvor hatte ein betroffener Junge seinen Eltern von den Taten erzählt. Die "Bild"-Zeitung berichtet, dass er durch Medikamente ruhiggestellt gewesen war und wie schlafend wirkte, die Übergriffe aber bei vollem Bewusstsein miterlebte. Zwei Mal soll der Pfleger ihn missbraucht haben.
Nächste Seite: Täter soll sich selbst kastriert haben

description.hltext_display: » Kenya Airways becomes new E190 operator and Jetscape customer
description.content:
Kenya Airways becomes new E190 operator and Jetscape customer
Jetscape announced the acquisition of a new Embraer E190-100IGW aircraft and delivered it on lease to Kenya Airways, Nairobi, Kenya. The aircraft is part of a two aircraft transaction. The second E190 aircraft will be delivered to Kenya Airways in May 2011. Both aircraft will be leased for an eight-year term. These E190 aircraft will join Kenya Airway’s existing Embraer fleet of five E170 aircraft. Previously, Jetscape had successfully remarketed two used E170 aircraft to Kenya Airways on four-year leases, on behalf of Finnair, Helsinki, Finland.

description.hltext_display: Nowitzki überholt Bird in NBA-Punkteliste
description.content:
do - Superstar Dirk Nowitzki hat in der “ewigen“ NBA- Punkteliste Basketball-Legende Larry Bird überholt. Auf wie viele Zähler er in seiner NBA-Karriere nach dem Sieg am Dienstag kommt:
© ap
Superstar Dirk Nowitzki hat in der “ewigen“ NBA- Punkteliste Basketball-Legende Larry Bird überholt.
Zum 105:99-Sieg seiner Dallas Mavericks bei Orlando Magic steuerte der Würzburger in der Nacht zu Mittwoch 17 Punkte bei und kommt in seiner NBA-Karriere nun auf 21.798 Zähler. Damit belegt er den 25. Rang in der Bestenliste der nordamerikanischen Basketball-Profiliga. Der Sieg in Orlando war für Dallas der 16. Erfolg aus den vergangenen 17 Partien.
Nowitzki - und sonst? Die größten Stars des US-Sports
Bester Werfer der Mavericks war ausnahmsweise mal nicht Nowitzki, sondern dessen Teamkollege Caron Butler mit 20 Punkten. Für die Magic sammelte Dwight Howard am meisten Zähler (26). Dallas liegt mit einer Bilanz von 23:5-Siegen in der Western Conference hinter San Antonio (24:3) weiter auf dem zweiten Rang.

description.hltext_display: ProTrak International Releases an Upgrade to their BlackBerry CRM...
description.content:
ProTrak International today announced the release of ProTrak Mobile 2.0, an upgrade to the BlackBerry component of their popular CRM application. The new release will ship in the coming weeks. ProTrak Mobile which was developed by ProTrak exclusively for the ProTrak Advantage CRM system, features completely secure wireless access to the ProTrak database for searches, retrieval and updates to the CRM central database.
“ProTrak Mobile was specifically designed and developed to have the same look and feel as our CRM solution, instead of simply placing a pre-developed BlackBerry package on top of ProTrak", said Simon Koziel, president of ProTrak. In that spirit, this new release adds several features that enhance the ease of use and consistency with the ProTrak CRM platform.
For example, ProTrak Mobile 2.0 includes the ability to view documents (RFPs, proposals, etc.) attached to ProTrak activities directly on the BlackBerry smartphone. Addresses can now be viewed in Google Maps and “hot keys” were added to permit one-click viewing of Activity and Follow-up Notes as well as Company details.
ProTrak Mobile lets users Send and Add e-mails to ProTrak whether they are in their Blackberry Contact Address Book, in the ProTrak Mobile application or responding to an email. And, when receiving emails with contacts not previously recorded in the CRM, ProTrak Mobile 2.0 lets users add a contact with the new contact automatically linked to the email activity in the CRM.
About ProTrak International, Inc.
ProTrak, a recognized innovator and industry veteran, has been providing best-of-breed client relationship management (CRM) solutions to the investment management community for over 20 years. ProTrak has the only CRM software suite that fully serves the needs of both traditional and alternative investment managers. The ProTrak Advantage CRM system improves the effectiveness of client service, sales & marketing and research teams by providing tools for workflow management and handling the complex, multi-dimensional relationships common to the investment management industry. For more information visit http://www.protrak.com.

description.hltext_display: Prevacid for comfort from heartburn
description.content:
Heartburn is commonly felt problem in the chest area. The pain may be severe sometimes, making you believe it's a heart attack. Heartburn is a major symptom of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), commonly termed as acid reflux. In the US alone, as estimated number of 60 million adults experience the burning sensation associated with acid reflux at least once every month. But most of them do not take it seriously and put their lives at risk. Your stomach may be damaged permanently if you don't treat heartburn timely. Thankfully, anti-heartburn pills such as Prevacid and Nexium are available at certified online clinics and brick and mortar storefront pharmacies in the US. These medicines are all approved by the apex US agency FDA, and are deemed safe and effective for heartburn relief. This article will provide you useful information about Prevacid and its usage.
Why does heartburn occur?
The food we eat goes to the stomach through the food pipe or esophagus for further digestion. Certain acidic digestive juices in the stomach help digest the food. Heartburn occurs when these acidic juices make a reverse flow to the esophagus, sometimes up to the chest or even throat. It is because of the acidic contents that you get a sour or bitter taste in your mouth. Occurrence of the problem once in a while is not a major cause for concern. But frequent heartburns will loosen the lower esophageal sphincter, causing gastric juices to flow back upwards into the food pipe. So it is imperative that you seek immediate medical help once you experience symptoms of acid reflux.
How is Prevacid helpful?
Manufactured by Takeda Pharmaceuticals North America, Inc. (TPNA), Prevacid is indicated for short-term heartburn treatment. The medicine reduces acid production in the stomachs, so eliminating chances of the acidic back-flow that might cause the burning problem in the chest. The drug ensures not just a proactive remedy for symptoms of acid reflux, but also addresses esophagitis. What's more, it is a safe pill, not having any major side effects.
When should you take Prevacid?
Prevacid is available on prescription only. Your doctor may prescribe you the drug if you have any of the following symptoms: burning sensation in the chest, causing pain and discomfort hiccups that refuse to go away sour or bitter taste in the mouth and near the throat area, accompanied by the same burning feeling blood in stools or blackish stool nausea problems in swallowing food dry cough asthmatic symptoms What are the dosages?
The TPNA product is available in doses of 15mg and 30mg. The smaller dose is usually advised to heal the symptoms of acid reflux in adults. It normally takes 4-8 weeks of medication to complete the course. The stronger dose is recommended for chronic sufferers of erosive esophagitis (EE).
From where can you buy Prevacid?
With a valid prescription, you can buy the medicine from any certified online clinics or registered medical outlets. But Internet-savvy users would also like the opportunity to buy Prevacid online. Making transactions from a trusted online pharmacy is 100% safe and secure.

description.hltext_display: Euro � forte, fondamentali Europa meglio di Usa
Johnson's swing stunned England: Pietersen (AAP)
description.content:
Outspoken England batsman Kevin Pietersen says Australia's Mitchell Johnson caught the tourists by surprise in Perth but it won't happen again. Dropped for the second Test and recalled for last week's third Ashes Test in Perth, Johnson took 6-38 and 3-44 to guide Australia to a 267-run win to level the five-match series at one-all.
"We knew he could swing it but we didn't realise he could swing it that much," Pietersen told reporters on Wednesday.
"He obviously did some really good work in the week that he had off, but we're going to be a lot better prepared for it here in Melbourne, so we'll play him a lot better."
Fierce rivals since the 2009 Ashes series, Pietersen and Johnson were at each other's throats in the Perth Test and the mood wasn't helped by Pietersen's apparently sarcastic attempt to repair the friendship by asking for the Australian's phone number. Johnson later told a WACA press conference Pietersen was a "smart arse". "I didn't give him my phone number, that's for sure," Johnson said. "I don't think he was being friendly. I did say something to him but I can't say what." Asked about his relationship with Johnson, Pietersen dead-panned: "I don't have a relationship with Mitchell Johnson."
As controversy rages over several incidents involving the Australian and England teams during last week's third Test in Perth, Pietersen says the verbal confrontations were nothing out of the ordinary.
Pietersen said he had faced some "pretty big verbal contests" from Shane Warne and Glenn McGrath during England's previous Ashes tour four years ago.
Australian pace bowler Peter Siddle clashed verbally with England batsman Matt Prior when Prior was dismissed during the Perth Test in one of several heated incidents during the match.
But Pietersen says the tension out on the field is no different to any other Ashes encounter.
"I think you guys feed them some good lines," Pietersen told reporters.
"They talk a lot. Nothing's different. "There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers, it's just England versus Australia. It's an Ashes series. "Blokes get a bit red mist occasionally. You're allowed to do that on both teams. "But there's nothing that's been overboard." England can retain the urn with victory in Melbourne or the fifth Test in Sydney.
Pietersen said he had goose-bumps thinking about playing in front of a possible world-record crowd of 91,000 on Sunday at the MCG.
And he was confident pace bowler Jimmy Anderson would be fit to take his place in the England side despite picking up a side injury.
With Stuart Broad out of the tour with injury and young quick Steve Finn looking fatigued during the WACA Test, Anderson's withdrawal would cause a further shake-up of the touring side's attack. Anderson bowled well in the opening two Tests in Brisbane and Adelaide before his form dipped in Perth after flying home to England for the birth of his second child.

description.hltext_display: James Alexander “Jim” McKechnie
description.content:
PALESTINE — Services for , 68, of Palestine will be at 4 p.m. Thursday at Concord Baptist Church, 8407 CR 404 in Palestine with the Rev. Mark Rogers officiating. Arrangements are under the direction of Emanuel Funeral Home of Palestine.
Mr. McKechnie died Sunday in Tyler.
He was born in Langdon, N.D. to Alex Peter and Ruth Mae Heller McKechnie.
Mr. McKechnie was employed in the oil field and retired from the Texas Department of Criminal Justice’s Coffield Unit.
He was a Baptist. He was affiliated with BARC, The Humane Society and East Texas Food Bank.
Mr. McKechnie was preceded in death by his parents.
He is survived by his wife of 18 years, Renee McKechnie of Palestine; son, Brian McKechnie of Kaufman; daughters, Jo Cole of Palestine, Lisa Meador of Newberry, S.C., Andrea McKechnie of Pelham, N.Y., Lacona Kelly of Quitman and Jamie McKechnie of Palestine; brothers, John McKechnie of Bothel, Wash., David McKechnie of Sioux Falls, S.D. and Don McKechnie of Jefferson, Mo.; sisters, Judith Fingar of Seattle, Wash., Marilyn McNeely of Springfield, S.D. and Carol Preisendorfer of Grants Pass, Ore.; eight grandchildren and four great-grandchildren.
In lieu of flowers, the family has requested donations to be sent to East Texas Food Bank and to the Humane Society.

description.hltext_display: Legal stoush looming over pet crocodile
description.content:
Charlie the crococodile has been part of the family for almost 50 years. (File: AAP) A north Queensland man is braced for a legal battle to keep a beloved pet crocodile that has been part of his family for almost 50 years.John Casey, 49, was just two years old when Charlie joined the family as a six-inch hatchling after her mother was shot by a hunter in 1963.
His late father Alf lovingly hand reared the estuarine croc, taking her for walks in the north Queensland town of Proserpine, down the pub for a beer, to school fetes and even a ball. "My father used to just let her walk in front of him down the street," Mr Casey told AAP on Wednesday. "She's been in just about every pub from Rocky to Cairns. We've got photos of her propped up at a bar in Proserpine when she was about seven feet long." These days the now three-metre croc is confined to a specially designed pen next to Mr Casey's Proserpine home.
But he fears she'll be taken away after the state government issued him with a long list of demands if he wants to keep Charlie at home.
Mr Casey says he was trying to do the right thing when he applied to have his father's permit to keep Charlie transferred into his name after his recent death.
But he says the government only issued him with a temporary, 12-month permit and Charlie will be relocated unless he meets an onerous set of demands.
He insists there's no way Charlie can get out of her existing enclosure, which is three metres high, enclosed in reinforced mesh and surrounded by concrete walls to ensure she can't dig her way out. "That pen was made to a plan supplied by parks and wildlife," he said. "There was never a problem before, but suddenly there's one now." He says the government seems to be concerned about a caravan park situated next to his home, about 50 metres from Charlie's pen. "But the caravan park was built in 1985 and the pen was built in 1987. Now it's a problem?" Climate Change and Sustainability Minister Kate Jones says she feels for Mr Casey but he must address legitimate safety concerns. "That's why he's been granted a 12-month permit to keep Charlie but with conditions related to public safety and the crocodile's welfare," she said in a statement.
Mr Casey must show that there's a proper enclosure, that he has the capacity to catch Charlie if she gets out, and is properly looking after her health.
If that happens, authorities will consider renewing his permit when it expires in October next year, Ms Jones said.
But Mr Casey says the timeframe for some of the conditions will expire in just a few weeks and he's engaged a lawyer to take the matter to the Queensland Civil and Administrative Tribunal. "One of the silly things they want me to do is put signs up all around that say 'Danger Crocodiles Keep Out'. Anyone in that caravan park is just going to say 'oh there's a croc, let's go and have a look'." Mr Casey fears his beloved, "docile" Charlie will end up at a crocodile farm. "She's always had an enclosure of her own," he said. "If they try to put her in with another croc, she'll either kill or be killed. "I feed her, I look after her water, I look after everything in her pen. She comes when I call her name and I can actually pat her. It'll be devastating if she's taken away."

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content:
A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre.
Rehab centre spokesman Russ Patrick said the employee was dismissed for breaking patient confidentiality at the Palm Desert, California, clinic by giving interviews and "disclosing a privileged document".
He said Dawn Holland's interview was a breach of trust and the rehabilitation process.
"When patients come to the centre for treatment, they come to a safe place where their identity is protected, where anonymity is safeguarded," he said.
Mean Girls star Lindsay, 24, is being investigated by Riverside County sheriff's detectives for misdemeanour battery following a confrontation on December 12.
A police spokeswoman said deputies were called to the Betty Ford centre shortly after 1am after an altercation between Lindsay and Ms Holland.
Lindsay's lawyer said the actress called the police emergency number.
Neither Betty Ford nor sheriff's officials identified Ms Holland, but she appeared in an interview on celebrity website TMZ, claiming Lindsay and two other girls had sneaked out of the centre.
Ms Holland said she was trying to get Lindsay to submit to a breathalyser test when the actress became belligerent, pushed her and snatched a phone from her hand, straining her arm.
Riverside County sheriff's deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said Lindsay's case would be presented to prosecutors, who would decide whether she should be charged.

description.hltext_display: Madrid. La emt pone hoy en marcha la línea especial "legazpi-caja mágica"
description.content: La Empresa Municipal de Transportes (EMT) de Madrid pone hoy en marcha la línea de autobuses denominada Servicio Especial (S.E.) "Legazpi-Caja Mágica", para facilitar el acceso a esta instalación deportiva. Esta línea especial, que ya ha funcionado en ocasiones coincidiendo con la celebración de eventos deportivos o musicales en este recinto, empieza a prestar servicio con carácter sistemática a partir de hoy, de manera que estará operativa siempre que en Caja Mágica se celebren eventos deportivos, musicales, de ocio o de cualquier otra índole que, por el volumen de público que atraen, justifique su puesta en funcionamiento. Según informó el Ayuntamiento, el horario de la línea coincidirá con el de las competiciones o eventos que se celebren en este recinto. El servicio empezará a prestarse una hora y media antes del inicio de las actividades en Caja Mágica y finalizará una hora después de que éstas acaben. La línea arranca hoy con un primer servicio en Legazpi a las 15.50 horas y el último servicio en Caja Mágica a las 22.00 horas, coincidiendo con el festival "Unidos por la Infancia", que acoge un concierto de David Bisbal y un partido de tenis entre Rafa Nadal y Roger Federer. Mañana, jueves, la línea de la EMT funcionará entre las 19.15 y las 23.15 horas con motivo del partido de baloncesto entre el Real Madrid y el Spirou Charleroi de la Euroliga. El Servicio Especial de autobuses a Caja Mágica funcionará siempre que haya partido del equipo madrileño de baloncesto. Esta línea especial no realiza ninguna parada intermedia a lo largo de su trayecto, que discurre desde la plaza de Legazpi por el paseo del Molino, la plaza de Italia y la calle Embajadores (prolongación) hasta el aparcamiento de Caja Mágica, con un tiempo de recorrido, en condiciones normales, que no supera los 10 minutos entre ambos puntos.

description.hltext_display: ”Upplever ingen kris”
description.author: Johan Hedlund
description.content:
Tre segrar – 13 förluster. Lennart Grundel, 44, har fått en tuff start på sitt jobb som tränare för Eco Örebro i basketligan. Men värmlänningen står stadigt i stormen. – Jag har aldrig upplevt det som någon kris, säger han.
Örebro har haft det jobbigt under hösten i basketligan och radat upp förluster. Men lagets Arvikabördige coach behåller lugnet.
– Jag tycker egentligen inte att det gått trögt för oss över huvud taget. Vi har kört på enligt planen och utvecklats hela tiden, säger Lennart Grundel.
Publik och media i Örebro är inte riktigt av samma åsikt.
– Man märker att det finns höga krav på oss. De är inte nöjda med att vi ligger längst ned i tabellen. Och det vill vi ju inte heller, på sikt är ambitionen att bli ett stabilt ligalag.
Eco Örebro gick upp i basketligan för två år sedan och slutade näst sist under debutsäsongen. Grundel leder nu laget under det erkänt svåra andra året.
– Det är klart det är en tuff uppgift. Ligan håller oerhört hög klass, högre än man kan tro. I fjol var Jämtland ett stryklag, i år finns det inget sådant lag alls.
Just Jämtland vann i går kväll en oerhört viktig hemmamatch i bottenkampen mot Örebro.
Örebro tvingade fram en femte period men föll till slut med 98–96, hemmalaget avgjorde med en trepoängare i samband med slutsignalen. Tungt och knäckande för närkingarna vars slutspelsdröm nu hänger på en skör tråd. Laget har sex poäng upp till en slutspelsplats i dagsläget.
– Jag tror fortfarande att vi kan gå till slutspel, vi har visat att vi är jämbördiga med de flesta lagen i ligan.
Lennart Grundel är ändå tillfreds med sitt basketliv för tillfället. Det var han inte riktigt under den sista tiden i damlaget Malbas från Malmö, där han var både tränare och sportchef.
Hade inte erbjudandet kommit från Örebro kanske Grundel försvunnit från basketscenen.
– Ju mer man är med om, desto högre tröskel är det för att hitta nya utmaningar. Hade jag inte fått det här erbjudandet i somras kanske det inte hade blivit någon basket alls i höst. Kanske aldrig mer...
– Jag behövde verkligen den här utmaningen, säger Grundel som under hösten tog examen i ETU, Riksidrottsförbundets högsta ledarutbildning, och kan därmed titulera sig internationell coach.
Kanske väntar ett uppdrag utanför landets gränser så småningom?
Först hoppas 44-åringen forma Eco Örebro till det stabila ligalag klubben vill bli. Återstår att se om han lyckas med det redan i år.
– Vi har en positiv trend och utvecklingen går åt rätt håll. Vår högstanivå är hög och lägstanivån blir bara högre och högre, så jag är definitivt hoppfull, säger Lennart Grundel.

description.hltext_display: Inscrição: UFS lança edital com 6 vagas para professor efetivo
description.content:
Estão abertas as inscrições para o concurso público destinado ao cargo de professor efetivo. São ofertadas seis vagas para os campi de São Cristóvão e de Itabaiana, na categoria de professor assistente (mestre) e adjunto (doutor). Veja o Edital nº 026/2010 na página de concursos da UFS.
As inscrições são realizadas na Divisão de Recrutamento e Seleção de Pessoal (Diresp/GRH) no período de 6 de dezembro de 2010 a 14 de janeiro de 2011. Em virtude do recesso de final de ano no período de 24 a 31 de dezembro de 2010, não haverá recebimento de inscrições.
O salário inicial para professor assistente é R$ 4.651,59 e para professor adjunto R$ 7.333,67.
Outras informações pelo e-mail concursos@ufs.br ou pelo telefone 79-2105-6518.

description.hltext_display: Winterthur Technology: chiffre d'affaires en hausse de 36%
description.content:
Sur la période janvier-septembre, le chiffre d'affaires a grimpé de 36% à 133,6 millions d'euros (167 millions de francs), a précisé l'entreprise. Pour rappel, Winterthur Technology avait déjà enregistré une hausse des ventes de plus de 30% à la clôture du 1er semestre de cette année, après avoir connu une phase difficile.
Les entrées de commandes ont crû de 81,4% durant la période sous revue. Ce bond, qui confirme la reprise conjoncturelle, permet "d'anticiper un très beau succès commercial pour l'entier de l'année 2010, mais aussi pour le premier trimestre 2011", se réjouit le groupe.
La société emploie quelque 1300 personnes en Suisse, Allemagne, Autriche, Suède, Belgique, Etats-Unis, Russie, Chine et Koweït. Elle a réalisé en 2009 des recettes d'environ 137 millions d'euros, une dégringolade de 37,2% par rapport à l'année précédente.

description.hltext_display: AISNE/ARDENNES. Vingt départements de la moitié nord de la France, dont l'Aisne et les Ardennes, ont été placés en vigilance orange par Météo France. Des chutes de neige sont attendues en fin de journée.
description.content:
Vingt départements de la moitié nord de la France, de la Loire-Atlantique aux Ardennes, ont été placés en vigilance orange par Météo France en raison de chutes de neige attendues mercredi en fin de journée.
Par ailleurs, la vigilance orange est décrétée pour la Moselle et le Bas-Rhin en raison de risques de crue. Les chutes de neige atteindront de 5 à 10 cm sur les départements de l'Ile-de-France, sur l'Aisne (02), les Ardennes (08), l'Eure (27), l'Eure-et-Loir (28), l'Ille-et-Vilaine (35), la Loire-Atlantique (44), le Maine-et-Loire (49), la Mayenne (53), le Morbihan (56), l'Oise (60), l'Orne (61) et la Sarthe (72).
La pluie traversera dans la matinée l'Aquitaine et les Charentes avant de remonter vers le nord où, en butant sur l'air froid, elle se transformera en neige sur le nord des Pays de la Loire et les collines normandes.
"Ces chutes de neige s'étendront en soirée et la nuit suivante au bassin parisien et aux Ardennes et pourraient être précédées d'un peu de verglas", prévient Météo France.
"Cet épisode neigeux débutera vers 18h00 sur le Pays de Loire, 19h00 sur l'Ile-de-France, 20h00 sur la Bretagne, le sud de Normandie et la Picardie", selon les prévisionnistes de Météo France.

description.hltext_display: Flere har alvorlige spilleproblemer
description.content:
Etter tre år med Norsk Tippings automatmonopol har antall nordmenn med alvorlige spilleproblemer økt med 70 prosent.
Fotball Live
fredag 21. jan. kl. 12:00
Lillestrøm - Hønefoss
Kampstart om:
30 dager 18 timer 47 min. 41 sek.
Søk i skattelistene
Søk på navn og/eller sted
Eksempel: Ola Nordmann Oslo
Se topplister i ditt postnr.
Eksempel: 2815
Se topplister i Kommuner
Gran Jevnaker Lunner
Jeb J. om Bygdefolk sier ja til ulv
hans M. Ø. om Bygdefolk sier ja til ulv
yngve h. om – Data-nei svekker krim-innsats
Inger M. om Ni av ti sier nei, Jens
hans M. Ø. om – Data-nei svekker krim-innsats
edgar b. om – Oljepenger er ingen garanti
Tips en venn på e-post:
Din kommentar
Del på nettet:
Men det er blitt mindre spilleproblemer sett under ett.
87 prosent har ingen problemer, men det er de dårligst stilte som rammes hardest. Tallene fremkommer i en undersøkelse Synovate har gjort for Norsk Tipping om det norske folks spillevaner, skriver Aftenposten.
Synovate konkluderer med at graden av spilleproblemer sett under ett i befolkningen er blitt mindre siden 2005. Men det er bare en del av bildet siden det er blitt flere som har alvorlige problemer. Mens man i 2008 mente det var 48.000 eller 1,3 prosent som hadde alvorlige spillproblemer, er tallet i år vokst til 81.000, eller 2,1 prosent.
– Vi har sett en polarisering innenfor spilleavhengigheten. Flere har ingen problemer, mens flere har alvorlige problemer. Først og fremst skyldes dette utbredelsen av nettspill, men også andre spill som bingo og spilleautomater har økt omsetningen, sier Kristin Rogge Pran fra Synovate, forfatter av undersøkelsen Spillevaner og spilleproblemer i befolkningen 2010.
Styreformann Lars Sponheim i Norsk Tipping sier at veksten og problemene skyldes bingoautomater og utenlandske nettspill.
– Problemene oppstår i forbindelse med nett-, heste- og oddsspill. Jeg er fremdeles overbevist om at det er best å kanalisere spillingen inn under vår ansvarlighetslinje, sier Sponheim. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Acehnese Man Freed Of Drug Trafficking Charge
description.content: SHAH ALAM, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- An Acehnese man escaped the hangman's noose when the High Court here today acquitted and discharged him on a charge with trafficking in 7,269 grammes of cannabis last year. Justice Dr Badariah Sahamid made the decision after she was satisfied that Ishak Abdurrahman, 31, had succeeded in raising doubts against the prosecution's case. Ishak, who owns a barber shop, was charged with trafficking in the drug in front of the Tesco Supermarket, Jalan Setia Prima SU 13/5 here, about 12.30am on March 1, 2009. The offence, under Section 39B (1)(a) of the Dangerous Drugs Act 1952, carries the mandatory death sentence upon conviction. In her judgment, Badariah said the court accepted Ishak's testimony that he was arrested in front of his barber shop and not in front of the Tesco Supermarket as claimed by the police. The police, she said, also failed to investigate into claims by Ishak that the drug was found elsewhere and belonged to somebody else. "The testimony by the accused's wife and friend who saw the accused being arrested in front of his shop and saw him (accused) holding no drugs at all supported the accused's defence and failed to be challenged by the prosecution. "In conclusion, there were reasonable doubts whether the accused actually owned the drug," she added. Deputy public prosecutor Yeong Leu Shin prosecuted, while Ishak was represented by lawyer Ariff Azami Hussein. -- BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: Hercogova bo BoĹžiÄku pisala za prvo zmago na turnirjih WTA
description.content:
Ocena 4,2 od 5 glasov Ocenite to novico!
Hercogova je trenutno najvišje uvrščena Slovenka na lestvici WTA. Foto: EPA
Med pripravami na novo sezono se je Hercogova posvetila predvsem nabiranju fizične moči. Foto: MMC RTV SLO
Hercogova bo Božičku pisala za prvo zmago na turnirjih WTA
Maribor - MMC RTV SLO/STA
Polona Hercog bo novo teniško sezono začela 2. januarja na turnirju v Brisbanu. Njena želja za prihodnje leto je izboljšati 47. mesto na lestvici WTA.
Hercogova, ki bo 20. januarja dopolnila 20 let, bo 26. decembra odpotovala v Avstralijo, kjer bo nato nastopila na turnirjih v Brisbanu, Sydneyju in nato na prvem grand slamu sezone v Melbournu. Priprave na novo sezono je opravila doma, posvetila pa se je predvsem nabiranju fizične moči.
"Za menoj je odlična sezona, ki sem jo končala med prvih 50 igralk na svetu, kar je bila moja tiha želja že več let, saj predstavlja prvo stopničko na vzponu do najboljših na svetu. Sicer je bilo vmes nekaj padcev, vendar splošni vtis je zelo dober. Vsekakor bi izpostavila finale v Acapulcu, nastop v Roland Garrosu ter dobre igre v Portorožu," je o pretekli sezoni povedala Hercogova, ki te dni uživa v domači Kamnici pri Mariboru.
Igra dvojic kot trening za nastope med posameznicami
"Želja v prihodnjem letu je zagotovo prva zmaga na turnirjih WTA in končati sezono med prvih 30 igralk na svetu. V igri imam še precej rezerv, na katerih pridno vadim, letos pa bom posebno pozornost namenila tudi igri dvojic, saj je to odličen trening za nastope med posameznicami," pravi Hercogova. Njena partnerica v parih bo, ko bo to obema dovoljeval program turnirjev, Hrvatica Petra Martić.
Želi si ostati v svetovni skupini
Pomemben termin v njenem koledarju bo 5.- 6. februar, ko bo Slovenija v prvem krogu pokala Fed v svetovni skupini gostila Nemčijo. Dvoboj bo v dvorani Lukna v Mariboru. "Nastopanje v pokalu Fed mi ogromno pomeni, saj sem si od nekdaj želela nastopati za svojo državo. Občutki, ko se s kolegicami veseliš zmage, so lepi in edinstveni, saj je tenis v glavnem individualni šport in takih priložnosti na turnirjih nimamo. Tokrat se bomo morale še bolj potruditi, saj smo se lani prebile v svetovno skupine in želimo v njej tudi obstati," je povedala Hercogova ob robu dobrodelne akcije "Daruj igračko, podari nasmešek", ki jo je pripravila s pomočjo Mariborske knjižnice in vrtca Studenci. Materinskemu domu in otrokom iz socialno ogroženih družin je podarila štiri kombije igrač.

description.hltext_display: Primeiro-Ministro participa no III Fórum da Democracia
description.content:
Nos dias 9 e 10 de Dezembro, decorreu, em Bali, o III Fórum da Democracia subordinado ao tema “Democracia e Promoção da Paz e Estabilidade”. Foram 44 os países da região Ásia-Pacífico convidados a participarem neste Fórum e 24 países e organizações internacionais como observadores.
O Primeiro-Ministro, Kay Rala Xanana Gusmão, foi um dos Chefes de Estado presentes neste Fórum, presença essa que muito agradecida pelo Ministro dos Negócios Estrangeiros da República da Indonésia, a quem coube o discurso inicial da cerimónia de abertura.
O Ministro dos Negócios Estrangeiros, R.M. Marty M. Natalegawa, relembrou os Fóruns da Democracia anteriores e o desenvolvimento que têm vindo a registar no que respeita à arquitectura da democracia na região asiática. Como país organizador, a Indonésia demonstra o seu compromisso, como membro da comunidade internacional, em continuar a promover os valores democráticos.
Começando por realçar o acréscimo significativo do número de países participantes e observadores, o Ministro destacou alguns factos que daí se podem concluir: “Primeiro, a democracia está a progredir nos países da Ásia e do Pacífico. Em segundo lugar, demonstra claramente que os países da Ásia e do Pacífico estão profundamente empenhados nos valores democráticos. Valores democráticos da inclusão, igualdade e participação aberta por todas as pessoas. Os valores democráticos que são universais, mas crescem e emergem a partir das aspirações do povo.”
Passou em perspectiva o I Fórum, cujo tema se centrou na busca dos países da região a adoptar a democracia, e o II Fórum, que foi dedicado à concentração de esforços para coordenar a democracia e o desenvolvimento sob o ponto de vista da cooperação na região. Este ano, o III Fórum “... pretende explorar, em profundidade, a forma como um sistema democrático pode criar e proporcionar paz e estabilidade política, de modo que as pessoas possam viver com confiança na sua segurança. Este tema reflecte o nosso compromisso comum em garantir que a democracia traz benefícios concretos para o povo.”
R.M. Marty M. Natalegawa terminou o seu discurso reforçando o facto de que os valores democráticos podem criar a paz, prevenir conflitos e resolvê-los através do diálogo e da reconciliação assim como alcançar a estabilidade e segurança política a nível nacional, regional e global.
Xanana Gusmão falou no primeiro dia do Fórum, na Sessão de Líderes, do qual fizeram parte, entre outros, o Presidente da República da Coreia (Co-Presidente do Fórum) e o Sultão do Brunei Darussalam, e sobre o tema “Democracia e a Promoção da Paz e Estabilidade”.
O discurso do Primeiro-Ministro começou por relembrar que, entre os países representados, Timor-Leste é o país mais jovem e a mais jovem democracia. Falou dos esforços desenvolvidos após a Independência, em prol de um país democrático, e refere que Timor-Leste ainda não se pode dar como satisfeito. Reconhece a necessidade do desenvolvimento económico e social sem os quais não existe o equilíbrio social necessário à estabilidade e à democracia.
Recordou o “Diálogo Internacional sobre a Construção da Paz e a Construção dos Estados”, que decorreu em Díli e contou com a participação do “g7 plus”, e da partilha de experiências dos Estados frágeis no sentido de encontrar soluções para a promoção da estabilidade e paz mundial.
Reconhecendo que a democracia nem nos países desenvolvidos é perfeita, o Primeiro-Ministro acrescenta que “construir um Estado democrático, com a participação de todos, em sociedades que desconhecem o que é ser-se livre da miséria, da fome ou da ignorância, em sociedades em que os conflitos podem surgir por simples motivos como o acesso à água, aos alimentos, às terras, à educação ou aos cuidados de saúde básicos - é um desafio tremendo!”.
Congratulou-se pelos vários exemplos de sucesso, de países em processo de transição, na região da Ásia e mostrou o empenho de Timor-Leste em entrar para a Associação de Nações do Sudeste Asiático (ANSA/ASEAN).
Kay Rala Xanana Gusmão defendeu que, ainda que o país possa não estar preparado para ser membro efectivo desta Associação, “Estamos cientes de que, do ponto de vista geopolítico e geoestratégico, a nossa adesão pode contribuir para garantir a segurança e estabilidade regional, ou seja, mais do que benefícios no contexto económico, a entrada na ASEAN representa para Timor-Leste uma oportunidade de ser um agente activo promotor da paz e estabilidade regional”.
No segundo, e último, dia deste Fórum, destacaram-se as Sessões Interactivas cujos temas foram: “Como o sistema democrático ajuda a prevenir a ocorrência ou agravamento de conflitos violentos” e “Porque é que a democracia e o desenvolvimento económico são essenciais para a construção da paz”.

description.hltext_display: Dallas ends Heat's run
description.content:
Miami's 12-game winning streak ended with a 98-96 loss to the Dallas Mavericks in Tuesday's NBA action.
It was Dallas' 14th consecutive regular season win over the Heat, and they were the last team to beat Miami before their latest victory at the American Airlines Arena.
Forward Dirk Nowitzki led the way for the Mavericks, shooting 26 points and getting nine rebounds, while Jason Terry added 19.
ord=Math.random()*10000000000000000; document.write(''); Miami's 'Big Three' stood tall despite the defeat, LeBron James, Chris Bosh and Dwyane Wade combining for 60 points.
The Washington Wizards ended a seven-game losing streak when they thrashed Charlotte 108-75, despite the continuing absence of number one draft pick John Wall and the departure of Gilbert Arenas to Orlando.
Arenas made a losing debut for the Magic, shooting 10 points in their 91-81 loss to Atlanta.
The Utah Jazz had five players shoot 15-plus in their 101-90 victory over Cleveland.
CJ Miles (22 points), Deron Williams (17), Raja Bell (19), Al Jefferson (16) and Paul Millsap (19) were the prolific scorers for the Jazz.
Mike Dunleavy tipped in the winning points on the buzzer to hand Indiana a thrilling 94-93 victory over New Orleans.
Danny Granger's long-range shot tickled the rim, before Dunleavy fought off a fierce challenge for the rebound to net the winning points for the Pacers.
The San Antonio Spurs brought up their ninth consecutive victory with a 118-110 triumph over Phoenix. Tim Duncan stole the show with 20 points and 15 rebounds.
LaMarcus Aldridge came away with 29 points and a career-high 19 rebounds as the Portland Trailblazers beat the Milwaukee Bucks 106-80.
Australian Patrick Mills played 29 minutes off the bench for the winners on his way to nine points on 4-of-9 shooting (no threes) with three rebounds and seven assists.
The Houston Rockets recorded their fifth win in six games with a 121-112 victory over the Golden State Warriors, while the Los Angeles Clippers led from the outset on their way to beating the Minnesota Timberwolves 113-90.

description.hltext_display: European shares edge up; ARM soars
description.content:
LONDON, Dec 22 - European shares edged up in early trade on Wednesday, having hit a 27-month high in the previous session, and with Microsoft supplier, ARM ARM.L, higher after media reports that Microsoft plans new windows for tablets.
At 0821 GMT, the FTSEurofirst 300 .FTEU3 index of top European shares was up 0.1 percent at 1,146.83 points, after rising 1.1 percent in the previous session to its highest close since September, 2008. "Investors will be happy to see the market close off the year with a decent gain," said Richard Jeffrey chief investment officer at Cazenove Capital Management. "There's a lot of macro information today that may influence people's thinking on 2011." Chip designer ARM rose more than 8 percent on reports Microsoft MSOFT.O is planning new windows for tablets. Later, investors' attention will turn to U.S. economic data, such as home sales and GDP growth.

description.hltext_display: "어린이 크리스마스 선물, 닌텐도 게임기가 최고"
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
이마트 설문조사
올해 어린이들이 가장 받고 싶은 크리스마스 선물로 닌텐도 게임기가 꼽혔다. 신세계 이마트는 4~5일 전국 20개 매장에서 5세 이상 어린이 700명을 대상으로 '크리스마스에 받고 싶은 선물'을 설문조사한 결과 총 응답자 중 가장 많은 19.2%가 닌텐도DS나 닌텐도Wii를 꼽았다고 22일 밝혔다.
닌텐도 게임기는 지난 2004년 국내에 첫 선을 보인 후 2007년부터 3년간 이마트 완구 매장에서 크리스마스 선물 1위 자리를 지켜왔다. 설문 결과 파워레인저(6.1%)와 뽀로로(6.0%), 레고(4.7%) 등이 그 뒤를 이었다. 김성호 이마트 완구담당 바이어는 "닌텐도 게임기가 올해도 크리스마스 선물 시장에서의 주도권을 이어나갈 것으로 예상된다"고 말했다.
한편 그간 닌텐도 게임기가 충분히 팔린 만큼 다른 상품도 상대적으로 좋은 성과를 거둔다는 관측도 나오고 있다. 이와 관련 이마트측은 가족 지향적인 가치소비 경향이 점차 확산되는 만큼 가족 모두가 함께 즐길 수 있는 '아날로그 완구'인 블록 완구 판매가 늘어날 것으로 예측했다.

description.hltext_display: How to Find a Legitimate Ukrainian Online Dating Service
description.content: Many Ukrainian and Russian online dating sites are simply scams trying to lure you in, and then demanding you hand over your money and making promises they cannot keep. I know that there are a lot of emotions that go into finding a soul mate, many websites know this as well and may be willing to prey on these emotions involved to scam you, so take some of the following advice into consideration before choosing a company to work with. If you are serious about finding Ukrainian women for marriage, search out your online agency carefully. Ask around to find a legitimate service. Websites that ask for random payments to be paid or sent to the Ukraine or if you receive e-mails from women claiming to be "lonely" and asking for money to be sent for their Visa, are most likely not legitimate. Men who have successfully met Ukrainian women for marriage were expected to go through a process, which included flying to the Ukraine and Russia and meeting a woman first for compatibility factors and then going through an entire legal process. Your Ukrainian and Russian online dating site should be skilled to assist with this. Ask your Ukrainian and Russian online dating agency for references of their former clients. Be sure to call a few references and ask a lot of questions. In my opinion, the agency should be able to lay out for you everything that goes into this process. I would never complete an international child adoption without having assistance from trained agency professionals that could lay out the process for me. Neither should you do that with a future spouse. Make sure the agency is taking into consideration what a big decision this is. An agency that minimizes the process and legalities and focuses in on promises of "beautiful Ukrainian models" may not be the right dating site to choose. As you make this life changing decision keep in mind that on the other side of your decision is a woman who for their own reasons is choosing to meet a stranger to find love as well. Finding an agency that makes sure there is compatibility and is sensitive to the process is just as important as making sure you follow all the legalities of the procedures. Ultimately, if you keep your head focused and your heart open you may be able to find happiness in this process! Krystyna is a dating and intercultural relationship expert and founder of the Ukrainian Dating Blog. If you learn to read and learn more on how you can deal with intercultural differences in the relationship with a Ukrainian woman and win her heart don't hesitate and visit Krystyna's advice and tips blog about Ukrainian woman and culture.

description.hltext_display: Argentina: Giorgi prepara visita a China
description.content:
La ministra de Industria, Débora Giorgi, prepara una visita oficial a China para enero próximo y con el propósito de lograr una mayor diversificación de las exportaciones.
Con ese objetivo la secretaria de Estado se reunió en Buenos Aires con el embajador chino en el país, Gang Zeng, y juntos acordaron avanzar en el ingreso de productos argentinos al país oriental y alentar inversiones en ambos países. "Necesitamos diversificar las exportaciones hacia China con presencia de productos con mayor valor agregado" , afirmó la ministra de Industria
Durante el viaje al gigante asiático, y según consignó el portal de la Presidencia, Giorgi se entrevistará con su par oriental, Chen Deming, para profundizar la asociación comercial estratégica que encaró el gobierno con China a partir de la visita de la presidenta Cristina Fernández en julio pasado.
"Argentina busca reequilibrar el intercambio de valor agregado y trabajo planteando una asociación comercial estratégica que contemple el acceso al mercado chino de alimentos y manufacturas. Además, nuestro país tiene recursos naturales, mano de obra e incentivos para la inversión extranjera que permitirían a los capitales chinos producir alimentos elaborados para China y el mundo desde Argentina" , expresó la ministra.
LATAM: Reporte
Los comentarios emitidos por lectores de Publimetro en este espacio son responsabilidad de sus autores y no reflejan el punto de vista del periódico. Si algún comentario les parece ofensivo, favor de reportarlo para evitar abusos. Gracias.

description.hltext_display: 摩托罗拉豪言带用户进入新时代
description.content:
在昨天摩托罗拉放出一段平板机演进历史的视频中，他们单挑了三星的Galaxy Tab和苹果的iPad，现在摩托罗拉又在官网中放出豪言：你准好进入下一个时代了吗？
在视频中，摩托罗拉戏称iPad是一个大号的iPhone，Galaxy Tab虽然使用的是Android系统，但是版本仍然是用于手机的。他们的新平板设备将搭载蜂窝系统，该版本将会针对平板机设备进行优化。
现在官网上已经出现了倒计时牌，时间的终点就在两周之后的CES 2011国际消费电子展，届时摩托罗拉将会放出多款新设备，其中包含的就有视频中隐喻的蜂窝系统平板机。
摩托罗拉的下一代指的就是双核时代，除了双核Tegra 2平板机之外，他们还将会推出多款Tegra 2双核手机，包括Etna、奥林巴斯等等。有消息称，摩托罗拉的Tegra 2手机将会和多个运营商合作，也就说除了以上两款手机之外，还可能会再出现两款此前从未曝光的摩托罗拉双核手机产品。

description.hltext_display: Dubai World arm cuts stake in Australia for $1.5B
description.content:
DUBAI, United Arab Emirates -- DP World, the port management arm of indebted state conglomerate Dubai World, sold the bulk of its Australian businesses to a Citi investment fund Wednesday for $1.5 billion.
Unloading the stake will help the sea cargo handler pay down debt and retain a foothold in Australia while it focuses on emerging markets that have fueled much of its growth.
Under the terms of the deal, DP World will keep a 25 percent stake and continue to manage the ports in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide and Fremantle.
It is selling the remaining 75 percent in the Australian operations to Citi Infrastructure Investors, a private equity division of the New York-based bank.
DP World CEO Mohammed Sharaf told reporters it was not part of a broader effort to dismantle the company's globe-stretching operations.
"We're not in a selling spree out there. We're talking about bringing in strategic partners," he said. "They approached us."
DP World is one of Dubai's more profitable state-linked companies. It ranks as the world's fourth largest port operator, with business at 50 cargo terminals on six continents, including the Mideast's largest in Dubai.
It pulled in $219.2 million in profit in the first half of this year.
The company is part of the city-state's struggling Dubai World conglomerate, but was exempted from its parent's $24.9 billion debt restructuring effort.
DP World said it expects to retain its existing management and staff in Australia. It employs about 2,100 people throughout the country, according to a corporate website.
The $1.5 billion it expects to generate includes the repayment of debts held by the Australian division.
DP World has had a presence in Australia since 2005, when it took over operations in Adelaide following the acquisition of U.S. railroad operator CSX Corp.'s international port business.
It gained operational control of the other four ports through its buyout of Britain's Peninsular and Oriental Steam Navigation Co. the following year.
The agreements that give DP World the right to manage the five ports run for an average of more than two decades, following recent deals to renew its concessions at Adelaide, Brisbane and Sydney, according to the company.
Yuvraj Narayan, DP World's chief financial officer, said all proceeds from the Citi sale will go toward paying down the company's debt.
Executives expect the deal to close toward the end of the first quarter next year.
