description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.author: JOELLE TESSLER
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: New physician comes to Reedsport (119)
description.content:
» New physician comes to Reedsport
Dr. Douglas Johnson is a new internal medicine doctor at the Lower Umpqua Hospital.
Umpqua Post/Deborah Yates
Dr. Douglas Johnson is a new internal medicine doctor at the Lower Umpqua Hospital.
Previous Next
Photo 1 of 3
Wednesday, December 15, 2010 | No comments posted.
Being a doctor is no guarantee that your practice, your job or your patients will be there until you retire or decide to move on. This is a life lesson that Dr. Douglas Johnson, one of the new internal medicine doctors at Lower Umpqua Hospital, learned the hard way.
For 20 years, Johnson experienced what it was like to have the town in which he worked economically destroyed as mills and automobile plants were closed.
Johnson is a Portland native. He graduated from Portland State University in 1974, just in time to compete with the medics returning from Vietnam for a place in physician’s assistant school.
“There were only two PA schools in the U.S.,” Johnson said. “I was accepted in Alderson Broaddus College in West Virginia. It was a four-year program, but because I had a bachelor’s degree in health science, I only had to take the medical classes.”
Johnson finished the program, but decided that he wanted to attend medical school. It was late 1977. He was accepted into the West Virginia School of Osteopathic Medicine in Lewisburg, W.Va.
“The difference between traditional and osteopathic medical school is found in the first two years of school,” he said. “During those two years, the osteopathic students learn how to manipulate the spine, hips, and other joints in the body. During years three and four, the students practice manipulative therapy.”
But Johnson was interested in internal medicine, not joint manipulation. By the time he finished his residency in internal medicine, he had left manipulation far behind he said.
Johnson did his residency in the 400-bed Flint OD Hospital in Flint, Mich. He finished his residency in June of 1986. Now it was time to pay the bill.
To help pay for medical school, Johnson accepted a Public Health Corps scholarship that paid for his tuition, fees and living expenses. In return, he agreed to work in medically underserved areas for two years after graduating from medical school.
To pay his debt, he served one year in a small town in a West Virginia “hollow,” and the second year in a hospital and five clinics in downtown Indianapolis, Ind.
“I worked in a 1,100-bed hospital with 600 to 700 internal medicine doctors on the staff,” Johnson said. “It was a huge place.”
Completing his commitment in 1989, he moved to Flint. He opened a practice there in the bedroom community of Davison.
It was not the most lucrative area in which to open a medial practice, but Johnson felt he was needed in the poor neighborhoods. The economy in the area had been in trouble since 1973, when 30,000 people were laid off. By then, he said, the trained and educated people had moved on. When he closed his practice in 2008, 70,000 people had lost their jobs.
Johnson was now unemployed as well. He began to work for Locum Tenens, a company that provided substitute doctors for private medical practices and hospitals.
“I worked in the southeast Michigan area,” Johnson said. “It is tough work. After one year I said ‘no more.’”
Johnson’s family still lived in Portland. He asked them how things were going there. They told him the area’s diverse population had grown by a million people in 15 years. That sounded really good to him.
Johnson arrived back in Portland on Halloween of last year. A number of places were looking for doctors, including Reedsport. He often thought that he would like to live on the Oregon coast so he could learn to fish again, he said.
So, he came to Reedsport to work for 10 days to see if the situation was a fit. He then signed a three-year agreement to work at the hospital and its Reedsport Clinic. But he really wants the position to become permanent. To him, many of the people in Reedsport have the right attitude in wanting to stay away from medications and to do the right things concerning their bodies.
“I am hoping that after I complete the three-year agreement, they will like me enough to keep me around for another 15 years,” Johnson said with a merry laugh.
Staff writer Deborah Yates can be contacted at dyates@theworldlink.com, or (541) 271-7474, ext. 206. This and other articles can be found online at www.theumpquapost.com

description.hltext_display: Options Update: Put Volume Explodes as NRG Energy Hovers Near Annual Lows
Veolia Gets 12-Year Contract To Operate Rail Lines In Germany
description.content:
Veolia Environ. (EU:VIE)
Intraday Stock Chart
French utility Veolia Environnement SA (VIE.FR) said Wednesday it got a tender for a contract to operate rail lines in Germany and Austria for a period of 12 years, starting in December 2013.
The contract is worth more than EUR1 billion in cumulated revenues, said Veolia.
The rail lines include the three linking Munich, Rosenheim, Traunstein, Salzburg, Kufstein and Holzkirchen, the company said. Those lines are currently operated by Deutsche Bahn.
-By Inti Landauro, Dow Jones Newswires; +33 1 4017 1740; inti.landauro@dowjones.com

description.hltext_display: Burley girls fall to Century in OT
description.content:
BURLEY - Burley sophomore Aubrie Vale hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer to send the game into overtime, but the Bobcats went scoreless in the extra session and Century escaped with a 44-40 nonconference victory.
Burley trailed by four after three quarters, but Vale rallied her team by scoring nine of her 12 points in the fourth.
Century (4-6) only had one field goal in the fourth quarter and overtime, but the Diamondbacks earned the win at the foul line, knocking down 17 of 22 for the game and 11 of 12 down the stretch. Lynnsie Togiai led Century with 14 points and Kylie Johnson followed with 12.
"We didn't execute down the stretch. They made a few plays and we didn't," said Burley coach Roger Caresia. "We're by far better than we were a month and a half ago. I'm proud of the girls' improvement. We're starting to just settle down and play. But today we left some points, right at the basket, that we have to make in order to beat good teams."
Brooke Bowers led Burley with 14 points.
Burley takes its 2-10 record (1-3 GBC) into the holiday break and will travel to Canyon Ridge on Jan. 6.

description.hltext_display: Rolex Watches: Melrose Jewelers Announces Its Last Chance Christmas Sale on Select Rolex Watches
description.content:
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwire) -- 12/22/10 -- Melrose Jewelers (MelroseJewelers.com), USA's #1 online Rolex watch retailer, today announced its Last Chance Christmas Sale on select Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers is offering up to $200 off select Rolex Datejust watches, and up to $500 off select Rolex President watches in honor of the yearly holiday. The Christmas sale is going on now at http://www.melrosejewelers.com.
Since their inception, Rolex watches have been designed to last forever. In fact, it is quality and timelessness that have been and will be the hallmark of Rolex for years to come. In keeping with the Rolex tradition, there are few better ways to show your appreciation for a loved one than to bestow upon them a gift that will truly last forever.
In fact, AskMen.com ranks wristwatches #1 on their Top 10 List for the best Christmas gift ideas. Since a Rolex is the best watch available, and a wristwatch is the best Christmas gift idea, then buying a Rolex for that special friend or family member is a no-brainer. Furthermore, Melrose Jewelers makes this purchase affordable by selling completely authentic and fully restored pre-owned Rolex watches with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and a full authentication and appraisal by the Associated International Gemological Laboratory.
The Top Five Best Selling Melrose Jewelers on sale watch models are the: (Simply visit MelroseJewelers.com and enter the 3 digit code below into the search box)
1) Men's Silver Dial Beadset Bezel Rolex Datejust Super President (923)
2) Men's Champagne Dial Rolex Day Date President (292)
3) Men's Stainless Steel Black Dial Fluted Bezel Rolex Datejust (322)
4) Ladies Champagne Dial Rolex Super President (404)
5) Ladies' Stainless Steel Silver Dial Beadset Bezel Rolex Datejust (601)
The Christmas promotions on the Men's and Ladies Rolex watches include special discounts on the Men's and Ladies Stainless Steel Rolex Datejust and Two-Tone Rolex Datejust watches as well as the Men's Rolex Day Date President and Mens Rolex Day Date Super President watches. The sale is exclusive to Christmas and will only last for a limited time. Purchasing a watch from Melrose Jewelers also entitles you to free overnight shipping via FedEx to ensure that you have the watch in time for Christmas. Purchase a Rolex today in order to give a gift that will last a lifetime.
About Melrose Jewelers
Melrose Jewelers is the nation's leading online retailer of Rolex wrist watches including mens watches and ladies luxury watches and its associates have, collectively, over 220 years of experience in importing, restoring, and retailing Rolex watches and other luxury watches. Melrose Jewelers was founded with one simple premise: Buying Rolex watches or other luxury watches shouldn't be mysterious or complicated. Similar to the innovative yet simple business models of Progressive Insurance, CarMax, or Blue Nile, Melrose Jewelers provides customers with low, no-haggle pricing, luxury Rolex watches that are either new and unworn or pre owned and restored to original factory specifications both inside and outside, and a comprehensive 2-year warranty. Melrose Jewelers also employs a staff of top university-educated Trained Experts that provide customer service that extends from your initial sales call until years after you've received your purchase. Melrose Jewelers is a proud member of the Jeweler's Vigilance Committee, the Manufacturers and Jewelers Association of America, the International Watch & Jewelry Guild, the National Association of Watch Collectors, and the California Sheriff's Association. Melrose Jewelers uses only Conflict-Free Diamonds and those imported through the Kimberley Process as signed into act by U.S. Congress in 2003. Melrose Jewelers is not an authorized agent or affiliated with Rolex Watches, Rolex USA, Rolex S.A., Rolex International, Breitling, or Patek Philippe luxury watches. Rolex Day Date, Rolex President, Rolex GMT Master, Rolex Daytona, Rolex Oyster Perpetual Datejust, Rolex PearlMaster, Rolex Masterpiece, Rolex Super President, Rolex Submariner, Rolex Yacht-Master, Rolex Explorer and Rolex Sea Dweller are all trademarks of Rolex S.A. Melrose Jewelers' watches contain custom, aftermarket diamonds which will void the warranty of new Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers warranties its watches directly and Rolex S.A. has no obligation to warranty any watches sold by Melrose Jewelers.
Melrose Jewelers, the leading online retailer of the Ladies Rolex President, also hosts the Melrose Jewelers (MJ) Rolex Watch Blog. description.hltext_display: 刘德华开唱露6块腹肌3次流泪 闻朱丽倩即闪
description.content:
刘德华穿芥末黄色的西装，大秀腹肌
综合港台媒体消息，刘德华出道30年，前晚起在香港红磡体育馆一连举办20场演唱会，首场换穿7套衣服，又唱又跳又飞天，大展“铁人”风范，更邀来四大天王之一的黎明担任嘉宾，多年是非一夕化解。
名为“刘德华Unforgettable演唱会2010”共举办20场，每晚都有超过万名粉丝一起见证刘德华30年来在演艺圈的酸甜苦辣，他去年经历瞒婚风暴，形象跌落谷底，如今再度站上红馆开唱，忍不住3度落泪，他哽咽说：“人长大反而不够坚强，虽然我没机会逐一见到你们，记住你们的模样，但每个掌声我都会记住，这是快乐的泪水，没有委曲！”
经典造型 高空献唱
前晚的演唱会上，刘德华以过往30年的经典造型亮相，当中有《无间道》的刘健明、《天若有情》的华Dee，还有少不了的斯文绅士造型，跳拿手的Tic Tac舞，华仔还玩火、烟花和激光等舞台效果，又被吊在30呎高的“铜鞋”上献唱，华仔完全没有做安全措施，看得观众胆战心惊。
合唱《明星》掀起高潮
情绪十分高涨的刘德华整晚满场飞，让歌迷任揽任握手，令歌迷也进入疯狂状态，尖叫声几乎震耳欲聋。
演唱会高潮莫过于神秘嘉宾黎明亮相，在黎明现身前，刘德华特别对歌迷说：“记起过往日子，这位嘉宾曾因为他令你们更珍惜我、支持我，当我找他时，他也有少少怀疑，但我只跟他说，我的歌迷不止支持我一个，叫他放心。现在请大家用热烈掌声欢迎黎明。“歌迷立即起哄欢呼，两人在台上合唱《明星》，二人对望数秒后便来个世纪拥抱，华仔在唱到最后一句“求你在心中记住我” 时望着黎明，黎明回答说“我会。”刘德华坦言很高兴歌迷能如此热烈欢迎对方，亦邀请黎明说几句话，显得略为紧张的黎明笑说：“大家好，我有时懂得说话、有时不太懂，首先很开心华仔这晚叫我前来分享他的喜悦，这是我平日没机会接触到的际遇，今次的经历令我感到很温馨、开心。”接着他更以刘德华的《忘情水》送给当场的歌迷。
晒6块腹肌 闻朱丽倩即闪
“安哥”后，刘德华以鲜黄色套装戴上黑超上台跳MJ舞蹈，随后更露出胸前6块腹肌，令观众大饱眼福。
完成演唱后刘德华接受访问，透露早在3、4个月前已亲自联络黎明，虽对方一口答应，但确实黎明也曾有少许迟疑。问到为何会邀请黎明时，刘德华笑说：“我没办法回答。但他在我这30年内，是个重要角色，演出后令我更加中意他。(他好像有点紧张？独唱时不敢多走几步？)他只是斯文而已！”刘德华称若对方举行个唱邀请他做嘉宾，自己都会答应出席。至于为何落泪3次，华仔称就是感动。落泪是否有感触？他说：“只是高兴和开心。突然觉得很激动，那是开心的泪。”问到太太朱丽倩可有来捧场时，刘德华即“哈哈！”两声就离开了。
1 2 3 4 5 下一页 尾 页

description.hltext_display: Kieler Woche 2011 : Tornado Class opens new Sailing Arena
description.content:
Sail, Fly and Race`nRock at its best in Kiel Sailing City
We are back and better than ever. The Kieler Woche management have announced that our new Speedsailing racing style with Tornados has been added to their program. We will present a new Sailing Arena in the centre of Kiel and we will deliver adrenaline speedsailing races in June 2011 for spectators and the media. TORNADO SAIL`NFLY. Close action, engrossing battles, slick commentary, short races, legendary skippers and all starting on time. It's sailing as we have never seen it before, and tailor-made to be both spectator and media friendly. With the new One Design Tornado we can guarantee the media and spectators that we will start exactly on time with between 1 and 35 knots of wind.
And it is more than a partnership between a class and the Kieler Woche event organization. We want to bring forward our sport into a new era that it is accessible and affordable for all sailors and Nations.
The Kieler Woche is one of the biggest sailing and maritime festivals of the world. In 10 days over 3 million people visit annually. All types of boats are coming to Kiel.
Combined with great music and modern art performances this event really rocks, but this time we want to bring our sport closer than ever to the big audience. We sail in the new Sailing Arena inside the city from 18th to 22nd of June 2011. With 10 boats. Full speed ahead.
For the first time in 129 years of the Kieler Woche, high-performance sailing gets connected to the party life and concerts in the centre of the city. This will bring thousands of people close to the sailing area, where the Tornado will perform. This way we will touch the big mass of people. TORNADO RACE`NROCK. We bring sailing and entertainment together the way it was never seen before. Some of the best international Rockstars will play nearby the new Sailing Arena. We will put the volume up while the Tornado shows the best moves and stunts of sailing.
Spectators and sailors can go straight from sailing into the party life. We present pure adrenaline sailing, where the young generation is present. We will rock the sport of sailing in a new way. Stay tuned!
With this test event we want to present a new way of how Olympic Sailing can look in the future: ...more media We will sail just meters away from the promenade. This makes it easier to set up the cameras and to follow the races for the journalists. Also a crane can give aerial perspectives of the racing and we will have different camera positions on the Tornados. Besides that, we will takes guests sailing to get the journalists closer to our sport. Leading German TV Channels will show the event at primetime. more spectators Spectators will only come if you deliver a big spectacle. With the F1 of Sailing we present the best action with guaranteed exact starting times with between 1 and 35 knots of wind. Our small compressed course area creates emotional sailing at its best. Races are commentated and easy to follow for the spectators and media. more ticket sales Why not sell tickets to the spectators, if we deliver great racing and entertainment? In Kiel we will not do it, because our sponsors will proudly present the Sailing Arena and the concerts for free. But we will sell tickets for corporate and guest sailing on the Tornados. We will also be selling tickets and packages for the VIP area and VIP lounge. .less cost for on-water race management
Any course figuration is allowed in the Sailing Arena. 3 to 5 fixed marks and 2 Ribs needed. A lean race-management and 2 umpires run such an event. The starting line is between a pole on shore and a mark. Signals will be used which every person will understand. We make sailing as simple and visible as possible. Less cost and more action is our target. Our Energy (Wind) is for free! motivation for the youth
With the Tornados we deliver pure adrenaline sailing at its best, the youngsters and kids will watch and love it. Beside the event we will run extra sailing events for the youth. We cooperate with the host clubs & sailing schools to invite the young generation at the Arena to get started with sailing. money for sailing Because a Tornado with its size offers great opportunities for corporate sailing, we sell guest sailing to companies, spectators and via websites to all sailing fans. This is one way for the teams to re-finance Sailing. open Sail and Fly contest
Together with our partners we create an open contest. At this contest every person can win a trip on a Tornado with a Champion. Sailing and Flying on the trapeze with a Tornado is the Ultimate Sailing Experience for every sporty person. This way we get more people connected and introduced to sailing. .. best price-performance ratio for sponsors
With simple concepts and instruments we will create a great sailing spectacle with an excellent price-performance ratio in sailing sport. It is a win-win situation for all. .accessible and affordable for all sailors
Our wish is, to get future Olympic Sailing into a way that sailors and MNAs can finance it. Income for sailors from Sponsors, Spectators, Corporate and Guest Sailing should be a part of it. Same way we save money with a smart logistic system and high quality boats. supporting emerging countries
Because we supply some boats at our event, sailors from all nations can enter without owning a boat. Supplied material is the best and most easy way to motivate emerging and developing nations to step into Olympic sailing. more women Because we promote mixed and women sailing too, we make it easy for women to step into high-speed sailing. We invite all women to sail with us on the Tornado the ultimate experience. Mixed Sailing is on the road to be an Olympic sport for Rio 2016. ...perspectives for the future
Our mission is to create a win-win situation for all who are involved in Olympic Sailing. Our sport has great potential. We use the energy of nature with human power and innovative techniques. Its time to present the very best of sailing in a better way to the media, spectators and sponsors. At the Sailing Arena in Kiel we will show that the Tornado Multihull is the perfect boat for it. speedsailing.org Roland Gaebler Andrew Dowley See mages :

description.hltext_display: Kazımkarabekir'de eğitim toplantıları
description.content:
2010–2011 eğitim-öğretim yılı sürecinde ilde
2010-12-15 - 16:54 tm eğitim kurumlarında kaliteyi artırmak, lke genelinde yapılan SBS ile OKSde ve Ana-Kız Okuldayız projesinde İlin başarısını ykseltmek ve İlin eğitiminin hak ettiği yere gelmesini sağlamak amacıyla hazırlanan "Karaman Eğitiminde Başarıyı Artırıcı alışmalar" konulu toplantının nc ayağı Kazım Karabekir Halk Eğitim Merkezi Toplantı Salonunda yapıldı.
Milli Eğitim heyeti, Başarıyı arttırmak iin daha nce yapmış olduğu toplantının değerlendirmesini yapmak ve yapılan alışmaların alınan kararlarların uygulanmasında karşılaşılan sorunlar ve elde edilen başarıları değerlendirmek iin toplandı. Ayrıca İlin yakaladığı SBS ve OKS bazındaki başarıyı daha yukarı ıkarmak iin ilelerdeki okullarla yakın ilişki iinde olunacağı bildirildi. Bu Haber 224 Defa Okundu

description.hltext_display: Etisalat Misr inks $1.2 bln financing for expansion
description.content: DUBAI, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Etisalat Misr, the Egyptian arm of UAE telco Etisalat on Wednesday signed a 7.2 billion Egyptian pounds ($1.24 billion) financing deal, partly to fund local expansion. The agreement was signed with a consortium of local and regional banks including state-owned National Bank of Egypt, Banque Misr and National Bank of Abu Dhabi, according to a statement on the Qatar News Agency website. (Writing by Amran Abocar; Editing by Jason Benham) ($1=5.806 Egyptian Pound) Keywords: EGYPT ETISALAT/ (amran.abocar@thomsonreuters.com; +971 4 391 8301; Reuters Messaging:amran.abocar.reuters.com@reuters.net) COPYRIGHT Copyright Thomson Reuters 2010. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: FBU Welcomes Decision to Scrap Regional Fire Control Project
description.content:
GATESHEAD, UNITED KINGDOM--(Marketwire - 12/22/10) - North East news desks:
The release of a written ministerial statement by Fire Minister Bob Neill announcing the end of the FiReControl Project was welcomed by the Fire Brigades Union in the North East. The project that would have seen the four local emergency fire control rooms close and replaced with one regional call centre in Durham has been terminated with immediate effect following acceptance by Government and the main contractor Cassidian (formerly EADS) that the requirements of the project cannot be met. This decision follows years of delays and missed deadlines, together with spiralling costs.
The Fire Brigades Union (FBU) refused to accept claims made by Government that the project would lead to greater resilience, cost savings and improved efficiency. Over the past 7 years fire service professionals within the Union have expressed concerns at the deliverability of such a project and believed claims of such benefits were exaggerated.
In his announcement on the 20th December, the Fire Minister identified that "progress on the project had caused serious concerns", earlier in the year the Minister had made it clear to the main contractor that the IT system had to be delivered to time, cost and quality.
What is apparent from this announcement is that project requirements were not going to be fulfilled by Cassidian.
North East FBU Regional Secretary Pete Wilcox said "Common sense has finally prevailed and we will now see an end to good money being thrown after bad. This project was never going to deliver on expectations and it is a decision that should and could have been made a long time ago. We have witnessed valuable tax payers money wasted on a project that should never have seen the light of day. The amount of money squandered on the regionalisation agenda for emergency fire control rooms could have been invested productively in the fire service resulting in real improvements to service delivery in the communities we serve. It is important that we now see a measured response by the Government and Fire and Rescue Services ensuring we see investment in a structure known to work, with solutions delivered that continue to ensure all fire services have suitable and effective mobilising systems. This will be a difficult challenge given the cuts agenda being imposed by the Government across the public sector but one we can not fail to meet." Contact: Contacts:Media contacts:Pete Wilcox07827300063Andy Noble07827300065 Follow

description.hltext_display: Daniel Bacquelaine: contrer "l'union des gauches"
description.content:
Candidat � la succession de Didier Reynders � la tête du MR, Daniel Bacquelaine est revenu sur son credo : défendre les valeurs de liberté et de travail. Il a insisté sur la nécessité pour le MR d'offrir une alternative � "l'union des gauches" en Wallonie et � Bruxelles. Y a-t-il une utilité � la candidature de Daniel Bacquelaine � la présidence du MR ?� Notre journaliste Bertrand Henne relève en effet de nombreuses similitudes dans les programmes défendus par le chef de groupe MR � la Chambre et l'autre candidat, Charles Michel. Alors en quoi Daniel Bacquelaine se distingue-t-il ? Le bourgmestre de Chaudfontaine reconnaît� de nombreuses "convergences" entre les vues de son adversaire et les siennes.
Mais rien d'anormal selon l'invité étant donné que tous les deux sont "des libéraux et des réformateurs".� S'il se présente, dit Daniel Bacquelaine, c'est parce qu'il souhaite "ouvrir le débat" et permettre aux "militants d'avoir la parole" après la période difficile traversée par le MR.
Dans ce débat qu'il vise � ouvrir, Daniel Bacquelaine se pose comme le porteur de "valeurs", en tête desquelles la "liberté réelle" et le� "respect du� travail". Notre invité� se demande par exemple s'il peut y avoir une réelle liberté sans que la sécurité soit assurée.� La sécurité doit donc être "fortement" défendue.
Ensuite, pour ce qui est de la valeur� travail, Daniel Bacquelaine estime qu'il� n'est pas normal que des personnes "qui se sont levées tôt tous les matins pour aller travailler" aient des pensions inférieures � d'autres personnes qui n'ont vécu� que d'allocations sociales. Barre � � droite� pour offrir une� alternative� � � On se souvient que la charte établie par Richard Miller comme document de base programmatique pour le MR� visait clairement un recentrage du parti. Daniel Bacquelaine� ne semble pas en phase avec cette approche car� "la responsabilité du mouvement réformateur est d'offrir aux Wallons et aux Bruxellois un mouvement qui soit autre chose" que ce qu'il désigne comme� "l'union des partis de gauche", � savoir le PS, Ecolo et le cdH.� Il balaie d'un revers de la main l'argument de la possible isolation du MR qui se couperait de toute alliance possible.
"C'est en étant fidèle � soi-même qu'on est utile", avance-t-il. Le MR a dès lors la responsabilité d'offrir un "projet politique qui ne soit pas de gauche" mais au contraire "fortement réformateur".
Pour l'interviewé, il ne faut par exemple� "pas de langue de bois" sur la politique d'immigration, où� il faut allier "générosité et fermeté", ou sur le chômage qui ne peut pas constituer "un plan de carrière". Cependant, il n'est pas partisan d'une limitation dans le temps des allocations de chômage. "On ne peut pas sanctionner quelqu'un qui cherche un travail mais qui n'en trouve pas", par contre il faut sanctionner les "abus" en la matière.
Un repositionnement � droite qui a ses limites puisque lors des� questions des auditeurs, notre invité a précisé qu'il n'y avait pas de "place pour la droite conservatrice" au MR et qu'il ne pensait pas que son parti doive se positionner comme une formation de "droite décomplexée" une appellation qu'il� n'apprécie guère et qu'il laisse � "d'autres"� qui l'utilisent déj� (c'est le cas� du Parti populaire notamment).
Le candidat de "la loyauté"
Daniel Bacquelaine est perçu comme le candidat de la continuité par rapport � Didier Reynders, contrairement � Charles Michel, figure de proue du groupe Renaissance qui avait exigé le départ du ministre des Finances de la présidence du MR.
Daniel Bacquelaine préfère se définir comme le candidat de la "loyauté" puisque, dit-il, il a travaillé avec de nombreux présidents (Jean Gol et� Louis Michel notamment) et qu'il a systématiquement adopté une attitude loyale par rapport � ceux-ci. Il� présente dès lors comme� naturelle sa "fidélité" envers Didier Reynders qui a "bien mené la barque" réformatrice, selon lui.
Une union nationale, sans N-VA, est "envisageable"
Olivier Maingain s'était distancier de la position de Didier Reynders par rapport � la N-VA. Pour le bourgmestre de Woluwé-Saint-Lambert, il est illusoire de vouloir négocier avec Bart De Wever alors que le président du MR est lui d'avis qu'il faut négocier le faire mais selon une nouvelle méthode.
Daniel Bacquelaine a lui une position que l'on pourrait qualifiée d'intermédiaire puisqu'il estime, dans la foulée de Didier Reynders, qu'on peut� "discuter avec tous les partis démocratiques" mais qu'il va falloir "changer de formule" puisque les négociations n'avancent pas. Il va jusqu'� parler de "négociations virtuelles" pour qualifier les discussions en cours.
Cependant, il prend acte des propos d'Olivier Maingain qui "évoque une hypothèse réaliste".� Si la situation l'exige, le candidat � la présidence du MR� pense� "qu'on peut envisager une union nationale", sans la N-VA.22.12.10 - 08:34 Candidat � la succession de Didier Reynders � la tête du MR, Daniel Bacquelaine est revenu sur son credo : défendre les valeurs de liberté et de travail. Il a insisté sur la nécessité pour le MR d'offrir une alternative � "l'union des gauches" en Wallonie et � Bruxelles.

description.hltext_display: Reliance Securities sets up customer care call centre with technology support
description.author: admin
description.content:
Share
With the customer-base increasing rapidly, we plan to increase the head-count tally of the call centre to over 200 next year
Reliance Securities Limited (RSL), a leading retail broking house, announced the setting up of its dedicated call centre to provide customer-centric services with technology support, an official said Tuesday.
"This call centre will help our customers in availing a diverse range of service offerings while allowing them to trade in a hassle-free and time-saving manner over the phone," said Reliance Securities Limited executive director Vikrant Gugnani.
The 100-member team at the call centre, which also includes 55 people for call-n-trade set-up, will respond to clients' queries, their requests and also assist them in placing trading orders.
The call centre is divided into two parts - help desk and dealing desk, with defined job responsibilities. The focus of the help desk is to answer clients' calls on products, services and other related issues, while the dealing desk will primarily update clients on market and assist them in placing orders and tracking their portfolio.
The company has plans to more than double the head count at the call centre in the next one year. "With the customer-base increasing rapidly, we plan to increase the head-count tally of the call centre to over 200 next year," he added.

description.hltext_display: 360校园行走过半个中国 义诊上万台电脑
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 “360校园行‘电脑义诊’活动开始半个月，走遍了半个中国，已经维修的电脑数量超过一万台，效果好到我们自己都想不到。”360校园行活动负责人兴奋地说。
原来，自12月8日起，360联合各高校计算机社团开展了为期一个月的免费电脑义诊活动，目前活动开始半个月，已陆续走过北京、上海、四川、陕西、吉林、甘肃、天津等8个省、市自治区。未来一段时间，还将奔赴全国各地其他高校开展活动。
“在我们的现场，很多同学前来针对自己电脑存在的问题寻求解决措施。活动现场人气不断高涨，关注度异常的高。由于人气太旺，为了节省同学们的等待时间，我们还设计了‘电脑义诊登记表’，电脑有故障的同学做完登记后，我们会进行回访并帮助解决问题。”北理工活动负责人介绍说。
360校园行北理工站，同学们拿着电脑排队等候义诊

description.hltext_display: 网站评比火热进行 严格考验站长实力
description.content:
作为站长，你对自己的网站了解多少?你调查过网友对你网站的认可吗?知道专家对你网站的评估如何吗?相信这些问题时刻都萦绕在站长左右吧。互联网的魅力征服了许多人，试问：当今社会，没有互联网，你的生活还能继续吗?
曾经度过了一天断网的日子，那一天的确很漫长，它给了我很多启示：我们的生活已经被互联网笼罩。各种各样的网站成为调和生活的催化剂，给人们提供全球咨询，方便人们跨距离交流，娱乐。然而在人们浏览的千万网站中，你的网站浏览量达到了多少?相信很多站长都想知道，但由于网民分布过于广泛都无法进行调查吧。12月8号，一个让站长们期待的日子，因为凤凰网的一则活动，为他们提供了许久以来都期盼的平台——凤凰网中文论坛100强评比。
这次活动对站长们之所以重要，无疑与它在2009年首届亮相的成功吧。在2009年，凤凰网首届《中文论坛100强评选》活动中，使全球华人对国内网站有了深入了解，在业界的反响也很大。能进入全球中文前100强，对于一个站长来说，意义相当非凡，那是对站长成绩的肯定。
今年评选活动再度推出，又一次搭建网友与论坛网站的互动纽带，推动互联网论坛更加专业、专注!参加评选的网站比去年来说增加了很多。这次活动对净化论坛风气也是一种推动。评选活动有一项重要流程是“专家综合评估”，水分自然会降低很多。
这次评比对站长们来说，是检验自己能力的客观平台，而不是借机恶意炒作。活动还没结束，已经有网站出现问题。易语言就是其中之一，已经被刷入黑名单，取消参赛资格。目前，评比还在火热进行中，作为站长，心里面澎湃不已，毕竟是对自己实力的一次大考验，对自己的能力测验。现在互联网行业的网站评比活动还很少见，给站长检测自己的平台还远远不够，希望能早日看到更多有价值的平台，促使站长取长补短，更有利于互联网的良性发展。

description.hltext_display: Supermarkets Ready for 11th-hour Christmas Shoppers
description.content:
Information contained on this page is provided by companies via press release distributed through PR Newswire, an independent third-party content provider. PR Newswire, WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith.
SOURCE Hy-Vee, Inc.
The grocery aisles are crowded on Christmas Eve with customers searching for special recipe ingredients and last-minute gift ideas
WEST DES MOINES, Iowa, Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Just as surely as Christmas arrives on December 25th, thousands of customers will be rushing to supermarkets on December 24th to complete their holiday preparations. So what items are most in demand by these last-minute shoppers?
Store directors for Hy-Vee supermarkets throughout the Midwest say Christmas Eve purchases tend to fall into three distinct categories:
Specialty items: Easily overlooked on a regular shopping trip, these are key ingredients critical to the holiday celebration – "cocktail sauce for the shrimp, glaze for the ham, heavy whipping cream for the dessert, batteries for the new electronics," said Bob Trader, director of the Hy-Vee at Empire Mall in Sioux Falls, SD.
Jen Book, director of the Hy-Vee store in Altoona, IA, said the weather dictates some last-minute buys. "If it's icy, we'll have a run on the snow melt products," she said.
Hy-Vee store directors also see shoppers on a mission for specialty items such as cinnamon sticks for hot cider, mincemeat, oyster crackers, olives, spices, Cool Whip, Caro syrup, and cookies and carrots to leave out for Santa and his reindeer.
Stock-up items: These are things people just don't want to run out of at Christmas time, said Jim Lehman, director of the Hy-Vee store on John Deere Road in Moline, IL. "Customers realize the grocery stores are going to be closed on Christmas Day, so they want to make sure they have enough milk, eggs, bread, pop, ice, beer and chips on hand to get them through the holiday," he said.
Trader, of Sioux Falls, says his store closes at 6 p.m. on Christmas Eve, and invariably, there will be customers rushing through the doors at 5:59. "That seems to be their motivation – go to the store on Christmas Eve, or else you do without for a couple days," he said.
Gifts and entertaining: Mark Cortis, director of the Englewood Hy-Vee in Kansas City, MO, said many of his Christmas Eve customers are still hunting for the perfect present. "They're buying gift cards, gift baskets and stocking stuffer items like candy, small toys or even lottery tickets," he said.
"The later the hour, the more impulse buying you see," said Denny Hartogh, director of the Hy-Vee on Locust Street in Dubuque. "We'll sell a lot of seafood trays, candy trays, floral arrangements and higher-end wines and beers. Customers aren't as worried about how much they're spending at that point – it's about finding something special and creative to give as a gift or take to a party."
Jim Ewoldt, director of the Hy-Vee at 156th and Maple, agrees. "At the last minute, you might feel like you didn't spend enough on someone, so you pick up a gift card for them," he said. "Or you decide you need a centerpiece for the holiday table, or a tray of cookies, or a vegetable platter, or a greeting card."
He adds that prepared foods of all kinds tend to be popular on Christmas Eve. "Our Chinese Express and Italian Express departments are busy that afternoon with takeout business," he said. "With the big meal coming on Christmas Day, nobody wants to cook that night."
Hy-Vee, Inc. is an employee-owned corporation operating 231 retail stores in eight Midwestern states. For 2010 the company recorded total sales of $6.9 billion, ranking it among the top 30 supermarket chains and the top 50 private companies in the United States. Visit the company's website at www.hy-vee.com
©2010 PR Newswire. All Rights Reserved.

description.content:
EUROPA PRESS El número 75.869 ha resultado agraciado con uno de los quintos premios del Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad, dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, que ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León. El número 75.869 ha resultado agraciado con uno de los quintos premios del Sorteo Extraordinario de Lotería de Navidad, dotado con 50.000 euros a la serie, que ha recaído en Galicia, Cataluña y Castilla y León.
El número fue cantado a las 9,33 horas en el séptimo alambre de la primera tabla.

description.hltext_display: Selling real estate to children and C21 CEO calls for more real estate training
description.content:
I am one of those girls who secretly loves tabloid fodder. Sure, I may roll my eyes while in line at the grocery store, but as soon as I get to the gym I run over to the magazine rack and steal at least four copies of People for the elliptical. And I'm betting I'm not the only one with TMZ in my "Favorites" bar.Some top producers are reading this now and thinking, "Oh! Well, she doesn't have enough to do, obviously!" But that's not it at all. I have come to discover that checking in on Justin Bieber periodically throughout my day has actually helped me understand my buyers better. Because if you haven't already noticed, buyers are doing things differently these days.My aha moment occurred three weeks ago at Fitness Forever. Under celebrity quips of the day, Katie Holmes was quoted about her apparel choices: "Many times, I'll be getting ready for an event and I'll ask her (Suri, age 4) what she thinks. [Read the full article]
Richard W. "Rick" Davidson, a 20-year real estate industry veteran who was named to this year's "Most Influential Real Estate Leaders" list, was promoted in February to president and CEO of Century 21 Real Estate. He had earlier served as chief operating officer of Coldwell Banker Real Estate LLC and president and chief operating officer for Coldwell Banker Commercial Affiliates.Davidson will participate in a panel at the upcoming Real Estate Connect conference in New York City that will bring together five brokerage brand CEOs from Realogy, the nation's largest real estate brokerage company. The conference, which will mark the 15-year anniversary of Real Estate Connect events, runs from Jan. 12-14, 2011. [Read the full article]
Editor's note: Inman News asked our audience to share their views on what's in store for real estate in the year ahead, and also to list their wishes and resolutions. This is the second installment in a series. (How to participate.) Predictions: There is a shaky yet stronger outlook for real estate in 2011. The industry is still in shambles, considering the foreclosure crisis we are going through, the decline in home equity, and the drop in sales of foreclosed properties.But while these are negative indicators, there are some bright spots in the industry. For one, the index of sales agreements for previously occupied homes rose 10 percent in October, signaling that there are some bullish signs in the market for existing homes.Also, even though Federal Reserve Chairman Ben Bernanke estimates that we have four or five years until unemployment reaches pre-recession levels, that means that there will have to be some incline over the next few years. [Read the full article]
The bond-market blowup seems to have topped: 10-year Treasury notes touched 3.6 percent, and low-fee mortgages 5.125 percent. Each has rocketed 1 full percent in one month.In some ways this explosion makes sense, but in others it's been downright weird. The sensible: We were way overdue for a technical correction from the straight-line drop in rates from April to August. Markets that decline in straight lines rebound in straight lines.An economy underperforming in spring and summer led to thoughts of double-dip, but now the economy is performing better than forecasts, concentrated in retail sales, up 1.2 percent in November, and October revised to +1.7 percent; and in manufacturing, November production up 0.4 percent.All rights reserved. This article may not be used or reproduced in any manner whatsoever, in part or in whole, without written permission of Inman News. Use of this article without permission is a violation of federalcopyright law. [Read the full article]

description.hltext_display: Oregon's Kelly named coach of the year
description.content:
Oregon head coach Chip Kelly has been named the 2010 Walter Camp coach of the year, honoring the college football coach of the year as voted by coaches and sports information directors.
Kelly has taken home the honor in just his second season as the Ducks coach after guiding the team to a 12-0 mark, a No.2 ranking in the polls, and a spot in the national championship game against top-ranked Auburn on January 10.
Kelly took 24 of the 55 votes to beat out Auburn coach Gene Chizik, who took 17 votes.
The Ducks led the nation with 49.3 points per game and ranked second in total offense at 537.5 yards per game. On the defensive side of the ball, the team is giving up just 18.4 points per game, 14th lowest in the nation.
Kelly is the first Oregon coach and third from the Pac-10 to win the award, which has been handed out annually since 1967.
Jim Harbaugh of Stanford finished third with five votes, while Gary Patterson of TCU, the winner of the award last year, and Mark Dantonio from Michigan State each had three votes.
©2010 Sports Network. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.

description.hltext_display: 传化股份顺利通过测量管理体系监督审核
description.content:
在经过为期一天的审核之后，审核组长在末次会议中首先肯定了浙江传化股份有限公司这一年在计量工作方面所做的努力和取得的成绩，很多方面的完成情况已经达到AAA测量管理体系的要求，这也为股份公司十二五规划中有关测量管理体系达到AAA级标准奠定了基础。同时也提出了几点希望和要求，即公司层面应全面梳理各自部门的职责分工，并且牢固树立起计量为企业服务的思想意识；对外部供方的生产销售资质和外部服务方开展检定、校准项目的资质等进行评定；从而确保进一步加强计量工作中的数据管理、测量设备的监视和验证等。之后审核组长宣布：“浙江传化股份有限公司制定的测量管理体系文件基本符合CMS-2006《测量管理体系认证技术标准》、GB/T19022-2003/ISO10012：2003《测量管理体系 测量过程和测量设备的要求》的要求，并基本上能按文件的要求有效运行，测量设备基本能满足顾客、组织和法律法规的要求。对内审和监视中发现的问题能及时采取纠正措施、测量设备基本受控，能溯源至社会公用计量标准”。
测量管理体系管理者代表傅幼林表示，在测量管理体系运行的这一年中可以看出，股份公司的计量工作日趋完善，并且也有信心在不久的将来将股份公司的计量管理工作迈上了一个新的台阶，将计量工作做的更加科学化、规范化和标准化。

description.hltext_display: iRedeemer 1.0 ? Redeem Gift Cards, Certificates, Promo Codes in Seconds
description.content:
Tweet jeTap, Inc. today introduces iRedeemer 1.0 for iOS devices, a free and convenient app that let iOS users redeem iTunes Gift Cards, gift certificates, or AppStore promo codes. Simply enter the promo code in the text field of the screen and press the ?Redeem? button. iRedeemer will take care of contacting the iTunes server and automatically start the iTunes Store with the code already pre-populated. The app provides a convenient way to send a ?Thank You? email or SMS to the generous donator. Reno, Nevada ? jeTap, Inc., today is pleased to introduce iRedeemer 1.0 for iOS devices, a free and convenient app that let iOS users redeem iTunes Gift Card, gift certificate, or AppStore promo codes. iRedeemer has been approved by the AppStore review team and it is the first and only third party application offering this feature. In addition, the app provides a convenient way to send a ?Thank You? email or SMS to the generous donator. iRedeemer 1.0 is the application that answer the question many experienced iTunes/iOS users heard so many times: ?How do I redeem by gift card?? or ?I got an app promo code, how do I use it ?? A google search show more than 5 millions documents for the search ?how to redeem app store promo code? and over 300 thousands for ?how to redeem itunes gift card?. iRedeemer is the solution to this question and it is now available for free for anyone using iOS 4.x. Users don?t have to search all over the internet or try to locate in the iTunes Store, AppStore where the ?redeem? screen is located, iRedeemer take care of it
With iRedeemer 1.0 being approved by Apple AppStore review team, a user simply enters the promo code in the text field of the screen and simply press the ?Redeem? button. The app take care of contacting the iTunes server and the app automatically start the iTunes Store with the code already pre-populated. If the user is authenticated, the gift card, gift certificate, or promo code will then be automatically credited to the user?s iTunes account. The free app provide a second feature which let a user send a ?Thank you? email or SMS to the generous donator. The app even provides a small library of 5 ?Thank you? images that can be added to the ?Thank you? email. The free app is supported by a small iAd located at the top of the main screen. An online version of the application is available.
Features: * Redeem iTunes Gift Card * Redeem iTunes Gift Certificate * Redeem iTunes AppStore promo code * Redeem iTunes any other iTunes code ?iRedeemer was created to help all iOS users to redeem their card/code and start enjoying their devices right away rather than wasting time trying to figure out how to redeem their card/code?, stated Founder Stephen Lu.
Language Support: * US English
Country Supported: * USA only
Device requirement: * iOS devices : iPhone, iPod touch, iPad * iOS 4.0 or later * 1.2 MB
Pricing and Availability iRedeemer 1.0 for iOS is a free application and is available in the USA only in the Utilities category.
jeTap: http://jetap.com/ iRedeemer 1.0: http://jetap.com/iredeemer/ Online Version: http://iredeemer.com Download from iTunes: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/iredeemer/id409823933?mt=8 Screenshot: http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r1000/049/Purple/c1/6f/c4/mzl.puggnqkh.320�480-75.jpg App Icon: http://a1.phobos.apple.com/us/r1000/028/Purple/4e/08/00/mzi.aljtbjxr.175�175-75.jpg Located in beautiful Reno, Nevada, jeTap Inc is a small, independent software company founded in 2010 by Stephen Lu. Currently jeTap is working on the iOS platform (iPhone, iPad, iPod touch). Their goal is to deliver high quality software, both in terms of user interface and features. Copyright (C) 2010 jeTap, Inc. description.hltext_display: Puluhan Tol Mangkrak Selesai Dievaluasi
description.content:
Sejumlah pekerja melakukan penambalan di sejumlah titik di jalan tol Kanci-Pejagan, Brebes, (27/8). TEMPO/Subekti.
TEMPO Interaktif, Jakarta -Kementerian Pekerjaan Umum memutuskan 24 ruas tol yang sempat mangkrak lulus evaluasi. Evaluasi yang dilakukan sejak Juli 2010 dan telah berakhir pada 22 Desember 2010. "24 ruas tol lulus evaluasi," ujar Kepala Badan Pengatur Jalan Tol Achmad Ghani Gazali, jumpa pers akhir tahun Kementerian Pekerjaan Umum, Rabu (22/12).
Menurut Ghani, evaluasi dilakukan sebagai tindak lanjut dari Peraturan Presiden Nomor 13 Tahun 2010 perubahan atas Peraturan Presiden Nomor 67 Tahun 2005 tentang Kerja Sama Pemerintah dengan Badan Usaha dalam Penyediaan Infrastruktur. Aturan itu tercantum dalam Peraturan Menteri PU Nomor 6 Tahun 2010.
Ruas jalan tol dievaluasi berdasarkan kelayakan dan kemampuan keuangan badan usaha tersebut. Kelayakan, jelas Ghani, tidak hanya dilihat berdasarkan kemampuan badan usaha. Tapi ada peran perbankan untuk membiayai proyek yang dijalankan badan usaha. "Pembagiannya biasanya 30 persen dari badan usaha, 70 persen dari perbankan," kata dia.
Untuk kemampuan keuangan badan usaha, dimungkinkan adanya pengalihan saham atau restrukturisasi pemegang saham. Dari 24 ruas jalan tol yang terhambat penyelesaiannya, Ghani menjelaskan, 9 ruas jalan tol Trans Jawa menjadi prioritas pengerjaan, 6 ruas jalan tol Jakarta Outer Ring Road II yang menjadi kebutuhan Provinsi DKI Jakarta sebagai ibu kota, dan 9 ruas lainnya.
Meski lulus evaluasi, ada beberapa catatan yang diberikan BPJT agar ke-24 ruas tol agar bisa diteruskan proyeknya. Dua belas diantaranya harus mendapat dukungan dari pemegang saham mayoritas, yakni Cikampek-Palimanan, Semarang-Solo, Solo-Mantingan-Ngawi, Ngawi-Kertosono, Surabaya-Mojokerto, Serpong-Cinere, Cibitung-Cilincing, JORR Seksi W2 utara, Depok-Antasari, Bogor Ring Road, Gempol-Pandaan, dan Gempol-Pasuruan.
Tujuh proyek harus merestrukturisasi pemegang saham yakni Pejagan-Pemalang, Batang-Semarang, Cengkareng-Kunciran, Cimanggis-Cibitung, Ciawi-Sukabumi, dan Pasuruan-Probolinggo. Sedangkan tiga proyek memerlukan tambahan setoran ekuitas dari pemegang saham yakni Pemalang-Batang,Becakayu, dan Waru-Tanjung perak.
Menurut Ghani, nilai investasi untuk 24 ruas jalan tol itu senilai Rp 111,748 triliun. Nilai tersebut mengalami kenaikan yang signifikan dibandingkan nilai investasi sebelumnya, sekitar Rp 78 triliun. "Ini jika berjalan semua, akan sangat membantu infrastruktur jalan," tuturnya.
Dia menjelaskan, kenaikan signifikan terjadi disebabkan adanya perubahan nilai konstruksi dan nilai tanah selama beberapa tahun ini. "Perubahan nilai tanah paling terasa di wilayah perkotaan seperti di Jakarta, Surabaya, Bandung," katanya.

description.hltext_display: Pagar Belakang RSU A Yani Roboh
description.content:
Laporan Wartawan Tribun Lampung.co.id, Leo David
METRO, TRIBUN-Akibat tertimpa pohon yang roboh diterpa hujan deras dan angin kencang, pagar belakang RSU Ahmad Yani, Metro roboh. Pagar di Jalan Seminung tersebut roboh sepanjang 15 meter.
Ali Syahbana, warga setempat mengatakan pagar tersebut roboh akibat tertimpa pohon yang tumbang karena angin kencang disertai hujan sekitar pukul 16.00 WIB, Selasa (21/12/2010). Menurutnya, selain merobohkan pagar, kabel lampu jalan dan telepon juga putus.(*)

description.hltext_display: ก.แรงงานอวดศักยภาพประกันว่างงานแก่คณะผู้แทนอาเซียน
description.content:
ก.แรงงาน นำคณะผู้แทนสมาชิกอาเซียนศึกษาดูงาน ด้านการประกันการว่างงานในไทย ซึ่งกรณีถูกเลิกจ้าง ลูกจ้างจะได้รับ เงินทดแทนช่วงว่างงานปีละไม่เกิน 180 วัน ในอัตราร้อยละ 50 ของค่าจ้าง กรณีสมัครใจลาออก ได้รับเงินทดแทนช่วงว่างงานปีละไม่เกิน 90 วัน ในอัตราร้อยละ 30 ของค่าจ้าง โดยคำนวณจากฐานเงินสมทบสูงสุดไม่เกิน 15,000 บาท
นางจิราภรณ์ เกษรสุจริต รองปลัดกระทรวงแรงงาน เปิดเผยว่า การสัมมนาเรื่องการประกันการว่างงาน จะทำให้ประเทศสมาชิกอาเซียนได้ทราบถึงความสำคัญและบทบาทของการประกันการว่างงานในปัจจุบัน โดยมีเป้าหมายที่จะทำให้เกิดประชาคมอาเซียนที่มีประชาชนเป็นศูนย์กลางและ
มีสังคมที่รับผิดชอบ เพื่อก่อให้เกิดความเป็นอันหนึ่งอันเดียวกัน เกิดเอกภาพ เสริมสร้างอัตลักษณ์ร่วมกัน และทำให้เกิดเป็นสังคมที่เอื้ออาทรและแบ่งปัน ส่งผลให้คุณภาพชีวิตและความเป็นอยู่และสวัสดิการของประชาชนที่ดีขึ้น รวมถึงเป็นการแลกเปลี่ยนประสบการณ์ด้านการประกันการว่างงานในกลุ่มประเทศสมาชิกอาเซียนให้สามารถดำเนินแผนงานประกันการว่างงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิผล
นอกจากนี้ยังได้นำผู้แทนของแต่ละประเทศอาเซียนศึกษาดูงานที่สำนักงานประกันสังคมเขตพื้นที่ 3 (รับผิดชอบเขตดินแดง พญาไทย ราชเทวี และห้วยขวาง) และสำนักจัดหางานเขตพื้นที่ 6 (รับผิดชอบเขตตลิ่งชัน ทวีวัฒนา บางแค ภาษีเจริญ และหนองแขม) ซึ่งคณะผู้แทนอาเซียนได้ซักถามถึงระบบประกันสังคม กรณีถูกเลิกจ้าง ซึ่งเรื่องนี้หากมีการเลิกจ้างลูกจ้างก็จะได้รับเงินทดแทนระหว่าง การว่างงานปีละไม่เกิน 180 วัน ในอัตราร้อยละ 50 ของค่าจ้าง โดยคำนวณจากฐานเงินสมทบสูงสุด ไม่เกิน 15,000 บาท
ส่วนในกรณีสมัครใจลาออก ได้รับเงินทดแทนระหว่างการว่างงานปีละไม่เกิน 90 วันในอัตราร้อยละ 30 ของค่าจ้าง โดยคำนวณจากฐานเงินสมทบสูงสุดไม่เกิน 15,000 บาท หากใน 1 ปีปฏิทินมีการยื่นขอรับเงินทดแทนระหว่างการว่างงานเกินกว่า 1 ครั้ง ให้นับระยะเวลาการรับเงินทดแทนระหว่างการว่างงานรวมกันไม่เกิน 180 วัน เงินทดแทนการขาดรายได้จะจ่ายเป็นงวดเดือน โดยโอนเงินผ่านบัญชีธนาคารตามที่ผู้ประกันตนแจ้ง การใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ด้วยระบบออนไลน์ทั่วประเทศในการดูประวัติของผู้ประกันตนและการจัดหางาน

description.hltext_display: Dumping anti-gay policy was right
description.content:
So letter writer Joe Lewis doesn't like being labeled a bigot ("'Bigot' is all lefties can use a rebuttal," Sunday).
Probably nothing I could write would change his mind about the rights of homosexual citizens of the United States.
Oliver Wendell Holmes wrote: "The mind of a bigot is like the pupil of an eye. The more light that is applied, the more closed it becomes."
Maybe he would prefer to be called "un-American." It is un-American to deny liberty and/or justice to anyone. My enjoyment of life and liberty should not be limited by someone else's questionable interpretation of Old Testament literature.
The abolishment of "Don't ask, don't tell" brings us one step closer to the realization of the American dream, "life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness" for all Americans, and should be celebrated by all who love the ideal of American liberty.

event_or_fact.property: The mind of a bigot is like the pupil of an eye.; The more light that is applied, the more closed it becomes.

description.hltext_display: Xerox Cuts Emissions by 31%, Water by 26% Since 2002
description.content:
NORWALK, CT Xerox this week published its annual CSR report, highlighting its progress on environmental and social sustainability.
The company includes data on its year-over-year progress in reducing a number of environmental impacts, as well as its cumulative achievements since 2002. The data show significant improvements across Xerox's operations, including 31 percent reductions in CO2 emissions and 26 percent reductions in water use in the last eight years.
Xerox has also made incremental improvements in a number of areas: The company increased its percentage of materials recycled by 1 percent since 2008, to 93 percent; diverted an additional 100 million pounds of waste from landfills through return, reuse and recycling programs, and increased by 12 percent the number of Xerox products that earn the Energy Star label. "We are a much bigger company today. We offer a much broader portfolio of services and technology. We have significantly expanded our global reach. But certain things remain the same," Ursula Burns, Xerox chairman and CEO, said in a letter to shareholders. "We believe we are part of an ongoing experiment to prove that good citizenship and good results are not only compatible but synergistic -- in good times and in challenging times." Burns also offered an example of how the global trend toward less paper use is proving to be a boon to Xerox's business:
The full Xerox Citizenship Report is available online at Xerox.com.
Photo CC-licensed by kretyen.

description.hltext_display: Dom om hyrestvist i Rosengård
description.author: annons@skd.se
description.content: Hyresnämnden beslutade om en sänkning av hyran med 5,5 procent från 1 oktober förra året. Men Hyresgästföreningen kräver en sänkning med 19 procent på grund av det misskötta underhållet och överklagade.Hyresvärden, Bostads AB Gröningen, anser dock att hyrorna ska vara oförändrade och överklagade också.

description.hltext_display: Moters auka (12)
Hugh Rolland Melville
Verbal confrontations with Aussies 'normal Ashes banter': Pietersen
description.content: Melbourne, Dec 22 : England batsman Kevin Pietersen has said that the verbal confrontations with the Australian team during the Ashes were nothing out of the ordinary. Pietersen said he had faced some "pretty big verbal contests" from Shane Warne and Glenn McGrath during England's previous Ashes tour four years ago.Australian pace bowler Peter Siddle clashed verbally with England batsman Matt Prior when Prior was dismissed during the Perth Test in one of several heated incidents to come out of the match.Pietersen said the tension out on the field is no different to any other Ashes encounter. "I think you guys (media) feed them some good lines," he told reporters."They talk a lot. Nothing's different. There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers, it is just England versus Australia. It's an Ashes series," The Age quoted him, as saying."Blokes get a bit red mist occasionally. You're allowed to do that on both teams. You're playing for a little urn. It's historic. It's huge. But there's nothing that's been overboard," he said.Pietersen also said he had goose bumps thinking about playing in front of a possible world-record crowd of 91,000 people on Sunday.

description.hltext_display: Flights canceled in Argentina as LAN flight attendants begin strike
description.content:
Aviation BNO News twitter
Tweet Share
BUENOS AIRES, ARGENTINA (BNO NEWS) -- LAN flight attendants began a strike on Tuesday morning alter refusing a deal offered by the airline, causing all flights to be canceled amidst anger and complaints from passengers.
LAN Argentina said that since the early hours of Tuesday, a group of flight attendants with the ATCPE union had decided to stop their work, causing delays and cancellations at Ministro Pistarini International Airport and Jorge Newbery Airport in Buenos Aires.
Flight attendants are protesting against a wage increase which was accorded between LAN and ATCPE on November 26. In this deal, which workers considered to be illegal, the union and the air carrier agreed on an average 30 percent increase of wages.
Argentinian authorities and LAN have tried to negotiate the resumption of labor but talks were halted when authorities threatened flight attendants to end the strike or risk losing the union. However, the workers were not intimidated and continued their protest.
As of Tuesday afternoon, approximately 20 flights were canceled and four others were delayed at the Jorge Newbery airport while only five flights were canceled at Ministro Pistarini International Airport. However, as time goes by, more flights are being delayed and will eventually be canceled if the workers continue their strike.
During the demonstration, strikers blocked the ticket booths and counters at the airports and displayed messages in which they expressed their demands.
LAN has offered the affected passengers refunds for their tickets, changing the date and flight or changing their destination. The airline offers 30 daily flights, and may all have to be canceled.
"LAN Argentina operates with the highest standards of quality, service and safety. The company expects that this situation will be solved as soon as possible and regrets the troubles that this action has caused," the airline said in a statement.

description.hltext_display: SYNC AppLink Now Available as Free Download; Ford Fiesta Owners First With Voice Control of Apps
description.content:
DEARBORN, Mich.
More than 14,000 owners of SYNC -equipped Ford Fiesta vehicles can start celebrating the holidays now by treating themselves to the gift of AppLink, a free software program that gives SYNC users voice control of apps stored on their smartphone.
The industry-first capability puts Ford out front in the race to integrate smartphone apps into the car. The AppLink download for Fiesta owners went live today on the SYNC owner website, www.syncmyride.com. "More and more drivers are using their devices and their apps while in the car," said Doug VanDagens
Ford is also announcing a surprise new member to the AppLink family: the Apple iPhone. The popular smartphone makes for a powerful addition, and will be joining Android and BlackBerry smartphones as compatible devices with the software that allows apps to be controlled through the SYNC voice recognition system - a smarter alternative to manually controlling apps while driving.
Recent studies indicate 46 percent of adult smartphone users have apps on their phones and 36 percent of those admit to using those apps while commuting. Moreover, the 2010 study "Staying Connected on the Go: A Look at In-Vehicle Smartphone Integration Systems" conducted by the Consumer Electronics Association reports that 55 percent of smartphone owners prefer voice commands as their user interface for in-car smartphone integration, making the business case for SYNC and AppLink even more compelling. "SYNC and AppLink work hand-in-hand to answer consumer demand for safer, smarter control of smartphones while in the car," said VanDagens. "Ford has worked hard to be a step ahead or at least in step with the speed of the consumer electronics market, and to leverage the technologies, features and services we know our customers want to be connected to while driving." Easy downloading
2011 SYNC-equipped Ford Fiesta owners need to log in to their account on www.syncmyride.com to access the free AppLink download in the Update & Customize section.
As with any typical download, the AppLink software can be stored on a USB memory stick, and then inserted and uploaded to the vehicle via the SYNC system's USB port. In-car installation takes less than 10 minutes.
The first SYNC-enabled apps to market are Pandora internet radio, Stitcher news radio and OpenBeak for listening to Twitter posts. Once the AppLink upload is complete, customers can then visit their phones' respective app store to download the latest SYNC-enabled Pandora, Stitcher or OpenBeak app to their smartphone as they would any other app.
Current availability of SYNC-enabled apps:
Seamless voice control
AppLink makes the connection between app and SYNC fairly seamless and simple, using Bluetooth streaming on paired Android and BlackBerry smartphones and the USB port for a connected Apple iPhone.
To access a mobile app with a SYNC-paired phone, the user simply has to press the VOICE button on the steering wheel and say the command, "Mobile applications," followed by the name of the app he or she would like to launch.
Once linked to Pandora, SYNC users can access their favorite personalized radio features, including creating and choosing stations, bookmarking songs for purchase, and giving songs a thumbs up/down all through voice. Command structure is intuitive and simple: "Play station classic rock radio," "Bookmark song," "Thumbs up" or "Thumbs down." "Where before users would pick up their phone, taking their eyes off the road and hands off the steering wheel while driving to select a station and hit play, AppLink makes all of that functionality available through voice control, just like managing AM and FM radio or your MP3 player through SYNC," said Julius Marchwicki
Similar voice command pathways and functionality exist for the Stitcher and OpenBeak apps. With Stitcher, for example, you can say the command, "Play station news" to listen to your favorite news radio or "Play station sports" to hear on-demand sports programming. Other popular Stitcher features such as skip station, thumbs up/down and "Add to favorites" are also available via voice.
Through the OpenBeak app, drivers can simply say the SYNC command, "Read timeline." In seconds, their feed is read aloud using the SYNC text-to-speech engine - a very similar experience to listening to talk radio.
Additional SYNC-enabled apps and smartphone integrations are coming soon, said Marchwicki. AppLink will also be introduced on other SYNC-equipped new model vehicles in 2011.
Ford will feature demos of AppLink at the Pepcom Digital Experience media event in Las Vegas
About Ford Motor Company

description.hltext_display: Australian man uses robot to commit suicide
description.author: Aisling Ash
description.content:
Humans have a way of always topping themselves in creativity and ingenuity, even in tragic situations. One of the most heartbreaking examples of just this situation occurred on March 18, 2008, when Francis Tovey, an 81-year-old Australian man used a robot he built with plans from the internet to commit suicide.
According to Gold Coast news, the man planned his suicide in response to pressure from relatives to move into an assisted living facility. The man, who had lived on his own for twenty-four years, left detailed notes explaining how he searched the internet for the plans to build the machine that would end up ending his life.
The Times Online reported than Tovey constructed a robotic device made in part of a jigsaw and a .22 caliber shotgun. The device was able to fire four shots after activation. This isnt the first time that someone has found plans to make a dangerous machine online, but this situation is especially resonant because it touches on another difficult issue.
According to suicide.org, suicides from the elderly population (over age 65) account for more than 18% of all suicides. Though those statistics are for the U.S. and Francis Tovey was from Australia, the information is still startling and disturbing.
Euthanasia campaigners have tried to use this instance in their platform to support doctor assisted euthanasia for elderly persons. But Mr. Toveys situation draws more attention to the problem of depression in those aged 65 and older rather than the issue of euthanasia for elderly persons, since there are no accounts that he was in any harsh physical suffering. Francis Toveys life ended in his driveway after he activated the suicide robot that he built. Through his notes, it appears that the driveway was chosen because carpenters were building a house next door, and he figured that one of them would find his body. He was right. Daniel Skewes, a carpenter working next door, heard the sounds of the machine and investigated. He found Tovey with head wounds received from his suicide robot.
If you have a friend, relative, or neighbor who is over 65, be aware of the suicide warning signs. A complete list of potential warning signs can be found at suicide.org, which also offers resources if you believe someone may be suicidal, or if you have had suicidal feelings yourself.
Sources:
http://www.suicide.org/elderly -suicide.html

description.hltext_display: "书信班主任"每周给学生家长写信 已坚持一年半 12-22
description.content:
从一年级新生进班开始，班主任赵红梅老师每周给学生家长写一封信，至今已坚持了一年半。昨日，记者从汉阳楚才小学获悉， 该� �有一位深受学生和家长喜爱的“书信班主任”。 据� �长禹妮介绍：赵红梅老师每周都坚持写一封信给学生家长。周五，她把信打印出来，人手一份让学生带给家长。
“我们细细读过赵老师写给家长的信，没有重复， 没有套话，每一封信都是真情实录。每封信都真实记录班级每一周的情况，以及她给家长朋友般的建议。”
禹妮认为，让老师给家长写一封感人肺腑的信很容易，坚持每周写就不容易。“这不仅需要激情，更需要强烈的责任感和使命感。”
赵红梅老师的信深深感动了家长。尹子恒同学的妈妈说：“赵老师每天这么忙，还给我们写信，我们如果不配合老师教育好自己的孩子，那就太对不起赵老师了。”
据了解，很多家长把赵老师写的信像集邮一� �一封封收集好，至今已收集了60余封了。学生端正的妈妈说：“我每天在家没事的时候，就会把赵老师的信拿出来读一读，感觉特别亲切！”
能遇上赵老师，让很多家长觉得是自己和孩子的幸运。李杰林同学的妈妈告诉记者：“我有个朋友，每次带孩子到我们家玩，她都要读读赵老师写的信。她特别羡慕孩子能有这么负责的老师。”
赵红梅老师告诉记者，最初是自己给家长写信，慢慢地，家长也开始给她回信，如今她的抽屉里装满了家长们的回信。
“通过读家长的回信，我更深的理解了学生，让我的教育更有针对性和贴近性。”赵红梅说。 � �长禹妮告诉记者，在赵红梅老师的带动下，学� �现在很多老师拿起笔，� 入到给学生家长写信的行列中来。(记者 周锐 通讯员 范朝阳）
